docstring: // Use adds a handler to the handlers stack.
summary_english:
This code defines a function called `Use` that belongs to a struct named `HandlersStack`. The purpose of this function is to add a new handler to a stack of handlers. 

It takes one argument: `h`, which is a variable of type `RouterHandler`.  

The function's key logic is to append the provided `h` (the new handler) to the end of the `hs.Handlers` slice, effectively adding it to the handler stack.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `Use`，它属于 `HandlersStack` 结构体的函数。该函数的作用是向路由处理程序堆栈中添加一个新的路由处理程序。

它接受一个名为 `h` 的参数，类型为 `RouterHandler`，代表要添加的路由处理程序。

函数的逻辑很简单：它使用 `append` 函数将传入的路由处理程序 `h` 添加到 `hs.Handlers` 数组的末尾，从而将新的处理程序添加到路由处理程序堆栈中。
bt_chinese: This function is called `Use` and it belongs to the `HandlersStack` structure. It adds a new router handler to the router handler stack. It takes one argument `h` of type `RouterHandler` which represents the router handler to be added. The logic is simple: it uses the `append` function to add the given router handler `h` to the end of the `hs.Handlers` array, thus adding the new handler to the router handler stack.
summary_french: La fonction `Use` est une méthode du type `HandlersStack` qui permet d'ajouter un nouveau gestionnaire de route (`RouterHandler`) à la pile de gestionnaires existants. Elle prend un seul argument, `h`, qui est un `RouterHandler`. La logique principale de la fonction consiste à utiliser la fonction `append` pour ajouter le gestionnaire `h` à la fin de la liste `hs.Handlers`, qui stocke tous les gestionnaires de route utilisés par l'instance `HandlersStack`.
bt_french: Function `Use` is a method of type `HandlersStack` which allows to add a new router handler (`RouterHandler`) to the existing stack of handlers. It takes one argument, `h`, which is a `RouterHandler`. The main logic of the function consists of using the `append` function to add the handler `h` to the end of the list `hs.Handlers`, which stores all the router handlers used by the instance `HandlersStack`.
summary_spanish:
La función `Use` pertenece a un tipo llamado `HandlersStack` y se utiliza para agregar un nuevo manejador de rutas (`RouterHandler`) a una pila de manejadores existentes. 

Recibe un único argumento:

* `h`: Un manejador de rutas de tipo `RouterHandler`.

La lógica principal de la función es extender la lista de manejadores (`hs.Handlers`) añadiendo el nuevo manejador `h` al final de la lista.
bt_spanish:
Function `Use` belongs to a type called `HandlersStack` and is used to add a new route handler (`RouterHandler`) to an existing stack of handlers. It takes one argument:

* `h`: A `RouterHandler` object.

The main logic of the function is to extend the list of handlers (`hs.Handlers`) by adding the new handler `h` to the end of the list.
summary_portuguese: A função `Use` pertence ao tipo `HandlersStack` e adiciona um novo handler ao stack de handlers. Ela recebe um argumento `h` do tipo `RouterHandler`, que representa o handler a ser adicionado. A lógica principal é usar a função `append` para adicionar o handler recebido como argumento ao final do slice `hs.Handlers`, que armazena todos os handlers do stack.
bt_portuguese: Function `Use` belongs to type `HandlersStack` and adds a new handler to the stack of handlers. It receives an argument `h` of type `RouterHandler`, which represents the handler to be added. The main logic is to use the `append` function to add the received argument to the end of the slice `hs.Handlers`, which stores all the handlers of the stack.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى "Use" وتُستخدم في بنية "HandlersStack" لدمج معالج جديد "RouterHandler" في سلسلة المعالجات الحالية. 

تستقبل الدالة معالجًا واحدًا من نوع "RouterHandler" كمدخل. 

تُضيف الدالة المعالج الجديد إلى نهاية قائمة المعالجات الموجودة في "Handlers" باستخدام دالة "append".
bt_arabic: This function is called "use" and is used in the structure of "HandlersStack" to integrate a new "RouterHandler" into the existing stack of handlers. The function accepts one argument of type "RouterHandler". It adds the new handler to the end of the list of existing handlers in the "Handlers" using the "append" function.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `Use` को परिभाषित करता है जो `HandlersStack` नामक एक स्ट्रक्चर के संदर्भ में काम करता है।  इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य एक नया `RouterHandler` को `HandlersStack` में जोड़ना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो आर्गुमेंट लेता है: 

* `hs`:  `HandlersStack` नामक एक पॉइंटर।
* `h`: `RouterHandler` नामक एक प्रकार का वैरिएबल।

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह `hs.Handlers` नामक एक स्लिस को `h` के साथ अपेंड करता है।  `HandlersStack` में `Handlers` एक स्लिस होता है जो विभिन्न `RouterHandler` को संग्रहीत करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `Use` which operates in the context of a structure named `HandlersStack`. This function is intended to add a new `RouterHandler` to the `HandlersStack`. 

The function takes two arguments: 

* `hs`: A pointer to the `HandlersStack`.
* `h`: A variable of type `RouterHandler`.

The main logic of the function is to append `h` to the `hs.Handlers` slice. The `HandlersStack` contains a slice of `Handlers` which stores various `RouterHandler` objects.

docstring: // Config fetches all LXD node-level config keys.
summary_english:
This function, named Config, is part of a NodeTx struct and retrieves configuration data. It takes a pointer to a NodeTx object as input and returns a map of strings representing configuration key-value pairs, along with an error if any occurs during the retrieval process. 

The function calls another function called SelectConfig, passing in the NodeTx object's transaction, the configuration identifier "config", and an empty string as arguments. The result of SelectConfig is then returned.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `Config`，它属于 `NodeTx` 结构体。该函数的作用是查询节点交易相关的配置信息。它接受一个 `NodeTx` 指针作为参数，并返回一个字符串键值对映射和一个错误信息。 

函数的逻辑很简单：它调用 `query.SelectConfig` 函数，传入节点交易 `n.tx`、配置名称 "config" 和空字符串作为参数，并返回查询结果。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `Config` and it belongs to the `NodeTx` structure. It is used to query the node transaction related configuration information. It accepts a pointer to a `NodeTx` as an argument and returns a string key-value pair mapping and an error message. 

The logic of the function is simple: it calls the `query.SelectConfig` function, passing in the node transaction `n.tx`, the configuration name "config" and an empty string as arguments, and returns the query result.
summary_french: La fonction `Config` est associée à un type `NodeTx` et a pour but de récupérer la configuration d'un nœud. Elle prend un argument `n` de type `*NodeTx` qui représente le nœud. La fonction utilise la fonction `SelectConfig` de l'interface `query` pour exécuter une requête SQL sur la transaction `n.tx` pour récupérer les données de configuration. La requête cible une table nommée "config" sans condition spécifique. La fonction retourne une carte de chaînes de caractères représentant la configuration et une éventuelle erreur.
bt_french: Function `Config` is associated with a type `NodeTx` and is used to retrieve the configuration of a node. It takes an argument `n` of type `*NodeTx` which represents the node. The function uses the `SelectConfig` function of the `query` interface to execute an SQL query on the transaction `n.tx` to retrieve the configuration data. The query targets a table named "config" without any specific condition. The function returns a map of string values representing the configuration and an optional error.
summary_spanish:
La función `Config` pertenece a un tipo de estructura llamado `NodeTx`. Su propósito es obtener la configuración de un nodo a través de una consulta a la base de datos. 

La función recibe un argumento:

* `n.tx`: Un objeto de tipo `tx` que representa una transacción en curso.

La lógica principal de la función es llamar a la función `SelectConfig` del paquete `query`, pasando como argumentos la transacción `n.tx`, la clave "config" y una cadena vacía. Esta función devuelve un mapa de cadenas donde las claves son nombres de configuración y los valores son sus respectivos valores, junto con un posible error si la consulta falla.
bt_spanish:
Function `Config` belongs to a type of structure called `NodeTx`. Its purpose is to obtain the configuration of a node through a query to the database. 

The function receives an argument:

* `n.tx`: An object of type `tx` that represents an ongoing transaction.

The main logic of the function is to call the function `SelectConfig` from the package `query`, passing as arguments the transaction `n.tx`, the key "config" and an empty string. This function returns a map of strings where the keys are configuration names and the values are their respective values, along with a possible error if the query fails.
summary_portuguese: A função `Config` pertence a um tipo chamado `NodeTx` e tem como objetivo recuperar as configurações de um nó. Ela recebe como argumento um ponteiro para um objeto `NodeTx` e retorna um mapa de strings para strings representando as configurações, juntamente com um possível erro. A lógica principal da função é chamar a função `SelectConfig` do pacote `query`, passando como argumentos o contexto de transação (`n.tx`), a chave "config" e uma string vazia.
bt_portuguese: Function `Config` belongs to a type called `NodeTx` and aims to retrieve the configurations of a node. It receives as argument a pointer to an object `NodeTx` and returns a map of strings to strings representing the configurations, along with a possible error. The main logic of the function is to call the function `SelectConfig` from the package `query`, passing as arguments the transaction context (`n.tx`), the key "config" and an empty string.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى Config وتعمل على استرجاع إعدادات عقدة معينة. 

تستقبل الدالة  引数の  NodeTx  و  tx  و  "config"  و  ""  . 

الدالة تقوم باستدعاء دالة SelectConfig من package query  باستخدام  tx  و  "config"  و  ""  كمعلمات. ثم تعيد خريطة من نوع string إلى string  و  error  .
bt_arabic: This function is called Config and it works to retrieve the settings of a specific node. The function accepts two arguments, NodeTx and tx. The function calls the SelectConfig function from the query package using tx and "config" and "" as parameters. Then it returns a map of type string to string and error.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `Config` नामक है जो एक `NodeTx` नामक स्ट्रक्चर के उदाहरण पर काम करता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य एक नोड की कॉन्फ़िगरेशन सेटिंग्स को वापस करना है। यह `query.SelectConfig` नामक एक अन्य फ़ंक्शन को कॉल करता है, जो `n.tx` (जो संभवतः एक ट्रांज़ैक्शन है) और "config" (जो कॉन्फ़िगरेशन की कुंजी है) के साथ एक क्वेरी चलाता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन में दो आउटपुट हैं: 

* एक `map[string]string` जो कॉन्फ़िगरेशन सेटिंग्स को स्ट्रिंग की कुंजी-मूल्य जोड़ी के रूप में संग्रहीत करता है।
* एक `error` जो किसी भी त्रुटि को इंगित करता है जो क्वेरी चलाते समय हुई हो सकती है।
bt_hindi:
This code is a function named `Config` which works on an instance of a structure named `NodeTx`. The purpose of this function is to return the configuration settings of a node. It calls another function named `query.SelectConfig`, which runs a query with `n.tx` (which is likely a transaction) and "config" (which is the configuration key). 

This function has two outputs: 

* A `map[string]string` which stores the configuration settings as string-key pair.
* An `error` which indicates any error that may have occurred while running the query.

summary_english: This function, named LogField, is part of a struct called DefaultContext and is used to add a key-value pair to the context's logger. It takes two arguments: key, which is a string representing the field name, and value, which is an interface{} allowing for any data type. The function updates the logger by calling its WithField method, attaching the provided key and value to the logger's context.
summary_chinese: 这个函数名为 `LogField`，它属于 `DefaultContext` 结构体的函数。这个函数的作用是添加一个日志字段到当前的日志记录器中。它接受两个参数：`key` 是一个字符串，代表日志字段的名称；`value` 是一个接口类型，代表日志字段的值。函数的逻辑是使用 `WithField` 方法将 `key` 和 `value` 添加到当前的日志记录器 `d.logger` 中，并更新 `d.logger` 的值。
bt_chinese: This function is named `LogField` and it belongs to the `DefaultContext` structure. This function adds a log field to the current logger. It takes two parameters: `key` is a string representing the name of the log field, and `value` is an interface type representing the value of the log field. The logic of the function is to use the `WithField` method to add the `key` and `value` to the current logger `d.logger`, and then update the `d.logger`'s value.
summary_french:
La fonction `LogField` est une méthode du type `DefaultContext`. Elle permet d'ajouter un champ personnalisé au logger associé au contexte. 

Elle prend deux arguments : 

* `key` : une chaîne de caractères représentant le nom du champ à ajouter.
* `value` : une interface qui représente la valeur du champ.

La fonction utilise la méthode `WithField` du logger pour créer une nouvelle instance du logger avec le champ ajouté. Elle assigne ensuite cette nouvelle instance à la variable `logger` du contexte.
bt_french:
Function `LogField` is a method of type `DefaultContext`. It allows to add a custom field to the associated logger. 

It takes two arguments: 

* `key` : a string representing the name of the field to add.
* `value` : an interface representing the value of the field.

The function uses the `WithField` method of the logger to create a new instance of the logger with the added field. It then assigns this new instance to the `logger` variable of the context.
summary_spanish:
La función `LogField` pertenece a un tipo de estructura llamado `DefaultContext`. Su propósito es agregar un campo personalizado al registro actual. 

Recibe dos argumentos: 

* `key`: una cadena que representa el nombre del campo a agregar.
* `value`: cualquier tipo de dato que represente el valor del campo.

La lógica principal de la función es utilizar el método `WithField` del logger asociado al contexto (`d.logger`) para añadir el campo especificado por `key` con el valor proporcionado por `value`.
bt_spanish:
Function `LogField` belongs to a type of structure called `DefaultContext`. Its purpose is to add a custom field to the current log. 

It receives two arguments: 

* `key`: a string that represents the name of the field to add.
* `value`: any type of data that represents the value of the field.

The main logic of the function is to use the `WithField` method of the logger associated with the context (`d.logger`) to add the field specified by `key` with the value provided by `value`.
summary_portuguese: A função `LogField` pertence ao tipo `DefaultContext` e serve para adicionar um campo personalizado ao log. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `key` que é uma string representando o nome do campo, e `value` que é uma interface{} representando o valor do campo. A lógica principal da função é utilizar o método `WithField` do logger associado ao contexto (`d.logger`) para adicionar o campo especificado com o valor fornecido.
bt_portuguese: Function `LogField` belongs to type `DefaultContext` and serves to add a custom field to the log. It receives two arguments: `key` which is a string representing the name of the field, and `value` which is an interface{} representing the value of the field. The main logic of the function is to use the method `WithField` of the logger associated to the context (`d.logger`) to add the specified field with the provided value.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى LogField وتُستخدم في سياق DefaultContext.  الغرض منها إضافة مجال جديد إلى سجل الدالة logger. 

تستقبل الدالة  اثنين من الحجج:

* key:  سلسلة نصية تمثل اسم المجال.
* value: أي قيمة يمكن تحويلها إلى نص، مثل عدد، قيمة حقيقية، أو سلسلة نصية.

الدالة تقوم بتحديث logger  بإضافة المجال الجديد key مع قيمته value.
bt_arabic:
This function is called LogField and is used in the context of DefaultContext. It adds a new field to the logger's record. The function takes two arguments:

* key: A string representing the name of the field.
* value: Any value that can be converted to a string, such as a number, real value, or string.

The function updates the logger by adding the new field key with its value value.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `LogField` को परिभाषित करता है जो `DefaultContext` नामक एक संरचना के संदर्भ में काम करता है।  इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य लॉग रिकॉर्ड में एक विशेष फ़ील्ड जोड़ना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो मान लेता है: `key` जो एक स्ट्रिंग है और `value` जो किसी भी प्रकार का डेटा हो सकता है (interface{})। 

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह `d.logger` नामक एक लॉगर ऑब्जेक्ट को `WithField` विधि का उपयोग करके अपडेट करता है। `WithField` विधि एक नया लॉगर ऑब्जेक्ट बनाती है जिसमें `key` नामक एक नई फ़ील्ड होती है और उस फ़ील्ड का मान `value` होता है।  इस नए लॉगर ऑब्जेक्ट को `d.logger` में असाइन किया जाता है, जिसका अर्थ है कि भविष्य में लॉग रिकॉर्ड किए जाने वाले सभी संदेश इस नई फ़ील्ड को शामिल करेंगे।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `LogField` which operates in the context of a structure named `DefaultContext`. This function is intended to add a specific field to the log record. 

The function takes two arguments: `key` which is a string and `value` which can be any type of data (interface{}). 

The main logic of the function is that it updates the `d.logger` object using the `WithField` method. The `WithField` method creates a new logger object which has a new field named `key` and its value is `value`. This new logger object is then assigned to `d.logger`, meaning that all future log records will include this new field.

docstring: // void cvPutText(CvArr* img, const char* text, CvPoint org, const CvFont* font, CvScalar color)
summary_english:
This function, named PutText, is part of a Font object and is used to draw text onto an image. It takes four arguments: an image represented by an IplImage pointer, the text to be drawn as a string, a Point object specifying the starting position of the text, and a Scalar object representing the color of the text. 

The function's key logic involves calling a C function called cvPutText, which is responsible for actually drawing the text onto the image. It passes the image, the text converted to a C string, the starting point converted to a C point, the font associated with the Font object, and the color converted to a CvScalar structure to the C function.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 PutText，它用于在给定的图像上绘制文本。 

它接受四个参数：

* image：一个指针指向 OpenCV 的 IplImage 结构体，代表要绘制文本的图像。
* text：要绘制的文本字符串。
* pt1：一个 Point 结构体，代表文本左上角的坐标。
* color：一个 Scalar 结构体，代表文本的颜色。

函数的核心逻辑是调用 OpenCV 的 cvPutText 函数，将文本绘制到图像上。它将图像指针、文本字符串、坐标点和字体信息传递给 cvPutText 函数，并使用 color 参数设置文本颜色。
bt_chinese:
This function is called PutText and is used to draw text on a given image. It takes four parameters:

* image: A pointer to an OpenCV IplImage structure, representing the image to draw text on.
* text: The text string to be drawn.
* pt1: A Point structure, representing the top-left coordinate of the text.
* color: A Scalar structure, representing the color of the text.

The core logic of the function is to call the OpenCV function cvPutText, which draws the text on the image. It passes the image pointer, text string, coordinate point and font information to the cvPutText function, and uses the color parameter to set the text color.
summary_french:
La fonction `PutText` est définie pour un objet de type `Font`. Elle permet d'écrire du texte sur une image. 

Elle prend quatre arguments : 

* `image` : un pointeur vers une image de type `IplImage`.
* `text` : une chaîne de caractères représentant le texte à écrire.
* `pt1` : un point de type `Point` qui définit les coordonnées de l'angle supérieur gauche du texte.
* `color` : une valeur de type `Scalar` qui représente la couleur du texte.

La fonction utilise la fonction C `cvPutText` pour écrire le texte sur l'image. Elle convertit les arguments en types compatibles avec la fonction C et utilise la police de caractères définie dans l'objet `Font`.
bt_french:
Function `PutText` is defined for an object of type `Font`. It allows to write text on an image. 

It takes four arguments: 

* `image` : a pointer to an image of type `IplImage`.
* `text` : a string representing the text to be written.
* `pt1` : a Point object which defines the coordinates of the top-left corner of the text.
* `color` : a Scalar value representing the color of the text.

The function uses the C function `cvPutText` to write the text on the image. It converts the arguments into types compatible with the C function and uses the font defined in the `Font` object.
summary_spanish:
La función `PutText` pertenece a un tipo de estructura llamado `Font` y tiene como objetivo escribir texto en una imagen. 

Recibe cuatro argumentos:

* `image`: un puntero a una imagen del tipo `IplImage`.
* `text`: una cadena de texto que se va a escribir en la imagen.
* `pt1`: un punto del tipo `Point` que define la posición inicial del texto en la imagen.
* `color`: un valor del tipo `Scalar` que determina el color del texto.

La lógica principal de la función es llamar a una función nativa llamada `cvPutText` que se encarga de escribir el texto en la imagen. Esta función nativa recibe como argumentos el puntero a la imagen, la cadena de texto convertida a un puntero a caracteres, las coordenadas del punto inicial del texto, el tipo de fuente, y el color del texto.
bt_spanish:
Function `PutText` belongs to a type of structure called `Font` and is used to write text on an image. It takes four arguments:

* `image`: a pointer to an image of type `IplImage`.
* `text`: a string of text to be written on the image.
* `pt1`: a Point that defines the initial position of the text on the image.
* `color`: a Scalar value that determines the color of the text.

The main logic of the function is to call a native function called `cvPutText` which is responsible for writing the text on the image. This native function takes as arguments the pointer to the image, the string of text converted to a pointer to characters, the coordinates of the initial point of the text, the font type, and the color of the text.
summary_portuguese: A função `PutText` pertence à estrutura `Font` e tem como objetivo escrever texto em uma imagem. Ela recebe quatro argumentos: `image` que é um ponteiro para uma imagem do tipo `IplImage`, `text` que é uma string contendo o texto a ser escrito, `pt1` que é um ponto do tipo `Point` representando a coordenada inicial do texto na imagem e `color` que é um valor do tipo `Scalar` representando a cor do texto. A função usa a função nativa `cvPutText` da biblioteca OpenCV para escrever o texto na imagem, convertendo os argumentos para os tipos esperados pela função nativa.
bt_portuguese: PutText is a function belonging to the Font structure and is used to write text on an image. It takes four arguments: image which is a pointer to an IplImage image, text which is a string containing the text to be written, pt1 which is a Point representing the initial coordinates of the text on the image, and color which is a Scalar value representing the color of the text. The function uses the native cvPutText function from the OpenCV library to write the text on the image, converting the arguments to the expected types of the native function.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى PutText وتُستخدم لكتابة نص على صورة. 

تستقبل الوظيفة أربعة أُدوات:

* image: صورة من نوع IplImage.
* text: نص من نوع string.
* pt1: نقطة بداية للكتابة من نوع Point.
* color: لون النص من نوع Scalar.

الوظيفة تقوم بتنفيذ الخطوة التالية:

تستخدم مكتبة OpenCV (C.cvPutText) لكتابة النص المحدد على الصورة في الموقع المحدد بلون محدد.
bt_arabic:
This function is called PutText and is used to write text on an image. It takes four parameters:

* image: An IplImage object.
* text: A string.
* pt1: A Point object specifying the starting point of the text.
* color: A Scalar object specifying the color of the text.

The function performs the following steps:

1. It uses the OpenCV library (C.cvPutText) to write the given text on the image at the specified location with the given color.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `PutText` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक फ़ॉन्ट ऑब्जेक्ट पर लागू होता है। इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य किसी इमेज पर पाठ लिखना है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन को निम्नलिखित आर्गुमेंट्स दिए जाते हैं:

* `image`: एक `IplImage` पॉइंटर जो उस इमेज को संदर्भित करता है जिस पर पाठ लिखा जाना है।
* `text`: पाठ स्ट्रिंग जो इमेज पर लिखा जाना है।
* `pt1`: एक `Point` स्ट्रक्चर जो पाठ के निचले बाएँ कोने की स्थिति को परिभाषित करता है।
* `color`: एक `Scalar` जो पाठ के रंग को परिभाषित करता है।

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह `C.cvPutText` नामक एक सी फ़ंक्शन को कॉल करता है। यह फ़ंक्शन इमेज, पाठ, स्थिति, फ़ॉन्ट और रंग के साथ पाठ लिखने के लिए जिम्मेदार है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `PutText` which applies to a font object. This function is used to write text on an image. 

The function takes the following arguments:

* `image`: A `IplImage` pointer which references the image on which the text is to be written.
* `text`: A text string which is to be written on the image.
* `pt1`: A `Point` structure which defines the lower left corner position of the text.
* `color`: A `Scalar` which defines the color of the text.

The main logic of the function is that it calls a C function named `C.cvPutText`. This function is responsible for writing text on the image with the given parameters.

docstring: // Format formats the node.
summary_english:
The function `Format` is part of a `ShowFilter` struct and is responsible for formatting a filter expression into a string. It takes two arguments: `buf`, which is a `TrackedBuffer` used for writing the formatted string, and `node`, which is a pointer to the `ShowFilter` struct containing the filter information. 

The function first checks if the `Like` field of the `ShowFilter` struct is not empty. If it is, it formats the string as "like '%s'" and appends the value of `node.Like` to it. Otherwise, it formats the string as "where %v" and appends the value of `node.Filter` to it.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `Format`，它属于 `ShowFilter` 结构体。这个函数的作用是根据 `node` 结构体的属性，格式化出一个查询条件字符串，并将其写入 `buf` 缓冲区。

它接受两个参数：

* `node`: 一个指向 `ShowFilter` 结构体的指针。
* `buf`: 一个 `TrackedBuffer` 类型的缓冲区。

函数的逻辑是：如果 `node.Like` 字段不为空，则将 `like '%s'` 格式化字符串写入缓冲区，并将 `node.Like` 作为参数传递；否则，将 `where %v` 格式化字符串写入缓冲区，并将 `node.Filter` 作为参数传递。
bt_chinese:
This function is named `Format` and it belongs to the `ShowFilter` structure. This function is used to format a query condition string according to the attributes of the `node` structure, and write it to the `buf` buffer. 

It accepts two parameters:

* `node`: A pointer to the `ShowFilter` structure.
* `buf`: A `TrackedBuffer` type buffer.

The logic of the function is: If the `node.Like` field is not empty, then the `like '%s'` formatted string is written to the buffer, and the `node.Like` is passed as an argument; otherwise, the `where %v` formatted string is written to the buffer, and the `node.Filter` is passed as an argument.
summary_french:
La fonction `Format` est associée à un type de données nommé `ShowFilter`. Elle a pour but de formater une expression de filtrage en fonction des valeurs de ses attributs. 

Elle prend deux arguments : 

* `node` : un pointeur vers un objet `ShowFilter`.
* `buf` : un pointeur vers un objet `TrackedBuffer`.

La logique principale de la fonction est la suivante : si l'attribut `Like` de l'objet `node` n'est pas vide, elle formate une expression "like '%s'" en utilisant la valeur de `node.Like`. Sinon, elle formate une expression "where %v" en utilisant la valeur de `node.Filter`.
bt_french:
Function `Format` is associated with a data type named `ShowFilter`. It is used to format a filtering expression according to the values of its attributes. It takes two arguments: 

* `node` : a pointer to an object `ShowFilter`.
* `buf` : a pointer to an object `TrackedBuffer`.

The main logic of the function is as follows: if the attribute `Like` of the object `node` is not empty, it formats an expression "like '%s'" using the value of `node.Like`. Otherwise, it formats an expression "where %v" using the value of `node.Filter`.
summary_spanish:
La función `Format` pertenece a un tipo llamado `ShowFilter` y se encarga de formatear una condición de filtro para una consulta. 

Recibe dos argumentos: 

* `node`: Un puntero a un objeto `ShowFilter` que contiene la información sobre el filtro.
* `buf`: Un puntero a un objeto `TrackedBuffer` que se utilizará para almacenar el resultado formateado.

La lógica principal de la función es la siguiente: si la propiedad `Like` del objeto `node` no está vacía, entonces se formatea una cláusula `like` utilizando el valor de `node.Like`. De lo contrario, se formatea una cláusula `where` utilizando el valor de `node.Filter`.
bt_spanish:
Function `Format` belongs to a type called `ShowFilter` and is responsible for formatting a filter condition for a query. It takes two arguments: 

* `node`: A pointer to a `ShowFilter` object containing the filter information.
* `buf`: A pointer to a `TrackedBuffer` object to be used to store the formatted result.

The main logic of the function is as follows: if the `Like` property of the `node` object is not empty, then a `like` clause is formatted using the value of `node.Like`. Otherwise, a `where` clause is formatted using the value of `node.Filter`.
summary_portuguese:
A função `Format` pertence ao tipo `ShowFilter` e tem como objetivo formatar uma expressão de filtro para exibição. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `buf`, um ponteiro para um objeto `TrackedBuffer` que provavelmente é usado para construir a string de saída, e `node`, um ponteiro para o próprio objeto `ShowFilter`. 

A lógica da função é a seguinte: se o campo `Like` do objeto `node` não estiver vazio, ela formata a string incluindo a palavra "like" seguida pelo valor de `node.Like`. Caso contrário, ela formata a string incluindo a palavra "where" seguida pelo valor do campo `node.Filter`.
bt_portuguese:
Function `Format` belongs to type `ShowFilter` and is used to format a filter expression for display. It takes two arguments: `buf`, a pointer to a `TrackedBuffer` object which is likely used to construct the output string, and `node`, a pointer to the `ShowFilter` object. 

The logic of the function is as follows: if the `Like` field of the `node` object is not empty, it formats the string including the word "like" followed by the value of `node.Like`. Otherwise, it formats the string including the word "where" followed by the value of the `node.Filter` field.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى Format وتعمل على تنسيق شرط بحث معين. 

تستقبل الدالة  دالة  ShowFilter  و  دالة  TrackedBuffer  كمدخلات. 

إذا كان  "Like"  في  ShowFilter  غير فارغ، فإن الدالة ستقوم بكتابة "like '%s'"  في  TrackedBuffer  و ستحل محل "%s"  بمحتوى  "Like". 

أما إذا كان  "Like"  فارغًا، فستقوم الدالة بكتابة "where %v"  في  TrackedBuffer  و ستحل محل "%v"  بمحتوى  "Filter".
bt_arabic: This function is called Format and it works on formatting a given search condition. It accepts ShowFilter and TrackedBuffer as inputs. If "Like" in ShowFilter is not empty, the function will write "like '%s'" in TrackedBuffer and replace "%s" with the content of "Like". If "Like" is empty, the function will write "where %v" in TrackedBuffer and replace "%v" with the content of "Filter".
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `Format` को परिभाषित करता है जो `ShowFilter` नामक एक स्ट्रक्चर के एक पॉइंटर को लेता है और `TrackedBuffer` नामक एक अन्य स्ट्रक्चर के पॉइंटर को लेता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य `ShowFilter` स्ट्रक्चर के आधार पर एक SQL क्वेरी के लिए एक स्ट्रिंग बनाना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो प्रकार के आर्गुमेंट्स लेता है:

* `node`: `ShowFilter` नामक स्ट्रक्चर का पॉइंटर।
* `buf`: `TrackedBuffer` नामक स्ट्रक्चर का पॉइंटर।

यदि `node.Like` खाली नहीं है, तो यह `buf` में "like '%s'" फॉर्मेट में स्ट्रिंग लिखता है, जहाँ '%s' `node.Like` के मान से बदल जाता है। 

अगर `node.Like` खाली है, तो यह `buf` में "where %v" फॉर्मेट में स्ट्रिंग लिखता है, जहाँ '%v' `node.Filter` के मान से बदल जाता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `Format` which takes a pointer to a structure named `ShowFilter` and a pointer to another structure named `TrackedBuffer` as arguments. 

The purpose of this function is to create a string based on the `ShowFilter` structure. 

This function takes two arguments:

* `node`: Pointer to the `ShowFilter` structure.
* `buf`: Pointer to the `TrackedBuffer` structure.

If `node.Like` is not empty, it writes a string in "like '%s'" format to `buf`, where '%s' is replaced by the value of `node.Like`. 

If `node.Like` is empty, it writes a string in "where %v" format to `buf`, where '%v' is replaced by the value of `node.Filter`.

summary_english: The function `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` creates a new instance of `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams`. This function is used to set override values for device metrics, such as width, height, device scale factor, and whether the device is considered mobile. It takes four arguments: `width` and `height` which are integers representing the desired width and height in pixels, `deviceScaleFactor` which is a float representing the scaling factor for the device, and `mobile` which is a boolean indicating whether the device is mobile. The function then constructs a new `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` object using these values and returns a pointer to it.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `SetDeviceMetricsOverride`，它的目的是创建一个 `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` 结构体，用于设置设备的元数据覆盖。

它接受四个参数：

* `width`：一个 `int64` 类型，表示设备的宽度。
* `height`：一个 `int64` 类型，表示设备的高度。
* `deviceScaleFactor`：一个 `float64` 类型，表示设备的缩放因子。
* `mobile`：一个布尔类型，表示设备是否是移动设备。

函数的逻辑很简单，它创建一个 `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` 结构体，并将传入的参数赋值给结构体的字段，最后返回这个结构体。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` and its purpose is to create a `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` structure to set device metadata override. It accepts four parameters:

* `width` - an `int64` type, representing the device's width.
* `height` - an `int64` type, representing the device's height.
* `deviceScaleFactor` - a `float64` type, representing the device's scaling factor.
* `mobile` - a boolean type, representing whether the device is mobile or not.

The logic of the function is simple, it creates a `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` structure and assigns the given parameters to the structure's fields, then returns the structure.
summary_french: La fonction `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` permet de définir des paramètres overrides pour les mesures de l'appareil. Elle prend quatre arguments : `width` et `height` qui sont des nombres entiers à 64 bits représentant la largeur et la hauteur en pixels, `deviceScaleFactor` qui est un nombre à virgule flottante représentant le facteur d'échelle de l'appareil, et `mobile` qui est une valeur booléenne indiquant si l'appareil est mobile. La fonction retourne un pointeur vers un objet `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` qui contient ces paramètres overrides.
bt_french: Function `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` allows to set override parameters for device metrics. It takes four arguments: `width` and `height` which are 64-bit integers representing the width and height in pixels, `deviceScaleFactor` which is a floating-point number representing the device scale factor, and `mobile` which is a boolean value indicating if the device is mobile. The function returns a pointer to an object `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` which contains these override parameters.
summary_spanish:
La función `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` tiene como propósito crear un nuevo objeto `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` con valores específicos para la configuración de métricas del dispositivo. 

Recibe cuatro argumentos: 

* `width`: un entero de 64 bits que representa el ancho del dispositivo.
* `height`: un entero de 64 bits que representa la altura del dispositivo.
* `deviceScaleFactor`: un número de punto flotante que representa el factor de escala del dispositivo.
* `mobile`: un booleano que indica si el dispositivo es móvil.

La función crea un nuevo objeto `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` y asigna a sus campos los valores proporcionados como argumentos. Finalmente, devuelve una referencia a este nuevo objeto.
bt_spanish: Function `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` has the purpose of creating a new object `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` with specific values for device metrics configuration. It receives four arguments: `width`, `height`, `deviceScaleFactor` and `mobile`. The function creates a new object `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` and assigns its fields the values provided as arguments. Finally, it returns a reference to this new object.
summary_portuguese:
A função `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` cria um novo objeto `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams`.  Seu objetivo é definir parâmetros personalizados para as métricas do dispositivo, como largura, altura, fator de escala do dispositivo e se o dispositivo é móvel. 

A função recebe quatro argumentos: `width` (um inteiro de 64 bits representando a largura), `height` (um inteiro de 64 bits representando a altura), `deviceScaleFactor` (um número de ponto flutuante representando o fator de escala do dispositivo) e `mobile` (um booleano indicando se o dispositivo é móvel). 

A lógica principal da função é criar um novo objeto `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` e atribuir os valores recebidos como argumentos aos seus campos correspondentes. Em seguida, a função retorna o objeto criado.
bt_portuguese:
Function `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` creates a new object `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams`. Its purpose is to set custom parameters for device metrics, such as width, height, device scale factor, and whether the device is mobile. 

The function takes four arguments: `width` (an integer of 64 bits representing the width), `height` (an integer of 64 bits representing the height), `deviceScaleFactor` (a floating-point number representing the device scale factor) and `mobile` (a boolean indicating whether the device is mobile). 

The main logic of the function is to create a new object `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` and assign the values received as arguments to its corresponding fields. The function then returns the created object.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى SetDeviceMetricsOverride وتستخدم لتعيين قيم معايرة جهاز افتراضية. 

تستقبل الدالة أربعة أُسْباب:

* width: عدد صحيح يدل على العرض.
* height: عدد صحيح يدل على الارتفاع.
* deviceScaleFactor: عدد عشري يدل على عامل مقياس الجهاز.
* mobile: قيمة bool (صحيح أو خطأ) تدل على ما إذا كان الجهاز هو هاتف محمول أم لا.

الدالة تقوم بإنشاء قيم جديدة من نوع SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams وتُعبئها بقيم الأُسْباب المذكورة أعلاه، ثم تعيد هذه القيم الجديدة.
bt_arabic:
This function is called SetDeviceMetricsOverride and is used to set the metrics of a virtual device. The function takes four parameters:

* width: An integer representing the width.
* height: An integer representing the height.
* deviceScaleFactor: A floating point number representing the device's scale factor.
* mobile: A boolean (true or false) indicating whether the device is a mobile device or not.

The function creates a new SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams object and populates it with the given parameters. It then returns the new object.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` परिभाषित करता है जो डिवाइस के मेट्रिक्स को ओवरराइड करने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है। यह फ़ंक्शन चौड़ाई, ऊँचाई, डिवाइस स्केल फैक्टर और मोबाइल डिवाइस के लिए एक `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams`  उपयोगकर्ता परिभाषित प्रकार का एक नया ऑब्जेक्ट बनाता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन को `width` (int64), `height` (int64), `deviceScaleFactor` (float64) और `mobile` (bool) नामक चार मानों के साथ बुलाया जाता है। 

फ़ंक्शन इन मानों को `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` ऑब्जेक्ट के गुणों में सेट करता है और फिर इस ऑब्जेक्ट को वापस करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `SetDeviceMetricsOverride` which is used to override the device metrics. This function creates a new object of type `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` which is a user-defined type. The function is called with four parameters `width` (int64), `height` (int64), `deviceScaleFactor` (float64) and `mobile` (bool). 

The function sets these parameters as properties of the `SetDeviceMetricsOverrideParams` object and then returns it.

docstring: // LoadString takes a template string and compiles it into vm.ByteCode
summary_english:
This function, named LoadString, is part of a StringByteCodeLoader and is responsible for loading bytecode from a given string template. It takes two arguments: "name" which is a string representing the name of the code, and "template" which is a string containing the actual code. 

First, it parses the template string using a parser (l.Parser) and checks for any errors. If there are errors, it returns an error. If the parsing is successful, it optionally dumps the resulting Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) to standard error if the loader's ShouldDumpAST() function returns true.

Next, it compiles the AST into bytecode using a compiler (l.Compiler) and checks for any errors. Again, if there are errors, it returns an error. If the compilation is successful, it optionally dumps the generated bytecode to standard error if the loader's ShouldDumpByteCode() function returns true.

Finally, it returns the compiled bytecode and a nil error, indicating successful loading.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `LoadString`，它属于 `StringByteCodeLoader` 类型。这个函数的作用是根据给定的名称和模板字符串，解析、编译并返回对应的字节码。

它接受两个参数：

* `name`：字符串类型，表示字节码的名称。
* `template`：字符串类型，表示要解析和编译的模板字符串。

函数的逻辑如下：

1. 使用 `Parser` 解析模板字符串，生成抽象语法树（AST）。
2. 如果需要，将生成的 AST 打印到标准错误流中。
3. 使用 `Compiler` 编译 AST，生成字节码。
4. 如果需要，将生成的字节码打印到标准错误流中。
5. 返回生成的字节码和一个错误信息（如果编译过程中出现错误）。
bt_chinese:
This function is named `LoadString` and belongs to the `StringByteCodeLoader` type. It is used to parse, compile and return the corresponding bytecode according to the given name and template string. 

It accepts two parameters:

* `name`: string type, representing the bytecode's name.
* `template`: string type, representing the template string to be parsed and compiled.

The logic of the function is as follows:

1. Use `Parser` to parse the template string and generate an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST).
2. If needed, print the generated AST to the standard error stream.
3. Use `Compiler` to compile the AST and generate bytecode.
4. If needed, print the generated bytecode to the standard error stream.
5. Return the generated bytecode and an error message (if any errors occur during the compilation process).
summary_french:
La fonction `LoadString` est un méthode d'un type `StringByteCodeLoader`. Elle a pour but de charger du code byte à partir d'un nom et d'un modèle de chaîne. Elle prend deux arguments : `name` qui est une chaîne de caractères représentant le nom du code et `template` qui est une chaîne de caractères représentant le modèle de code. 

La fonction commence par analyser le modèle de code à l'aide du parseur `l.Parser`. Si l'analyse échoue, elle retourne une erreur. Si l'option `ShouldDumpAST` est activée, l'arbre abstrait syntaxique (AST) est affiché sur la sortie d'erreur. Ensuite, la fonction compile l'AST en code byte à l'aide du compilateur `l.Compiler`. Si la compilation échoue, elle retourne une erreur. Si l'option `ShouldDumpByteCode` est activée, le code byte est affiché sur la sortie d'erreur. Enfin, la fonction retourne le code byte généré et aucune erreur.
bt_french:
Function `LoadString` is a method of type `StringByteCodeLoader`. It is used to load byte code from a name and a string template. It takes two arguments: `name` which is a string representing the name of the code and `template` which is a string representing the code template. 

The function begins by analyzing the code template using the parser `l.Parser`. If the analysis fails, it returns an error. If the option `ShouldDumpAST` is enabled, the Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) is printed to the error output. Then, the function compiles the AST into byte code using the compiler `l.Compiler`. If the compilation fails, it returns an error. If the option `ShouldDumpByteCode` is enabled, the generated byte code is printed to the error output. Finally, the function returns the generated byte code and no errors.
summary_spanish:
La función `LoadString` pertenece a un tipo llamado `StringByteCodeLoader`. Su propósito es cargar código byte a partir de un nombre y una plantilla de cadena. 

Recibe dos argumentos: `name` de tipo `string` que representa el nombre del código y `template` también de tipo `string` que contiene la plantilla del código.

Primero, utiliza un parser para analizar la plantilla de cadena y obtener un árbol de sintaxis abstracta (AST). Si hay un error durante el análisis, la función devuelve un error. Luego, si se configura para hacerlo, imprime el AST en la salida de error. 

Después, compila el AST utilizando un compilador para obtener el código byte. Si hay un error durante la compilación, la función devuelve un error. Finalmente, si se configura para hacerlo, imprime el código byte en la salida de error. 

Si todo se ejecuta correctamente, la función devuelve el código byte y un error nulo.
bt_spanish:
Function `LoadString` belongs to a type called `StringByteCodeLoader`. Its purpose is to load byte code from a name and a string template. 

It receives two arguments: `name` of type `string` which represents the name of the code and `template` also of type `string` which contains the template of the code.

First, it uses a parser to analyze the string template and obtain an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST). If there is an error during the analysis, the function returns an error. Then, if it is configured to do so, it prints the AST to the error output.

Next, it compiles the AST using a compiler to obtain the byte code. If there is an error during the compilation, the function returns an error. Finally, if it is configured to do so, it prints the byte code to the error output.

If everything runs smoothly, the function returns the byte code and a null error.
summary_portuguese:
A função `LoadString` pertence ao tipo `StringByteCodeLoader` e tem como objetivo carregar código byte a partir de uma string. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `name` (string) que representa o nome do código e `template` (string) que contém o código em si. 

A função primeiro usa o parser `l.Parser` para analisar o código, armazenando o resultado em `ast`. Se houver algum erro durante a análise, a função retorna um erro. Caso contrário, ela verifica se a opção `ShouldDumpAST` está ativada e, se estiver, imprime o AST no terminal de erro.

Em seguida, a função usa o compilador `l.Compiler` para compilar o AST em código byte, armazenando o resultado em `bc`. Novamente, se houver algum erro durante a compilação, a função retorna um erro. Caso contrário, ela verifica se a opção `ShouldDumpByteCode` está ativada e, se estiver, imprime o código byte no terminal de erro.

Por fim, a função retorna o código byte compilado e um erro nulo, indicando sucesso.
bt_portuguese:
Function `LoadString` belongs to type `StringByteCodeLoader` and is used to load byte code from a string. It takes two arguments: `name` (string) which represents the name of the code and `template` (string) which contains the code itself. 

The function first uses the parser `l.Parser` to analyze the code, storing the result in `ast`. If there is any error during the analysis, the function returns an error. Otherwise, it checks if the option `ShouldDumpAST` is enabled and, if it is, prints the AST in the error terminal.

Next, the function uses the compiler `l.Compiler` to compile the AST into byte code, storing the result in `bc`. Again, if there is any error during the compilation, the function returns an error. Otherwise, it checks if the option `ShouldDumpByteCode` is enabled and, if it is, prints the byte code in the error terminal.

Finally, the function returns the compiled byte code and a null error, indicating success.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى LoadString وتعمل على تحميل رمز بايتكود من سلسلة نصية. 

تستقبل الدالة اسم السلسلة "name" من نوع string ونموذج السلسلة "template" من نوع string. 

تستخدم الدالة مُحاكي مُفسّر (Parser) لتحليل سلسلة النص "template" وتخزين النتيجة في متغير "ast". إذا حدث خطأ أثناء التحليل، يتم إرجاع خطأ. 

إذا كان خيار "ShouldDumpAST" مفعل، يتم طباعة AST على الشاشة. 

بعد ذلك، تستخدم الدالة مُحاكي مُترجم (Compiler) لترجمة AST إلى رمز بايتكود وتخزين النتيجة في متغير "bc". إذا حدث خطأ أثناء الترجمة، يتم إرجاع خطأ. 

إذا كان خيار "ShouldDumpByteCode" مفعل، يتم طباعة رمز البايتكود على الشاشة. 

في النهاية، يتم إرجاع رمز البايتكود "bc" مع عدم وجود خطأ.
bt_arabic:
This function is called LoadString and it works on loading bytecode from a string. 

The function takes two string arguments "name" and "template". 

It uses a parser to analyze the string "template" and stores the result in a variable "ast". If there is an error during the analysis, an error is returned. 

If the option "ShouldDumpAST" is enabled, the AST is printed on the screen. 

Then, the function uses a compiler to translate the AST into bytecode and stores the result in a variable "bc". If there is an error during the translation, an error is returned. 

If the option "ShouldDumpByteCode" is enabled, the bytecode is printed on the screen. 

Finally, the bytecode "bc" is returned without any errors.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `LoadString` को परिभाषित करता है जो `StringByteCodeLoader` नामक एक प्रकार के ऑब्जेक्ट पर काम करता है।  इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य एक स्ट्रिंग टेम्पलेट से बाइनरी कोड (ByteCode) लोड करना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो मान लेता है: `name` जो एक स्ट्रिंग है और `template` जो भी एक स्ट्रिंग है। 

फ़ंक्शन पहले `Parser` नामक एक ऑब्जेक्ट का उपयोग करके स्ट्रिंग टेम्पलेट को एस्ट (AST) में पार्स करता है। अगर `ShouldDumpAST()` फ़ंक्शन सच है, तो एस्ट को स्टैंडर्ड एरर में प्रिंट करता है। फिर, `Compiler` नामक एक ऑब्जेक्ट का उपयोग करके एस्ट को बाइनरी कोड में संकलित करता है। अगर `ShouldDumpByteCode()` फ़ंक्शन सच है, तो बाइनरी कोड को स्टैंडर्ड एरर में प्रिंट करता है। अंत में, यह बाइनरी कोड और कोई त्रुटि वापस करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `LoadString` which works on an object of type `StringByteCodeLoader`. This function is used to load binary code (ByteCode) from a string template. 

This function takes two arguments: `name` which is a string and `template` which is also a string. 

First, the function uses an object of type `Parser` to parse the string template into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST). If the `ShouldDumpAST()` function is true, the AST is printed to the standard error. Then, the `Compiler` object is used to compile the AST into ByteCode. If the `ShouldDumpByteCode()` function is true, the ByteCode is printed to the standard error. Finally, the function returns the ByteCode and any error.

summary_english:
The function `tombstone` is part of a `keyIndex` struct and is designed to mark a key index as no longer valid. It takes three arguments: `lg` which is a logger, `main` and `sub` which are both integers representing some kind of identifier. 

First, it checks if the key index is empty. If it is, it panics with a message indicating an unexpected empty key index. Otherwise, it checks if the last generation of the key index is empty. If it is, it returns an error indicating that the revision was not found. If both checks pass, it updates the key index with the provided `main` and `sub` values, creates a new empty generation, decrements a `keysGauge` counter, and returns successfully.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `tombstone`，它用于标记一个 keyIndex 对象为已删除状态。 

它接受三个参数：

* `lg`：一个日志记录器，类型为 `*zap.Logger`。
* `main`：一个整数，类型为 `int64`。
* `sub`：一个整数，类型为 `int64`。

函数的逻辑如下：

首先，它检查 `keyIndex` 是否为空。如果为空，则根据日志记录器是否为空，打印一个错误信息。 

然后，它检查 `keyIndex` 的最后一个世代是否为空。如果为空，则返回 `ErrRevisionNotFound` 错误。

如果 `keyIndex` 不为空，则调用 `put` 函数将 `main` 和 `sub` 值添加到 `keyIndex` 中。

接着，它创建一个新的世代并添加到 `keyIndex` 的世代列表中。

最后，它减少 `keysGauge` 的计数器，并返回 `nil`，表示操作成功。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `tombstone` and is used to mark a keyIndex object as deleted. It takes three parameters:

* `lg` - a logger of type `*zap.Logger`
* `main` - an integer of type `int64`
* `sub` - an integer of type `int64`

The logic of the function is as follows:

First, it checks if the keyIndex is empty. If it is, it prints an error message depending on whether the logger is empty or not.

Then, it checks if the last generation of keyIndex is empty. If it is, it returns the `ErrRevisionNotFound` error.

If keyIndex is not empty, it calls the `put` function to add the `main` and `sub` values to keyIndex.

It then creates a new generation and adds it to the list of generations in keyIndex.

Finally, it decreases the `keysGauge` counter and returns `nil`, indicating that the operation was successful.
summary_french:
La fonction `tombstone` est appelée sur un objet `keyIndex` et elle sert à marquer une clé comme supprimée. Elle prend trois arguments : `lg` qui est un logger (journal), `main` et `sub` qui sont des entiers longs représentant des identifiants. 

La fonction vérifie d'abord si l'objet `keyIndex` est vide. Si c'est le cas, elle déclenche une erreur car une opération de suppression n'est pas attendue sur une clé vide. 

Ensuite, elle vérifie si la dernière génération de la clé est vide. Si c'est le cas, elle retourne une erreur indiquant que la révision n'a pas été trouvée. 

Si la clé n'est pas vide et que la dernière génération n'est pas vide, la fonction met à jour la clé avec les identifiants `main` et `sub` et ajoute une nouvelle génération vide à l'objet `keyIndex`. Enfin, elle décrémente un compteur de clés et retourne une erreur nulle, indiquant une exécution réussie.
bt_french:
Function `tombstone` is called on an object `keyIndex` and it serves to mark a key as deleted. It takes three arguments: `lg` which is a logger (journal), `main` and `sub` which are long integers representing identifiers. 

The function first checks if the object `keyIndex` is empty. If it is, it triggers an error as a deletion operation is not expected on an empty key. 

Next, it checks if the last generation of the key is empty. If it is, it returns an error indicating that the revision has not been found. 

If the key is not empty and the last generation is not empty, the function updates the key with the identifiers `main` and `sub` and adds a new empty generation to the object `keyIndex`. Finally, it decrements a key counter and returns a null error, indicating a successful execution.
summary_spanish:
La función `tombstone` pertenece a un tipo llamado `keyIndex` y su propósito es marcar una entrada como eliminada en un índice de claves. 

Recibe tres argumentos: `lg` de tipo `zap.Logger` para registrar mensajes de error, `main` de tipo `int64` y `sub` de tipo `int64`.

Primero, verifica si el índice de claves está vacío. Si lo está, genera un error y detiene la ejecución. Luego, comprueba si la última generación de entradas del índice está vacía. Si lo está, significa que no hay ninguna entrada válida para eliminar y devuelve un error `ErrRevisionNotFound`. 

Si todo está en orden, la función agrega una nueva entrada al índice con los valores `main` y `sub`, crea una nueva generación vacía y decrementa un contador de claves. Finalmente, devuelve `nil` indicando que la operación se completó correctamente.
bt_spanish:
Function `tombstone` belongs to a type called `keyIndex` and its purpose is to mark an entry as deleted in a key index. It receives three arguments: `lg` of type `zap.Logger` to log error messages, `main` of type `int64` and `sub` of type `int64`. 

First, it checks if the key index is empty. If it is, it generates an error and terminates the execution. Then, it checks if the last generation of entries in the index is empty. If it is, it means that there is no valid entry to delete and returns an error `ErrRevisionNotFound`. 

If everything is in order, the function adds a new entry to the index with the values `main` and `sub`, creates a new empty generation, and decrements a counter of keys. Finally, it returns `nil` indicating that the operation was successful.
summary_portuguese:
A função `tombstone` pertence ao tipo `keyIndex` e é responsável por marcar uma chave como excluída em um índice de chaves. Ela recebe três argumentos: `lg` (um logger do tipo `zap.Logger`), `main` (um inteiro de 64 bits) e `sub` (outro inteiro de 64 bits). 

A lógica da função primeiro verifica se o índice de chaves está vazio. Se estiver, ela gera um erro de panic, pois uma operação de tombstone não é esperada em um índice vazio. Caso contrário, ela verifica se a última geração do índice está vazia. Se estiver, significa que não há nenhuma revisão disponível para a chave, e a função retorna um erro `ErrRevisionNotFound`. 

Se a última geração não estiver vazia, a função atualiza o índice com os valores `main` e `sub` e adiciona uma nova geração vazia ao índice. Finalmente, ela decrementa um contador de chaves (`keysGauge`) e retorna um erro nil, indicando sucesso.
bt_portuguese:
Function `tombstone` belongs to type `keyIndex` and is responsible for marking a key as excluded in a key index. It takes three arguments: `lg` (a zap.Logger type), `main` (a 64-bit integer) and `sub` (another 64-bit integer). 

The logic of the function first checks if the key index is empty. If it is, it generates a panic error, as a tombstone operation is not expected in an empty index. Otherwise, it checks if the last generation of the index is empty. If it is, it means that there is no revision available for the key, and the function returns an error `ErrRevisionNotFound`. 

If the last generation is not empty, the function updates the index with the values `main` and `sub` and adds a new empty generation to the index. Finally, it decrements a key counter (`keysGauge`) and returns a nil error, indicating success.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى "tombstone" وتعمل على إزالة سجلات من مؤشر المفتاح. 

تستقبل الدالة ثلاثة أُسْباب: 

* "lg" وهو مُشير إلى مُسجل تسجيل (logger) من نوع "zap.Logger".
* "main" وهو عدد صحيح (int64) يمثل رقم رئيسي.
* "sub" وهو عدد صحيح (int64) يمثل رقم فرعي.

إذا كان المؤشر فارغًا، فإن الدالة تقوم بإخراج رسالة خطأ. وإذا كان آخر جيل في المؤشر فارغًا، فإن الدالة تعود بخطأ "RevisionNotFound". 

في حال عدم وجود هذه المشاكل، تقوم الدالة بإضافة سجل جديد إلى المؤشر، وتُعدل جيل المؤشر، وتقوم بتقليل قيمة مؤشر "keysGauge".
bt_arabic:
This function is called "tombstone" and it works on removing records from the key index. The function accepts three arguments: 

* "lg" which is a pointer to a zap.Logger object.
* "main" which is an integer (int64) representing the main number.
* "sub" which is an integer (int64) representing the sub number.

If the index is empty, the function will return an error message. If the last generation in the index is empty, the function will return a "RevisionNotFound" error. 

In case there are no errors, the function will add a new record to the index, update the index generation, and decrease the value of the "keysGauge" index.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड `tombstone` नामक एक फ़ंक्शन परिभाषित करता है जो एक `keyIndex` संरचना के लिए एक टॉम्बस्टोन ऑपरेशन करता है। इसका उद्देश्य `keyIndex` में एक नया टॉम्बस्टोन जोड़ना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन तीन आर्गुमेंट्स लेता है:

* `lg`: एक `zap.Logger` इंटरफ़ेस, जो लॉगिंग के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है। यह आर्गुमेंट वैकल्पिक है।
* `main`: एक `int64` मान, जो मुख्य रिवीजन नंबर है।
* `sub`: एक `int64` मान, जो उप-रीव्ज़न नंबर है।

फ़ंक्शन की मुख्य लॉजिक इस प्रकार है:

1. यह जांचता है कि `keyIndex` खाली है या नहीं। यदि खाली है, तो यह एक त्रुटि संदेश लॉग करता है और कार्य समाप्त हो जाता है।
2. यह जांचता है कि `keyIndex` का अंतिम जनरेशन खाली है या नहीं। यदि खाली है, तो यह `ErrRevisionNotFound` त्रुटि वापस करता है।
3. यह `keyIndex` में एक नया एंट्री जोड़ता है।
4. यह `keyIndex` के जनरेशन की सूची में एक नया जनरेशन जोड़ता है।
5. यह `keysGauge` नामक एक मीट्रिक को कम करता है।
6. अंत में, यह `nil` त्रुटि वापस करता है, जो सफलता का संकेत देता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function called `tombstone` which performs a tombstone operation for a `keyIndex` structure. Its purpose is to add a new tombstone to `keyIndex`. 

The function takes three arguments:

* `lg`: A `zap.Logger` interface, which is used for logging. This argument is optional.
* `main`: An `int64` value, which is the main revision number.
* `sub`: An `int64` value, which is the sub-revision number.

The main logic of the function is as follows:

1. It checks if `keyIndex` is empty or not. If it is empty, it logs an error message and the operation is completed.
2. It checks if the last generation of `keyIndex` is empty or not. If it is empty, it returns the `ErrRevisionNotFound` error.
3. It adds a new entry to `keyIndex`.
4. It adds a new generation to the list of generations of `keyIndex`.
5. It decreases the `keysGauge` metric.
6. Finally, it returns `nil`, which indicates success.

docstring: // RenderToFile writes the map as an encoded image to the file system.
summary_english:
The function `RenderToFile` is part of a `Map` struct and is used to render a map to a file. It takes two arguments: `opts` which is a `RenderOpts` struct containing options for rendering, and `path` which is a string representing the file path to save the rendered map. 

The function first checks the `ScaleFactor` from the `opts` struct and sets it to 1.0 if it's 0.0. Then, it converts the `path` string to a C string using `C.CString` and stores it in `cs`.  It also converts the `Format` string from `opts` to a C string, defaulting to "png256" if `Format` is empty.

The core logic of the function calls the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` C function, passing in the map object (`m.m`), the file path (`cs`), the scale (`opts.Scale`), the scale factor (`scaleFactor`), and the format (`format`). If the C function returns a non-zero value, it indicates an error, and the function returns the last error from the map object. Otherwise, it returns `nil` indicating successful rendering.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `RenderToFile`，它属于 `Map` 结构体，用于将地图渲染到文件。 

它接受两个参数：`opts` 是一个 `RenderOpts` 结构体，包含渲染选项，例如缩放比例和输出格式；`path` 是一个字符串，表示输出文件路径。

函数首先检查缩放比例，如果为 0.0，则将其设置为 1.0。然后，它将文件路径和输出格式转换为 C 字符串，并使用 `mapnik_map_render_to_file` 函数将地图渲染到指定文件。最后，它检查渲染结果，如果出现错误，则返回错误信息；否则返回 nil。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `RenderToFile` and it belongs to the `Map` structure. It is used to render a map to a file. It takes two parameters: `opts` is a `RenderOpts` structure containing rendering options such as the scale and output format; `path` is a string representing the output file path.

The function first checks the scale, if it is 0.0, it sets it to 1.0. Then it converts the file path and output format to C strings and uses the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` function to render the map to the specified file. Finally, it checks the rendering result, if there is an error, it returns the error message; otherwise, it returns nil.
summary_french:
La fonction `RenderToFile` est utilisée pour générer une image à partir d'un objet `Map` et l'enregistrer dans un fichier. Elle prend deux arguments : `opts` qui est un objet de type `RenderOpts` contenant des options de rendu, et `path` qui est une chaîne de caractères représentant le chemin d'accès du fichier de sortie. 

La fonction commence par vérifier si le facteur d'échelle `scaleFactor` est égal à 0. Si c'est le cas, il est défini à 1. Ensuite, elle convertit le chemin d'accès en une chaîne de caractères C et la libère après utilisation. 

Si le format d'image n'est pas spécifié dans `opts.Format`, la fonction utilise "png256" par défaut. Elle convertit également le format en une chaîne de caractères C et la libère après utilisation. 

Enfin, la fonction appelle la fonction `mapnik_map_render_to_file` de la bibliothèque Mapnik pour générer l'image et l'enregistrer dans le fichier spécifié. Si une erreur se produit, la fonction renvoie l'erreur la dernière erreur rencontrée. Sinon, elle renvoie `nil`.
bt_french:
Function `RenderToFile` is used to generate an image from a `Map` object and save it to a file. It takes two arguments: `opts` which is an object of type `RenderOpts` containing rendering options, and `path` which is a string representing the output file path. 

The function starts by checking if the scale factor `scaleFactor` is equal to 0. If so, it is set to 1. It then converts the path to a C string and frees it after use. 

If the image format is not specified in `opts.Format`, the function uses "png256" by default. It also converts the format to a C string and frees it after use. 

Finally, the function calls the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` function from the Mapnik library to generate the image and save it to the specified file. If an error occurs, the function returns the last error encountered. Otherwise, it returns `nil`.
summary_spanish:
La función `RenderToFile` pertenece a un tipo llamado `Map` y su propósito es renderizar un mapa a un archivo. 

Recibe dos argumentos: `opts` de tipo `RenderOpts` que contiene opciones de renderizado como el factor de escala y el formato del archivo, y `path` de tipo `string` que indica la ruta donde se guardará el archivo.

La función primero verifica si el factor de escala es 0.0, en cuyo caso lo establece en 1.0. Luego, convierte la ruta del archivo y el formato del archivo a cadenas de caracteres C.  Utiliza la función `mapnik_map_render_to_file` de la biblioteca Mapnik para renderizar el mapa en el archivo especificado. Finalmente, verifica si hubo algún error durante el proceso y devuelve un error si lo hubo, de lo contrario devuelve nil.
bt_spanish:
Function `RenderToFile` belongs to a type called `Map` and its purpose is to render a map to a file. It receives two arguments: `opts` of type `RenderOpts` which contains rendering options such as scale factor and file format, and `path` of type `string` which indicates the path where the file should be saved.

The function first checks if the scale factor is 0.0, in which case it sets it to 1.0. Then, it converts the file path and file format to C strings. It uses the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` function from the Mapnik library to render the map to the specified file. Finally, it checks if there was any error during the process and returns an error if there was, otherwise it returns nil.
summary_portuguese:
A função `RenderToFile` pertence a um tipo chamado `Map` e tem como objetivo renderizar um mapa para um arquivo. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `opts` do tipo `RenderOpts` e `path` do tipo `string`. 

A função primeiro verifica se o fator de escala `scaleFactor` é zero. Se for, ele é definido como 1.0. Em seguida, converte o caminho para um ponteiro de caracteres C e o armazena na variável `cs`.  

A função também converte o formato de saída para um ponteiro de caracteres C, usando o valor de `opts.Format` se não estiver vazio, caso contrário, usa "png256". 

Por fim, a função chama a função `mapnik_map_render_to_file` da biblioteca Mapnik para renderizar o mapa para o arquivo especificado pelo caminho. Se a função `mapnik_map_render_to_file` retornar um erro, a função retorna o último erro da biblioteca Mapnik. Caso contrário, retorna `nil`.
bt_portuguese:
Function `RenderToFile` belongs to a type called `Map` and has the purpose of rendering a map to a file. It receives two arguments: `opts` of type `RenderOpts` and `path` of type `string`. 

The function first checks if the scale factor `scaleFactor` is zero. If it is, it is set to 1.0. Then, it converts the path to a C-style pointer and stores it in the variable `cs`. 

The function also converts the output format to a C-style pointer, using the value of `opts.Format` if it is not empty, otherwise it uses "png256". 

Finally, the function calls the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` function from the Mapnik library to render the map to the specified file. If the `mapnik_map_render_to_file` function returns an error, the function returns the last error from the Mapnik library. Otherwise, it returns `nil`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى RenderToFile وتُستخدم لإنشاء صورة خريطة وتخزينها في ملف. 

تستقبل الدالة  RenderOpts  و  path  كمدخلات.  RenderOpts  هي مجموعة خيارات لإنشاء الصورة،  و path  هو اسم الملف الذي سيتم تخزين الصورة فيه.

في البداية، الدالة تحقق إذا كان معامل التكبير (scaleFactor) يساوي 0.0، وإذا كان الأمر كذلك، يتم تعيينه إلى 1.0. ثم يتم تحويل اسم الملف إلى سلسلة نصية C  و يتم تخزينها في متغير cs.  يتم أيضًا تحويل تنسيق الصورة (format) إلى سلسلة نصية C، وإذا لم يتم إعطاء تنسيق، يتم استخدام "png256" كقيمة افتراضية.

بعد ذلك، يتم استخدام دالة C  mapnik_map_render_to_file  لإنشاء الصورة وتخزينها في الملف المحدد. إذا حدث خطأ أثناء العملية، يتم إرجاع خطأ الأخير. وإلا، يتم إرجاع nil.
bt_arabic:
This function is called RenderToFile and is used to create a map image and save it to a file. It takes two inputs: RenderOpts and path. RenderOpts is a set of options for creating the image, and path is the name of the file where the image will be saved.

First, the function checks if the scale factor (scaleFactor) is equal to 0.0, and if so, it sets it to 1.0. Then, the file name is converted to a C string and stored in a variable called cs. The image format is also converted to a C string, and if no format is given, "png256" is used as the default value.

Next, the C mapnik_map_render_to_file function is used to create the image and save it to the specified file. If an error occurs, the last error is returned. Otherwise, nil is returned.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `RenderToFile` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक मानचित्र को फ़ाइल में रेंडर करता है। यह फ़ंक्शन `RenderOpts` नामक एक संरचना और एक फ़ाइल पथ स्ट्रिंग के रूप में दो मान लेता है। 

यदि `RenderOpts` में दिए गए `ScaleFactor` मान 0.0 है, तो इसे 1.0 पर सेट कर दिया जाता है। फिर यह फ़ाइल पथ और फ़ॉर्मेट को C स्ट्रिंग में परिवर्तित करता है। 

अंत में, यह `mapnik_map_render_to_file` नामक एक C फ़ंक्शन को कॉल करता है जो मानचित्र को निर्दिष्ट फ़ाइल पथ में रेंडर करता है। यदि कोई त्रुटि होती है, तो यह त्रुटि को वापस करता है; अन्यथा, यह `nil` वापस करता है।
bt_hindi: This code defines a function `RenderToFile` which renders a map to a file. It takes two arguments, a `RenderOpts` structure and a file path string. If the `ScaleFactor` in `RenderOpts` is 0.0, it is set to 1.0. Then it converts the file path and format to a C string. Finally, it calls the C function `mapnik_map_render_to_file` which renders the map to the specified file path. If there is an error, it returns the error; otherwise, it returns `nil`.

docstring:
Returns the singleton instance of this class.

This method is useless for now as all methods are static. It may be used in future if VM-global configuration will be put to the state of the instance.

# @return the singleton instance of this class.
summary_english:
This code defines a static function called `instance` within a class named `StringUtil`.  The purpose of this function is to provide a single, shared instance of the `StringUtil` class. 

It takes no arguments. 

The function first checks if a variable named `instance` is already set. If it's not, it creates a new `StringUtil` object and assigns it to the `instance` variable. Then, it returns the `instance` variable, which will either be the newly created object or the previously stored one.  This ensures that only one instance of `StringUtil` is ever created and used throughout the program.
summary_chinese:
这个代码片段定义了一个名为 `instance` 的静态方法，它用于获取 `StringUtil` 类的单例实例。 

这个方法没有参数。

它的逻辑是：首先检查 `StringUtil.instance` 是否为 null，如果为 null，则创建一个新的 `StringUtil` 实例并将其赋值给 `StringUtil.instance`，然后返回 `StringUtil.instance`。 


Essentially, this code snippet defines a static method named `instance` that is used to obtain a singleton instance of the `StringUtil` class. 

The method takes no arguments.

Its logic is as follows: first, it checks if `StringUtil.instance` is null. If it is null, a new `StringUtil` instance is created and assigned to `StringUtil.instance`, and then `StringUtil.instance` is returned.
bt_chinese:
This code snippet defines a static method named `instance` that is used to obtain a singleton instance of the `StringUtil` class. 

The method takes no arguments.

Its logic is as follows: first, it checks if `StringUtil.instance` is null. If it is null, a new `StringUtil` instance is created and assigned to `StringUtil.instance`, and then `StringUtil.instance` is returned.
summary_french:
La fonction `instance()` est un singleton qui permet d'obtenir une seule instance de la classe `StringUtil`. 

Elle ne prend aucun argument. 

Si une instance de `StringUtil` n'a pas déjà été créée, elle en crée une nouvelle et la stocke dans la variable statique `instance`. Ensuite, elle retourne l'instance de `StringUtil`, qui sera toujours la même instance, que l'on appelle la fonction `instance()` ou non.
bt_french: instance() is a singleton function that allows you to get a single instance of the StringUtil class. It does not take any arguments. If an instance of StringUtil has not already been created, it will create a new one and store it in the static variable instance. Then, it will return the instance of StringUtil, which will always be the same instance, regardless of whether the instance() function is called or not.
summary_spanish:
La función se llama `instance` y su propósito es obtener una única instancia de la clase `StringUtil`. 

Si no existe una instancia creada previamente, la función crea una nueva instancia de `StringUtil` y la guarda en la variable estática `instance`. Luego, devuelve la instancia de `StringUtil`. 

La función no recibe ningún argumento.
bt_spanish: This function is called `instance` and its purpose is to obtain a single instance of the class `StringUtil`. If no instance has been created previously, the function creates a new instance of `StringUtil` and stores it in the static variable `instance`. It then returns the instance of `StringUtil`. The function does not accept any arguments.
summary_portuguese:
A função `instance()` é um método estático que cria uma única instância da classe `StringUtil`. 

Ela verifica se uma instância já existe (`StringUtil.instance == null`). Se não existir, cria uma nova instância de `StringUtil` e a armazena na variável `StringUtil.instance`. Em seguida, retorna a instância existente ou criada. 


A função não recebe nenhum argumento.
bt_portuguese:
Function `instance()` is a static method that creates a single instance of the class `StringUtil`. It checks if an instance already exists (`StringUtil.instance == null`). If not, it creates a new instance of `StringUtil` and stores it in the variable `StringUtil.instance`. Then, it returns the existing or newly created instance. 

The function does not accept any arguments.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى "instance" وهي جزء من فئة "StringUtil".  الغرض منها هو إنشاء أو استرجاع مثال واحد فقط من فئة "StringUtil". 

الدالة لا تتقبل أي معلمات. 

تتحقق الدالة أولاً من وجود مثال من فئة "StringUtil" تم إنشاؤه من قبل. إذا لم يكن هناك مثال، يتم إنشاء مثال جديد من فئة "StringUtil" وتخزينه في المتغير "instance".  ثم يتم إرجاع المثال الذي تم إنشاؤه أو استرجاعه.
bt_arabic:
This function is called "instance" and it is part of the "StringUtil" class. Its purpose is to create or retrieve a single instance of the "StringUtil" class. 

The function does not accept any parameters. 

The function first checks if an instance of the "StringUtil" class has already been created. If not, a new instance of the "StringUtil" class is created and stored in the "instance" variable. Then, the function returns the instance that has been created or retrieved.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक स्टैटिक फ़ंक्शन `instance()` नामक है। इसका उद्देश्य `StringUtil` नामक एक क्लास का एक ही इंस्टेंस (उदाहरण) वापस करना है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन `instance` नामक एक स्थिरीकृत चर का उपयोग करता है। अगर `instance` अभी तक null है, तो यह एक नया `StringUtil` इंस्टेंस बनाता है और उसे `instance` में असाइन करता है। फिर यह `instance` को वापस करता है। 


इस प्रकार, यह फ़ंक्शन यह सुनिश्चित करता है कि `StringUtil` क्लास का केवल एक ही इंस्टेंस बनाया जाए और यह इंस्टेंस हर बार जब `instance()` फ़ंक्शन को कॉल किया जाता है, तो वापस दिया जाता है।
bt_hindi:
This code is a static function named `instance()`. Its purpose is to return a single instance of a class named `StringUtil`. 

The function uses a static variable named `instance`. If `instance` is null, it creates a new `StringUtil` instance and assigns it to `instance`. Then it returns `instance`. 

Thus, this function ensures that only one instance of the `StringUtil` class is created and that the same instance is returned every time the `instance()` function is called.

summary_english: This function, named `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer`, aims to retrieve a numerical data source from a given object. It takes one argument, `ctObjSer`, which is of type `Object`.  The function first checks if `ctObjSer` is an instance of `CTLineSer`. If it is, it casts `ctObjSer` to `CTLineSer` and returns the value of its `getVal()` method. Otherwise, it returns `null`.  Essentially, this function tries to extract a numerical data source specifically from a `CTLineSer` object.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer`，它的目的是从一个对象 `ctObjSer` 中获取一个 `CTNumDataSource` 对象。 

它接受一个参数 `ctObjSer`，类型为 `Object`。

函数的逻辑是：首先判断 `ctObjSer` 是否是 `CTLineSer` 的实例。如果是，则返回 `ctObjSer` 转换为 `CTLineSer` 对象后调用 `getVal()` 方法的结果。否则，返回 `null`。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` and its purpose is to get a `CTNumDataSource` object from an object `ctObjSer`. It accepts one argument `ctObjSer` of type `Object`. 

The logic of the function is as follows: first, it checks if `ctObjSer` is an instance of `CTLineSer`. If it is, it returns the result of calling the `getVal()` method of the `CTLineSer` object. Otherwise, it returns `null`.
summary_french:
La fonction `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` est définie comme finale et retourne une instance de `CTNumDataSource` à partir d'un objet `ctObjSer`. Elle prend un seul argument, `ctObjSer`, de type `Object`. 

La fonction vérifie si `ctObjSer` est une instance de `CTLineSer`. Si c'est le cas, elle retourne la valeur de la propriété `val` de l'objet `CTLineSer`. Sinon, elle retourne `null`.
bt_french:
Function `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` is defined as final and returns an instance of `CTNumDataSource` from an object `ctObjSer`. It takes one argument, `ctObjSer`, of type `Object`. 

The function checks if `ctObjSer` is an instance of `CTLineSer`. If it is, it returns the value of the property `val` of the object `CTLineSer`. Otherwise, it returns `null`.
summary_spanish:
La función se llama `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` y su propósito es obtener una fuente de datos numérica (CTNumDataSource) a partir de un objeto de serie (CTSer). 

Recibe un único argumento llamado `ctObjSer` de tipo `Object`. 

Si el objeto `ctObjSer` es una instancia de `CTLineSer`, la función devuelve el valor de la propiedad `val` de ese objeto. En caso contrario, devuelve `null`.
bt_spanish:
This function is called `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` and its purpose is to obtain a numerical data source (CTNumDataSource) from a series object (CTSer). 

It receives a single argument called `ctObjSer` of type `Object`. 

If the object `ctObjSer` is an instance of `CTLineSer`, the function returns the value of the property `val` of that object. Otherwise, it returns `null`.
summary_portuguese:
A função `getCTNumDataSourceFromCTSer` recebe um objeto `ctObjSer` como argumento e busca um objeto `CTNumDataSource` dentro dele. Se `ctObjSer` for um objeto do tipo `CTLineSer`, a função retorna o valor da propriedade `val` desse objeto. Caso contrário, a função retorna `null`. 


Em resumo, a função tenta extrair um `CTNumDataSource` de um objeto `ctObjSer`, retornando o valor encontrado ou `null` se não encontrar.
bt_portuguese:
