summary_french:
La fonction `WIFToPrivKey` prend en entrée une clé privée au format WIF (Wallet Import Format) et retourne la clé privée en format hexadécimal. 

Elle commence par décoder la clé WIF en utilisant la bibliothèque `bs58check` et la convertit en une chaîne hexadécimale. Ensuite, elle supprime les deux premiers caractères de la chaîne hexadécimale, qui correspondent au préfixe WIF. Si la longueur de la chaîne restante est supérieure à 64 caractères, elle est tronquée à 64 caractères. Enfin, la fonction retourne la chaîne hexadécimale représentant la clé privée. 


L'argument de la fonction est `wifPk` qui est une chaîne de caractères représentant une clé privée au format WIF.
bt_french: Function `WIFToPrivKey` takes in a private key in WIF (Wallet Import Format) and returns the private key in hexadecimal format. It begins by decoding the WIF key using the `bs58check` library and converting it to a hexadecimal string. Then, it removes the first two characters of the hexadecimal string, which corresponds to the WIF prefix. If the remaining string is longer than 64 characters, it is truncated to 64 characters. Finally, the function returns the hexadecimal string representing the private key.
summary_spanish:
La función WIFToPrivKey toma una dirección WIF como entrada y devuelve la clave privada correspondiente en formato hexadecimal. 

La función recibe un único argumento:

* wifPk: una cadena que representa una dirección WIF.

Primero, decodifica la dirección WIF del formato Base58Check a hexadecimal. Luego, elimina los dos primeros caracteres del resultado, que corresponden al prefijo de la codificación WIF. Si la longitud del resultado es mayor que 64 caracteres, se elimina la parte final hasta llegar a 64 caracteres. Finalmente, la función devuelve la clave privada en formato hexadecimal.
bt_spanish:
WIFToPrivKey takes a WIF address as input and returns the corresponding private key in hexadecimal format. 

The function takes one argument:

* wifPk: a string representing a WIF address.

First, the function decodes the WIF address from Base58Check to hexadecimal. Then, it removes the first two characters of the result, which corresponds to the WIF encoding prefix. If the result is longer than 64 characters, the function trims the end until it reaches 64 characters. Finally, the function returns the private key in hexadecimal format.
summary_portuguese:
A função `WIFToPrivKey` converte uma chave privada no formato WIF (Wallet Import Format) para uma chave privada em formato hexadecimal. Ela recebe como argumento `wifPk`, que é uma string representando a chave privada no formato WIF. 

Primeiro, a função decodifica a string `wifPk` usando o algoritmo bs58check e converte o resultado para hexadecimal. Em seguida, remove os dois primeiros caracteres da string hexadecimal, que correspondem ao prefixo do formato WIF. 

Se a string hexadecimal tiver mais de 64 caracteres, ela é truncada para 64 caracteres. Por fim, a função retorna a string hexadecimal resultante, que representa a chave privada.
bt_portuguese:
Function `WIFToPrivKey` converts a private key in WIF (Wallet Import Format) to a private key in hexadecimal format. It takes as argument `wifPk`, which is a string representing the private key in WIF format. 

First, the function decodes the string `wifPk` using the bs58check algorithm and converts the result to hexadecimal. Then, it removes the two first characters of the hexadecimal string, which corresponds to the WIF format prefix. 

If the hexadecimal string has more than 64 characters, it is truncated to 64 characters. Finally, the function returns the resulting hexadecimal string, which represents the private key.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى WIFToPrivKey وتستخدم لتحويل مفتاح خاص WIF إلى مفتاح خاص بتنسيق HEX. 

تستقبل الدالة  "wifPk"  وهو مفتاح خاص بتنسيق WIF. 

تبدأ الدالة بفك تشفير "wifPk" باستخدام  bs58check.decode  و تحويله إلى نص بتنسيق HEX.  بعد ذلك، يتم إزالة الجزء الأول من السلسلة ( '80')  لإزالة تنسيق WIF.  

إذا كان طول السلسلة أكبر من 64، يتم قصها إلى 64 حرفًا.  

في النهاية، يتم إرجاع السلسلة التي تم تعديلها والتي تمثل المفتاح الخاص بتنسيق HEX.
bt_arabic:
This function is called WIFToPrivKey and is used to convert a WIF private key to a private key in HEX format. 

The function takes in a "wifPk" which is a private key in WIF format. 

The function starts by decoding "wifPk" using bs58check.decode and converting it to a string in HEX format. Then, the first part of the string ( '80') is removed to remove the WIF format. 

If the string is longer than 64 characters, it is trimmed to 64 characters. 

Finally, the modified string is returned which represents the private key in HEX format.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `WIFToPrivKey`  परिभाषित करता है जो एक WIF (Wallet Import Format) प्राइवेट की को एक साधारण हेक्साडेसिमल स्ट्रिंग में परिवर्तित करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन एक ही प्रकार का एक आर्गुमेंट `wifPk` लेता है, जो WIF प्राइवेट की स्ट्रिंग है। 

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह पहले WIF प्राइवेट की को बीएस58चेक कोड से डिकोड करता है और इसे हेक्साडेसिमल स्ट्रिंग में परिवर्तित करता है। फिर, यह WIF प्रारूप ('80') को हटाता है और यदि आवश्यक हो तो स्ट्रिंग की लंबाई को 64 तक सीमित करता है। अंत में, यह संशोधित हेक्साडेसिमल स्ट्रिंग को वापस देता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `WIFToPrivKey` which converts a WIF (Wallet Import Format) private key to a simple hexadecimal string. 

The function takes one argument `wifPk`, which is a WIF private key string. 

The main task of the function is to decode the WIF private key from the B58check code and convert it to a hexadecimal string. Then, it removes the WIF format ('80') and if necessary, limits the string length to 64. Finally, it returns the modified hexadecimal string.

summary_english:
The function `createIfCondition` takes two arguments: `condition`, which is a string representing a JavaScript expression, and `strict`, which is a boolean.  

The function's purpose is to generate a string representing an if statement based on the provided condition and strictness setting. If `strict` is true, it simply creates a basic if statement using the condition. 

If `strict` is false, it constructs a more complex if statement that uses a try-catch block to handle potential ReferenceErrors that might occur if the condition refers to an undefined variable. In this case, it sets a temporary variable `__tmp` to false if a ReferenceError occurs, otherwise, it re-throws the error. Finally, it checks the value of `__tmp` to determine whether the if statement should be executed. 

The function returns the generated if statement string.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `createIfCondition`，它的目的是根据输入的条件表达式和严格模式，生成一个 JavaScript 代码片段，用于判断条件是否成立。

它接受两个参数：

* `condition`：一个字符串，代表需要判断的条件表达式。
* `strict`：一个布尔值，表示是否启用严格模式。

如果 `strict` 为真，则生成的代码片段是一个简单的 `if` 语句，直接使用输入的条件表达式进行判断。

如果 `strict` 为假，则生成的代码片段是一个更复杂的结构，它使用 `try...catch` 块来处理可能出现的 `ReferenceError` 异常。如果条件表达式中引用了不存在的变量，则会捕获 `ReferenceError` 异常，并将 `__tmp` 变量设置为 `false`，否则会抛出原始异常。最后，根据 `__tmp` 的值判断条件是否成立。


最终，函数返回一个字符串，包含生成的 JavaScript 代码片段。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `createIfCondition` and its purpose is to generate a JavaScript code snippet to check if the given condition is true. It takes two parameters:

* `condition` - a string representing the condition expression.
* `strict` - a boolean indicating whether to use strict mode or not.

If `strict` is true, the generated code snippet is a simple `if` statement that directly uses the given condition expression.

If `strict` is false, the generated code snippet is a more complex structure that uses a `try...catch` block to handle possible `ReferenceError` exceptions. If the condition expression references a non-existing variable, a `ReferenceError` exception will be caught and the `__tmp` variable will be set to `false`. Otherwise, the original exception will be thrown. Finally, the condition will be judged according to the value of `__tmp`.

The function returns a string containing the generated JavaScript code snippet.
summary_french:
La fonction `createIfCondition` a pour but de générer du code JavaScript conditionnel. Elle prend deux arguments : `condition`, qui est une expression JavaScript, et `strict`, un booléen qui indique si l'évaluation de la condition doit être stricte. 

Si `strict` est vrai, la fonction retourne une chaîne de caractères représentant une instruction `if` simple, utilisant l'expression `condition` directement. 

Si `strict` est faux, la fonction retourne une chaîne de caractères représentant une structure `try...catch` plus complexe. Cette structure tente d'évaluer l'expression `condition`. Si l'évaluation provoque une erreur `ReferenceError`, elle est traitée en définissant une variable `__tmp` à `false`. Dans tous les autres cas, l'erreur est relancée. Enfin, la chaîne de caractères renvoyée contient une instruction `if` utilisant la variable `__tmp` pour contrôler l'exécution du code suivant.
bt_french:
Function `createIfCondition` is used to generate JavaScript conditional code. It takes two arguments: `condition`, which is a JavaScript expression, and `strict`, a boolean indicating whether the evaluation of the condition should be strict. 

If `strict` is true, the function returns a string representing a simple `if` statement, using the expression `condition` directly. 

If `strict` is false, the function returns a string representing a more complex `try...catch` structure. This structure attempts to evaluate the expression `condition`. If the evaluation causes a `ReferenceError`, it is handled by defining a variable `__tmp` to `false`. In all other cases, the error is rethrown. Finally, the returned string contains an `if` statement using the variable `__tmp` to control the execution of the code following it.
summary_spanish:
La función se llama `createIfCondition` y su propósito es generar una expresión de condición "if" en código JavaScript. 

Toma dos argumentos: 

* `condition`: una expresión que se evaluará como verdadera o falsa. Su tipo es una cadena de texto.
* `strict`: un valor booleano que indica si se debe manejar la evaluación estricta de la condición.

La lógica principal de la función es la siguiente: si `strict` es verdadero, simplemente crea una expresión "if" con la condición proporcionada. Si `strict` es falso, crea una expresión "try-catch" para manejar posibles errores de referencia. Dentro del bloque "try", evalúa la condición y la guarda en una variable temporal. Si ocurre un error de referencia, la variable temporal se establece en falso. De lo contrario, se relanza el error. Finalmente, la expresión "if" se construye utilizando la variable temporal. 


La función devuelve una cadena de texto que representa la expresión "if" generada.
bt_spanish:
This function is called `createIfCondition` and its purpose is to generate an "if" condition expression in JavaScript code. It takes two arguments: 

* `condition`: an expression that will be evaluated as true or false. Its type is a string.
* `strict`: a boolean value indicating whether to handle the condition evaluation strictly.

The main logic of the function is as follows: if `strict` is true, simply create an "if" expression with the given condition. If `strict` is false, create a "try-catch" expression to handle possible reference errors. Inside the "try" block, evaluate the condition and store it in a temporary variable. If a reference error occurs, the temporary variable is set to false. Otherwise, the error is rethrown. Finally, the "if" expression is constructed using the temporary variable. 

The function returns a string that represents the generated "if" expression.
summary_portuguese:
A função `createIfCondition` tem como objetivo gerar uma expressão JavaScript que representa uma condição if. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `condition`, que é uma string representando a condição a ser avaliada, e `strict`, que é um boolean indicando se a condição deve ser avaliada de forma estrita. 

Se `strict` for verdadeiro, a função retorna uma string simples 'if(' + condition + ')'. Caso contrário, a função retorna uma string mais complexa que envolve um bloco try-catch para lidar com possíveis erros de referência. 

Em resumo, a função cria uma expressão if, adaptando a sua estrutura de acordo com o valor de `strict`.
bt_portuguese: Function `createIfCondition` aims to generate a JavaScript expression that represents an if condition. It takes two arguments: `condition`, which is a string representing the condition to be evaluated, and `strict`, which is a boolean indicating if the condition should be evaluated strictly. If `strict` is true, the function returns a simple string 'if(' + condition + ')'. Otherwise, the function returns a more complex string that involves a try-catch block to handle possible reference errors. In short, the function creates an if expression, adapting its structure according to the value of `strict`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى `createIfCondition` وتُستخدم لإنشاء سطر كود "if" مصغر. 

تستقبل الدالة شرطين: `condition` وهو عبارة عن سلسلة نصية تمثل الشرط، و `strict` وهو قيمة Boolean. 

إذا كان `strict` صحيحًا، فإن الدالة ستقوم بإنشاء سطر "if" بسيط. أما إذا كان `strict` خاطئًا، فستقوم بإنشاء سطر "if" مع محاولة تنفيذ الشرط في محاولة "try-catch". 

إذا حدث خطأ "ReferenceError" أثناء تنفيذ الشرط، فسيتم تعيين `__tmp` إلى `false`. وإلا، فسيتم إعادة توجيه الخطأ.  


في النهاية، ستعيد الدالة سلسلة نصية تمثل سطر "if" المصغر.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `createIfCondition` and is used to create a mini "if" code line. The function takes two parameters: `condition` which is a string representing the condition, and `strict` which is a boolean value. 

If `strict` is true, the function will create a simple "if" line. Otherwise, it will create an "if" line with a try-catch attempt. 

If a "ReferenceError" occurs while executing the condition, `__tmp` will be set to `false`. Otherwise, the error will be redirected. 

Finally, the function will return a string representing the mini "if" line.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `createIfCondition` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक शर्त और एक सख्तता स्तर के आधार पर एक if-शर्त का कोड उत्पन्न करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो मान लेता है: `condition` जो एक शर्त का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है और `strict` जो एक boolean मान है जो सख्तता स्तर को निर्धारित करता है। 

यदि `strict` सत्य है, तो यह एक साधारण `if` शर्त उत्पन्न करता है जो सीधे `condition` का उपयोग करता है। 

अगर `strict` असत्य है, तो यह एक `try-catch` ब्लॉक का उपयोग करता है जो `condition` का मूल्यांकन करता है। यदि `condition` का मूल्यांकन करने में कोई त्रुटि होती है, तो यह त्रुटि को पकड़ता है और `__tmp` को `false` सेट करता है। अन्यथा, यह `__tmp` को `condition` के मूल्य से सेट करता है। अंत में, यह `if(__tmp)` शर्त उत्पन्न करता है। 


इस प्रकार, यह फ़ंक्शन एक शर्त के आधार पर एक if-शर्त का कोड उत्पन्न करता है, और सख्तता स्तर के आधार पर त्रुटि संभालने की क्षमता प्रदान करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `createIfCondition` which generates an if-condition based on a condition and a strictness level. The function takes two arguments: `condition` which represents the condition and `strict` which is a boolean value that determines the strictness level. 

If `strict` is true, it generates a simple if-condition which uses the `condition` directly. 

If `strict` is false, it uses a try-catch block to evaluate the `condition`. If there is an error in evaluating the `condition`, it catches the error and sets `__tmp` to `false`. Otherwise, it sets `__tmp` to the value of `condition`. Finally, it generates the if-condition `if(__tmp)`. 

Thus, this function generates an if-condition based on a condition, and provides the ability to handle errors based on the strictness level.

docstring:
Import javascript depending on the *mode*. We currently support
`sprite` and `data-uri` modes (NO basic image mode).
summary_english:
This function, likely part of an Ember.js addon, sets up the integration of the Emojify library into an application. It first calls a superclass method `included` to handle standard addon initialization. Then, it determines the target object, which is either the parent addon or the application itself.  

The function imports the main Emojify JavaScript file from the addon's bower directory. If the Emojify configuration mode is set to 'sprites', it imports two sprite images (`emojify.png` and `emojify@2x.png`) and specifies a destination directory within the application for these images.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `included`，它的目的是将 Emoji 表情库集成到应用程序中。它接受两个参数：`app` 和 `parentAddon`，分别代表应用程序和父插件。

首先，它调用父类的 `included` 方法。然后，它确定目标对象，如果存在父插件，则为父插件，否则为应用程序。

接下来，它将 Emoji 表情库的 JavaScript 文件导入到目标对象中。如果 Emoji 表情库的模式是“sprites”，它还会导入 Emoji 表情的精灵图文件，并将它们保存到应用程序的 `images/sprites` 目录中。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `included` and its purpose is to integrate the Emoji library into the application. It takes two parameters: `app` and `parentAddon`, which represent the application and the parent plugin respectively.

First, it calls the parent class's `included` method. Then, it determines the target object, which is either the parent plugin or the application depending on its existence.

Next, it imports the JavaScript files of the Emoji library into the target object. If the Emoji library's mode is "sprites", it will also import the Emoji sprites image files and save them to the application's `images/sprites` directory.
summary_french:
Cette fonction, nommée sans nom, est conçue pour intégrer le module Emojify dans une application. Elle prend deux arguments : `app` qui représente l'application et `parentAddon` qui représente un add-on parent. 

La fonction commence par appeler la méthode `included` de son super-classe, puis identifie la cible d'importation, soit l'application elle-même ou l'add-on parent si celui-ci est fourni. 

Ensuite, elle importe le fichier JavaScript Emojify depuis le répertoire bower de la cible. Si le mode de configuration d'Emojify est défini sur "sprites", la fonction importe également les fichiers PNG pour les sprites Emojify, à la fois la version standard et la version à double résolution, et les place dans un répertoire nommé "images/sprites" au sein de la cible.
bt_french:
This function, unnamed, is designed to integrate the Emojify module into an application. It takes two arguments: `app` which represents the application and `parentAddon` which represents a parent add-on. 

The function begins by calling the `included` method of its super-class, then identifies the target of importation, either the application itself or the parent add-on if provided. 

Next, it imports the JavaScript file Emojify from the bower directory of the target. If the Emojify configuration mode is set to "sprites", the function also imports the PNG files for the Emojify sprites, both the standard version and the high-resolution version, and places them in a directory named "images/sprites" within the target.
summary_spanish:
Esta función se llama al incluir un addon y se encarga de integrar el componente Emojify en la aplicación. 

Recibe dos argumentos: `app` que representa la aplicación principal y `parentAddon` que representa el addon padre, si existe.

Primero, llama a un método `included` de su superclase para inicializar el addon. Luego, determina el objeto objetivo, que será la aplicación o el addon padre, dependiendo de si `parentAddon` está definido.

A continuación, importa el archivo principal de Emojify desde su directorio bower. Si la configuración de Emojify (`_emojiConfig.mode`) está en modo "sprites", importa también los archivos de sprites para Emojify, especificando la ruta dentro del directorio bower y la carpeta de destino dentro de la aplicación.
bt_spanish:
This function is called when including an addon and is responsible for integrating the Emojify component into the application. It receives two arguments: `app` which represents the main application and `parentAddon` which represents the parent addon, if it exists.

First, it calls the `included` method of its superclass to initialize the addon. Then, it determines the target object, which will be the application or the parent addon depending on if `parentAddon` is defined.

Next, it imports the main Emojify file from its bower directory. If Emojify's configuration mode (`_emojiConfig.mode`) is set to "sprites", it also imports the sprites files for Emojify, specifying the path inside the bower directory and the destination folder inside the application.
summary_portuguese:
A função, que não possui nome explícito, tem como objetivo integrar o plugin Emojify em um aplicativo. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `app` e `parentAddon`, ambos do tipo objeto. 

A função primeiro chama o método `included` do superclasse, provavelmente para inicializar o addon. Em seguida, define a variável `target` como sendo o `parentAddon` ou o próprio `app`, dependendo do contexto. 

A função então importa o arquivo principal do Emojify (`emojify.js`) do diretório `bower` do `target`. 

Se a configuração do Emojify (`_emojiConfig.mode`) for 'sprites', a função importa também os arquivos de sprites (`emojify.png` e `emojify@2x.png`) do diretório `bower` e os salva na pasta `images/sprites` do `target`.
bt_portuguese:
This function, which does not have an explicit name, aims to integrate the Emojify plugin into an application. It takes two arguments: `app` and `parentAddon`, both of type object. 

The function first calls the `included` method of the superclass, likely to initialize the addon. It then defines the variable `target` as either the `parentAddon` or the `app`, depending on the context. 

The function then imports the main file of Emojify (`emojify.js`) from the `bower` directory of the `target`. 

If the Emojify configuration (`_emojiConfig.mode`) is 'sprites', the function also imports the sprite files (`emojify.png` and `emojify@2x.png`) from the `bower` directory and saves them in the `images/sprites` directory of the `target`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تُدعى بشكل افتراضي، وتُستخدم لدمج مكتبة emojify في تطبيق. 

تستقبل الوظيفة اثنين من المدخلات: "app" وهو التطبيق نفسه و "parentAddon" وهو إضافة موجودة داخل التطبيق. 

تُحدد الوظيفة "target"  بحيث يكون إما "parentAddon" أو "app"  حسب ما إذا كانت الإضافة موجودة أم لا. 

ثم تقوم الوظيفة باستيراد ملف JavaScript الخاص بـ emojify من مجلد bower. 

إذا كان وضع emojify هو "sprites" ، فستقوم الوظيفة باستيراد ملفات PNG الخاصة بـ emojify sprites من مجلد bower  و تخزينها في مجلد "images/sprites" داخل التطبيق.
bt_arabic:
This function is called by default and is used to integrate the emojify library into an application. 

The function takes two inputs: "app" which is the application itself and "parentAddon" which is an add-on existing inside the application. 

The function then sets the "target" to either "parentAddon" or "app" depending on whether the add-on exists or not. 

The function then imports the JavaScript file of emojify from the bower directory. 

If the emojify mode is "sprites", the function will also import the PNG files of emojify sprites from the bower directory and save them in the "images/sprites" directory inside the application.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन है जो किसी एप्लिकेशन में Emoji का समर्थन करने के लिए आवश्यक फ़ाइलों को आयात करता है। यह फ़ंक्शन दो एर्ग्यूमेंट्स लेता है: `app` जो एप्लिकेशन का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है और `parentAddon` जो एक पेरेंट एडॉन का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन सबसे पहले `emojify.js` फ़ाइल को आयात करता है जो Emoji को बदलने के लिए जिम्मेदार है। अगर `_emojiConfig.mode` 'sprites' है, तो यह `emojify.png` और `emojify@2x.png` फ़ाइलों को भी आयात करता है जो Emoji को स्प्राइट्स के रूप में प्रदर्शित करने के लिए उपयोग किए जाते हैं।
bt_hindi:
This code is a function that imports the necessary files to support Emoji in an application. It takes two arguments: `app` which represents the application and `parentAddon` which represents a parent addon. 

The function first imports the `emojify.js` file which is responsible for converting the Emoji. If `_emojiConfig.mode` is 'sprites', it also imports the `emojify.png` and `emojify@2x.png` files which are used to display the Emoji as sprites.

summary_english:
This code defines a function called `AstNode` that creates a node for an abstract syntax tree.  

The function takes two arguments: `type` which is a string representing the type of the node, and `token` which is an object representing a token in the source code.

The `AstNode` object has several methods: `getType`, `getToken`, `getChildren`, `setToken`, `isLeaf`, `addChild`, and `print`. 

`getType`, `getToken`, and `getChildren` return the type, token, and children of the node respectively. `setToken` allows you to change the token associated with the node. `isLeaf` checks if the node is a leaf node (has no children). `addChild` adds a child node to the current node. `print` recursively prints the structure of the node and its children, indented based on the depth in the tree.
summary_chinese:
这个代码定义了一个名为 `AstNode` 的函数，它用来创建抽象语法树（AST）节点。 

这个函数接受两个参数：`type` 和 `token`，分别代表节点的类型和对应的源代码令牌。

`AstNode` 对象提供了以下功能：

* `getType()`：返回节点的类型。
* `getToken()`：返回节点对应的源代码令牌。
* `getChildren()`：返回节点的子节点列表。
* `setToken()`：设置节点对应的源代码令牌。
* `isLeaf()`：判断节点是否为叶子节点（没有子节点）。
* `addChild()`：添加子节点到节点列表中。
* `print()`：打印节点及其子节点的结构，缩进表示层次关系。
bt_chinese:
This code defines a function named `AstNode` which is used to create Abstract Syntax Trees (AST) nodes. The function takes two parameters: `type` and `token`, which represent the type of the node and the corresponding source code token respectively.

The `AstNode` object provides the following functions:

* `getType()`: Returns the type of the node.
* `getToken()`: Returns the token corresponding to the node.
* `getChildren()`: Returns the list of child nodes of the node.
* `setToken()`: Sets the token corresponding to the node.
* `isLeaf()`: Checks if the node is a leaf node (i.e. has no child nodes).
* `addChild()`: Adds a child node to the list of child nodes of the node.
* `print()`: Prints the structure of the node and its child nodes, with indentation representing the hierarchy.
summary_french:
La fonction `AstNode` représente un nœud dans un arbre syntaxique abstrait. Elle permet de stocker le type du nœud, le jeton associé, une liste de nœuds enfants et des méthodes pour accéder et modifier ces informations. 

Elle prend deux arguments : `type` qui est une chaîne de caractères représentant le type du nœud, et `token` qui est un objet représentant le jeton associé au nœud.

La logique principale de la fonction consiste à définir les propriétés et méthodes nécessaires pour construire et manipuler un nœud dans l'arbre syntaxique. Elle permet de récupérer le type, le jeton et les enfants du nœud, d'ajouter un enfant au nœud, de vérifier si le nœud est une feuille (sans enfants) et d'afficher le nœud et ses enfants de manière indentée.
bt_french:
Class AstNode represents a node in an abstract syntax tree. It stores the type of the node, the associated token, a list of child nodes, and methods to access and modify this information. It takes two arguments: type which is a string representing the type of the node, and token which is an object representing the token associated with the node.

The main logic of the class consists of defining the properties and methods necessary to construct and manipulate a node in the syntax tree. It allows to retrieve the type, token and children of the node, add a child to the node, check if the node is a leaf (no children), and display the node and its children in an indented manner.
summary_spanish:
La función `AstNode` es un constructor que crea nodos para un árbol de análisis sintáctico (AST). 

Recibe dos argumentos: `type` de tipo string que define el tipo del nodo, y `token` que puede ser un objeto o nulo, representando un token del análisis léxico.

El código define varias funciones dentro de la clase `AstNode`:

* `getType`: Devuelve el tipo del nodo.
* `getToken`: Devuelve el token asociado al nodo.
* `getChildren`: Devuelve una lista de los hijos del nodo.
* `setToken`: Permite modificar el token asociado al nodo.
* `isLeaf`: Indica si el nodo es una hoja (no tiene hijos).
* `addChild`: Agrega un nuevo nodo como hijo del nodo actual.
* `print`: Imprime el árbol de forma recursiva, mostrando el tipo del nodo, su token (si lo tiene) y sus hijos.


En resumen, la función `AstNode` proporciona una estructura básica para representar nodos en un árbol de análisis sintáctico, permitiendo almacenar información sobre el tipo del nodo, el token asociado, sus hijos y métodos para manipular la estructura del árbol.
bt_spanish:
Function `AstNode` is a constructor that creates nodes for a syntactic analysis tree (AST). It takes two arguments: `type` of type string that defines the type of the node, and `token` which can be an object or null, representing a lexical analysis token. The code defines several functions within the `AstNode` class:

* `getType`: Returns the type of the node.
* `getToken`: Returns the token associated with the node.
* `getChildren`: Returns a list of the node's children.
* `setToken`: Allows the token associated with the node to be modified.
* `isLeaf`: Indicates if the node is a leaf (no children).
* `addChild`: Adds a new node as a child of the current node.
* `print`: Prints the tree recursively, showing the type of the node, its token (if it has one) and its children.
summary_portuguese:
A função `AstNode` é um construtor que cria nós para uma árvore de análise sintática (AST). Ela recebe dois argumentos: `type`, que define o tipo do nó, e `token`, que é um token associado ao nó. 

A função define várias funções para manipular o nó: `getType` retorna o tipo do nó, `getToken` retorna o token associado, `getChildren` retorna a lista de filhos do nó, `setToken` define um novo token para o nó, `isLeaf` verifica se o nó é uma folha (sem filhos), `addChild` adiciona um filho ao nó e `print` imprime a estrutura da árvore de forma recursiva.
bt_portuguese:
Function `AstNode` is a constructor that creates nodes for a syntactic analysis tree (AST). It takes two arguments: `type`, which defines the type of the node, and `token`, which is a token associated to the node. 

The function defines several functions to manipulate the node: `getType` returns the type of the node, `getToken` returns the token associated, `getChildren` returns the list of children of the node, `setToken` defines a new token for the node, `isLeaf` checks if the node is a leaf (no children), `addChild` adds a child to the node and `print` prints the tree structure recursively.
summary_arabic:
هذه الكودية تعريفة لـ "AstNode" وهي فئة تمثل عقدة في تمثيل جذرية لبرنامج. 

تستقبل هذه الفئة نوعين من المدخلات: "type" وهو نوع العقدة و "token" وهو رمز مرتبطة بالعقدة. 

تحتوي الفئة على عدة وظائف:

bt_arabic:

summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक `AstNode` नामक फ़ंक्शन परिभाषित करता है जो एक एबस्ट्रेक्ट सिंटैक्स ट्री (AST) के नोड का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन दो प्रकार के मानों को लेता है: `type` जो नोड के प्रकार को दर्शाता है और `token` जो नोड से जुड़े टोकन को दर्शाता है। 

`AstNode` ऑब्जेक्ट में `getType`, `getToken`, `getChildren`, `setToken`, `isLeaf`, `addChild` और `print` जैसे कई तरीके होते हैं। `getType` और `getToken` क्रमशः नोड के प्रकार और टोकन को वापस करते हैं। `getChildren` नोड के बच्चों की एक सूची वापस करता है। `setToken` टोकन को बदलने का उपयोग करता है। `isLeaf` यह बताता है कि नोड एक लीव नोड है या नहीं। `addChild` एक बच्चे नोड को जोड़ता है। `print` नोड और उसके बच्चों को एक निश्चित स्तर पर प्रिंट करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function named `AstNode` which represents an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) node. The function takes two parameters: `type` which represents the type of the node and `token` which represents the token associated with the node. 

The `AstNode` object has several methods such as `getType`, `getToken`, `getChildren`, `setToken`, `isLeaf`, `addChild` and `print`. `getType` and `getToken` return the type and token of the node respectively. `getChildren` returns a list of the node's children. `setToken` is used to change the token. `isLeaf` determines if the node is a leaf node. `addChild` adds a child node. `print` prints the node and its children at a certain level.

summary_english:
The function `initData` takes two arguments: `tx` which is an object likely representing a transaction, and `data` which can be a string, buffer, or object. Its purpose is to initialize the transaction object `tx` with data provided in `data`. 

If `data` is a string, it's converted to a buffer. If it's a buffer, it's decoded using the `rlp` library. 

If `data` is an array, it assumes each element corresponds to a field in the transaction and converts them to buffers. If `data` is an object, it iterates through the fields of the transaction and sets the corresponding values from the `data` object. It also handles special cases for fields like "gasLimit", "gas", "data", and "input". Finally, it sets the `chainId` value of the transaction from the `data` object if it's present. If none of these cases match, it throws an error.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `initData`，它的目的是初始化一个交易对象 `tx`。它接受两个参数：`tx` 是一个交易对象，`data` 是一个包含交易数据的对象或字符串。

如果 `data` 不为空，函数会首先判断 `data` 的类型。如果 `data` 是字符串，则将其转换为 Buffer 对象。如果 `data` 已经是 Buffer 对象，则将其解码为 RLP 格式的数据。

然后，函数会根据 `data` 的类型进行不同的处理：

* 如果 `data` 是一个数组，则会检查数组长度是否大于交易对象的字段数，如果大于则抛出错误。然后，函数会将数组中的每个元素转换为 Buffer 对象，并赋值给相应的交易对象字段。
* 如果 `data` 是一个对象，则会遍历对象的键值对，并将键值对赋值给相应的交易对象字段。同时，函数还会处理一些特殊的字段，例如 `gasLimit` 和 `data`，将它们的值从 `data` 对象中提取出来。最后，如果 `data` 对象包含 `chainId` 字段，并且交易对象没有设置 `chainId` 值，则会将 `chainId` 值赋值给交易对象的 `chainId` 字段。
* 如果 `data` 的类型不是数组或对象，则会抛出错误。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `initData` and its purpose is to initialize a transaction object `tx`. It accepts two parameters: `tx` is a transaction object and `data` is an object or string containing transaction data. 

If `data` is not empty, the function will first check the type of `data`. If `data` is a string, it will be converted to a Buffer object. If `data` is already a Buffer object, it will be decoded into RLP format data.

Then, the function will handle `data` differently depending on its type:

* If `data` is an array, it will check if the array length is greater than the number of fields in the transaction object. If it is, then an error will be thrown. The function will then convert each element in the array to a Buffer object and assign it to the corresponding field in the transaction object.

* If `data` is an object, it will iterate through the object's key-value pairs and assign them to the corresponding fields in the transaction object. Additionally, the function will handle some special fields, such as `gasLimit` and `data`, by extracting their values from the `data` object. Finally, if the `data` object contains a `chainId` field and the transaction object does not have a `chainId` value, then the `chainId` value will be assigned to the transaction object's `chainId` field.

* If `data` is not an array or object, then an error will be thrown.
summary_french:
La fonction `initData` prend deux arguments : `tx` et `data`.  `tx` est un objet représentant une transaction Ethereum, et `data` contient les données de la transaction. 

La fonction vérifie le type de `data`. Si c'est une chaîne de caractères, elle la convertit en buffer. Si c'est déjà un buffer, elle le décode en utilisant le format RLP. 

Ensuite, la fonction vérifie si `data` est un tableau ou un objet. Si c'est un tableau, elle vérifie que le nombre d'éléments correspond au nombre de champs de la transaction. Ensuite, elle convertit chaque élément du tableau en buffer et les assigne aux champs correspondants de l'objet `tx`. 

Si `data` est un objet, la fonction parcourt les champs de l'objet `tx` et les assigne les valeurs correspondantes de l'objet `data`. Elle gère également les cas spéciaux pour les champs "gasLimit", "gas" et "data". Enfin, elle vérifie si `data` contient une valeur `chainId` et l'assigne au champ `chainId` de l'objet `tx` si ce dernier n'est pas déjà défini. 

Si le type de `data` est invalide, la fonction lance une erreur.
bt_french:
Function initData takes two arguments: tx and data. tx is an Ethereum transaction object, and data contains the transaction data. The function checks the type of data. If it is a string, it is converted to a buffer. If it is already a buffer, it is decoded using the RLP format.

The function then checks if data is an array or an object. If it is an array, it checks that the number of elements corresponds to the number of fields in the transaction. It then converts each element of the array to a buffer and assigns it to the corresponding field of the tx object.

If data is an object, the function loops through the fields of the tx object and assigns the corresponding values from the data object. It also handles special cases for the "gasLimit", "gas" and "data" fields. Finally, it checks if data contains a value "chainId" and assigns it to the "chainId" field of the tx object if it is not already defined.

If the type of data is invalid, the function throws an error.
summary_spanish:
La función `initData` toma dos argumentos: `tx` y `data`. Su propósito es inicializar los datos de una transacción (`tx`) utilizando la información proporcionada en `data`. 

El argumento `tx` es un objeto que representa la transacción y `data` puede ser una cadena, un buffer o un objeto. 

Si `data` es una cadena, se convierte a un buffer. Si es un buffer, se decodifica utilizando el algoritmo RLP. Luego, la función verifica el tipo de `data`. Si es un array, se asume que contiene los valores para cada campo de la transacción. Si es un objeto, se asignan los valores de los campos del objeto a los campos correspondientes de la transacción. 

La función también maneja casos especiales para los campos "gasLimit", "data" y "chainId". Finalmente, si `data` no es ninguno de los tipos esperados, se lanza un error.
bt_spanish:
Function initData takes two arguments: tx and data. Its purpose is to initialize the data of a transaction (tx) using the information provided in data. 

The argument tx is an object that represents the transaction and data can be a string, a buffer or an object. 

If data is a string, it is converted to a buffer. If it is a buffer, it is decoded using the RLP algorithm. Then, the function verifies the type of data. If it is an array, it is assumed to contain the values for each field of the transaction. If it is an object, the values of the fields of the object are assigned to the corresponding fields of the transaction. 

The function also handles special cases for the fields "gasLimit", "data" and "chainId". Finally, if data is not any of the expected types, an error is thrown.
summary_portuguese:
A função `initData` recebe dois argumentos: `tx` e `data`. O propósito da função é inicializar os dados de uma transação, `tx`, com base nos dados fornecidos em `data`. 

O argumento `tx` é um objeto que representa a transação e provavelmente possui propriedades para armazenar os dados da transação. O argumento `data` pode ser uma string, um buffer ou um objeto. 

A função primeiro verifica se `data` é fornecido. Se sim, ela verifica o tipo de `data` e converte-o para um formato adequado. Se `data` for uma string, ela é convertida para um buffer. Se `data` for um buffer, ela é decodificada usando o algoritmo RLP.

Em seguida, a função verifica se `data` é um array ou um objeto. Se `data` for um array, ela assume que cada elemento do array representa um campo da transação e converte cada elemento para um buffer antes de atribuí-lo à propriedade correspondente em `tx`. Se `data` for um objeto, a função itera sobre as propriedades do objeto e atribui cada propriedade ao campo correspondente em `tx`. 

A função também verifica se `data` contém informações sobre a cadeia de blocos e, se sim, atribui esse valor à propriedade `chainId` de `tx`.

Finalmente, se `data` não for nenhum dos tipos esperados, a função lança um erro.
bt_portuguese:
Function initData takes two arguments: tx and data. The purpose of the function is to initialize the data of a transaction, tx, based on the data provided in data. 

The argument tx is an object that represents the transaction and likely has properties to store the transaction data. The argument data can be a string, a buffer, or an object. 

The function first checks if data is provided. If yes, it checks the type of data and converts it to an appropriate format. If data is a string, it is converted to a buffer. If data is a buffer, it is decoded using the RLP algorithm.

Next, the function checks if data is an array or an object. If data is an array, it assumes that each element of the array represents a field of the transaction and converts each element to a buffer before assigning it to the corresponding property in tx. If data is an object, the function iterates over the properties of the object and assigns each property to the corresponding field in tx.

The function also checks if data contains information about the blockchain and, if yes, assigns that value to the property chainId of tx.

Finally, if data is not any of the expected types, the function throws an error.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى `initData` وتستخدم لتعيين بيانات في محاولة إرسال معاملة. 

تستقبل الدالة `tx` وهو تمثيل للمعاملة، و `data` وهو بيانات إضافية لتعيينها في المعاملة. 

إذا كانت `data` موجودة، فإن الدالة تقوم بتحويلها إلى شكل مناسب. إذا كانت سلسلة نصية، يتم تحويلها إلى Buffer. وإذا كانت Buffer، يتم فك تشفيرها باستخدام `rlp.decode`. 

ثم، تقوم الدالة بفحص نوع `data`. إذا كانت قائمة، يتم التحقق من أن عدد العناصر في القائمة لا يتجاوز عدد حقول المعاملة. يتم بعد ذلك تحويل كل عنصر في القائمة إلى Buffer وتعيينه في الحقل المناسب في المعاملة. 

إذا كانت `data` كائن، يتم فحص المفاتيح في الكائن. يتم تعيين القيمة في الحقل المناسب في المعاملة إذا وجدت المفتاح في الكائن. 

يتم أيضًا معالجة الحقول الخاصة "gasLimit" و "data" بشكل خاص. 

إذا لم يتم تعيين `chainId` في المعاملة، يتم محاولة استخراجه من `data.chainId`. 

إذا كان نوع `data` غير صحيح، يتم إلقاء خطأ.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `initData` and is used to set data in a transaction attempt. The function accepts `tx` which is a representation of the transaction, and `data` which is additional data to be set in the transaction. 

If `data` is present, it is converted to a suitable form. If it is a string, it is converted to a Buffer. If it is a Buffer, it is decoded using `rlp.decode`. 

The function then checks the type of `data`. If it is a list, it checks that the number of elements in the list does not exceed the number of fields in the transaction. Each element in the list is then converted to a Buffer and set in the corresponding field in the transaction. 

If `data` is an object, the keys in the object are checked. The value is set in the corresponding field in the transaction if the key is found in the object. 

The fields "gasLimit" and "data" are also handled specially. 

If `chainId` is not set in the transaction, it is attempted to be retrieved from `data.chainId`. 

If the type of `data` is invalid, an error is thrown.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड `initData` नामक एक फ़ंक्शन है जो एक ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट (`tx`) और कुछ डेटा (`data`) को इनपुट लेता है। इसका उद्देश्य ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट को दिए गए डेटा से इनपुट करके उसे तैयार करना है। 

`tx` एक ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट है, और `data` ट्रांज़ैक्शन के लिए आवश्यक जानकारी हो सकती है, जो स्ट्रिंग, बफर या ऑब्जेक्ट के रूप में हो सकती है। 

फ़ंक्शन पहले यह जांचता है कि `data` मौजूद है या नहीं। अगर मौजूद है, तो यह `data` के प्रकार के आधार पर उसे संसाधित करता है। अगर `data` एक स्ट्रिंग है, तो उसे बफर में परिवर्तित किया जाता है। अगर `data` पहले से ही एक बफर है, तो उसे `rlp` (recursive length prefix) कोड से डिकोड किया जाता है। 

अगर `data` एक एरे है, तो यह एरे के प्रत्येक आइटम को ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट के संबंधित फ़ील्ड में बफर में परिवर्तित करता है। अगर `data` एक ऑब्जेक्ट है, तो यह ऑब्जेक्ट के की-वैल्यू जोड़े को ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट के फ़ील्ड में सेट करता है। कुछ विशेष फ़ील्डों के लिए, जैसे `gasLimit`, `gas` और `data`, यह डेटा को सही फ़ील्ड में सेट करने के लिए अतिरिक्त चेक करता है। अंत में, अगर `data` में `chainId` मौजूद है और ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट में `chainId` पहले से सेट नहीं है, तो `chainId` को ट्रांज़ैक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट में सेट किया जाता है। 

अगर `data` इनमें से कोई भी प्रकार नहीं है, तो फ़ंक्शन एक त्रुटि उत्पन्न करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code is an implementation of the initData function which takes a transaction object (tx) and some data (data) as input. Its purpose is to prepare the transaction object with the given data. 

The tx is a transaction object, and data can be any type of information, such as a string, buffer, or object. The function first checks if data exists. If it does, it processes the data depending on its type. If data is a string, it is converted to a buffer. If data is already a buffer, it is decoded using rlp (recursive length prefix) code. 

If data is an array, each item of the array is converted to the corresponding field of the transaction object. If data is an object, the key-value pairs of the object are set to the fields of the transaction object. For some special fields, such as gasLimit, gas, and data, the function performs additional checks to set the data correctly. 

If data is not any of the above types, the function throws an error.

docstring: Given offset of a keyword after decompression, return a record block info containing it, else undefined if not found.
summary_english:
This function, likely named something like "findBlock", searches for a specific key within a sorted array.  It takes a single argument, `keyAt`, which represents the value to search for. 

The function uses a binary search algorithm to efficiently locate the block containing the `keyAt` value. It initializes variables `hi` and `lo` to define the search range within the array.  The `i` variable keeps track of the middle index during each iteration.

The function first checks if the `keyAt` is outside the valid range of the array. If so, it returns without finding a match.

The core logic is a `while` loop that repeatedly narrows the search range. In each iteration, it compares the `keyAt` with the value at the middle index (`val`). If `keyAt` is less than `val`, the search range is updated to the left half; otherwise, it's updated to the right half.  

The loop continues until the search range is reduced to a single element or less. If a match is found, the function returns an object containing information about the block, such as its index, compressed and decompressed offsets, and sizes. If no match is found, it returns nothing.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `function(keyAt)`, 它用于在二分查找树中查找指定 `keyAt` 对应的块信息。

它接受一个参数 `keyAt`，类型为数字。

函数首先计算出二分查找树的左右边界 `hi` 和 `lo`，并初始化中间索引 `i`。然后，它检查 `keyAt` 是否在树的有效范围内。如果不在，则返回。

接下来，函数进入一个无限循环，不断缩小搜索范围。在循环中，它比较 `keyAt` 与中间节点的值 `val`，并根据比较结果更新 `hi` 或 `lo`。同时，它更新中间索引 `i`。

循环继续执行，直到搜索范围缩小到只剩下一个或两个节点。此时，函数根据节点的索引返回相应的块信息，包括块号、压缩偏移量、压缩大小、解压缩偏移量和解压缩大小。如果 `keyAt` 不在树中，则函数返回 `null`。
bt_chinese:
This function is named `function(keyAt)`, and it is used to find the corresponding block information of the specified `keyAt` in a binary search tree. It accepts one parameter `keyAt`, which is of type number.

The function first calculates the left and right boundaries of the binary search tree, `hi` and `lo`, and initializes the middle index `i`. Then, it checks if `keyAt` is within the valid range of the tree. If not, it returns.

Next, the function enters an infinite loop, continuously narrowing the search range. In the loop, it compares `keyAt` with the middle node's value `val`, and updates `hi` or `lo` according to the comparison result. It also updates the middle index `i`.

The loop continues until the search range is reduced to one or two nodes. At this point, the function returns the corresponding block information, including block number, compression offset, compression size, decompression offset and decompression size. If `keyAt` is not found in the tree, the function returns `null`.
summary_french:
Cette fonction, nommée sans nom, effectue une recherche binaire dans un tableau nommé "arr" pour trouver l'emplacement d'un élément donné par l'argument "keyAt". 

Elle prend un seul argument :

* "keyAt" : un nombre représentant la valeur à rechercher.

La fonction utilise une boucle while pour effectuer la recherche binaire. Elle initialise des indices "hi" et "lo" pour définir la plage de recherche dans le tableau. Elle calcule ensuite un indice "i" au milieu de cette plage et compare la valeur à cet indice avec "keyAt". Si "keyAt" est inférieur à la valeur à l'indice "i", la recherche se poursuit dans la moitié gauche du tableau. Sinon, elle se poursuit dans la moitié droite. 

La boucle continue jusqu'à ce que la plage de recherche ne contienne plus que deux éléments. Dans ce cas, la fonction vérifie si l'indice "i" est inférieur à "hi" et retourne un objet contenant des informations sur l'élément trouvé, sinon elle retourne rien.
bt_french:
This function, named unnamed, performs a binary search in an array named "arr" to find the location of an element given by the argument "keyAt". 

It takes one argument:

* "keyAt": a number representing the value to search for.

The function uses a while loop to perform the binary search. It initializes indices "hi" and "lo" to define the search range in the array. It then calculates an index "i" in the middle of the range and compares the value at that index with "keyAt". If "keyAt" is less than the value at index "i", the search continues in the left half of the array. Otherwise, it continues in the right half.

The loop continues until the search range contains only two elements. In this case, the function checks if index "i" is less than "hi" and returns an object containing information about the element found, otherwise it returns nothing.
summary_spanish:
La función busca un elemento específico dentro de un arreglo ordenado.  

Se llama `function(keyAt)` y toma un argumento llamado `keyAt` de tipo número, que representa el valor que se busca. 

La función utiliza un algoritmo de búsqueda binaria para encontrar la posición del elemento en el arreglo. Primero, define los índices inicial y final del rango de búsqueda. Luego, itera mientras el rango de búsqueda no se reduzca a un solo elemento. En cada iteración, compara el valor medio del rango con `keyAt` y ajusta el rango de búsqueda en consecuencia. 

Si encuentra el elemento, devuelve un objeto con información sobre su posición y tamaño en el arreglo. Si no encuentra el elemento, devuelve `null`.
bt_spanish:
This function searches for a specific element in an ordered array. It is called `function(keyAt)` and takes an argument called `keyAt` of type number, which represents the value to be searched for. 

The function uses a binary search algorithm to find the position of the element in the array. First, it defines the initial and final indices of the search range. Then, it iterates while the search range is not reduced to a single element. In each iteration, it compares the middle value of the range with `keyAt` and adjusts the search range accordingly. 

If the element is found, it returns an object with information about its position and size in the array. If the element is not found, it returns `null`.
summary_portuguese:
A função busca um elemento específico em um array ordenado e retorna informações sobre o bloco onde ele se encontra. 

Ela recebe um argumento chamado `keyAt` que representa o valor a ser buscado.

A lógica da função é a seguinte:

1. Inicializa variáveis para definir o início e o fim da busca, além de um índice intermediário.
2. Verifica se o valor a ser buscado está dentro do intervalo válido do array. Se não estiver, a função retorna.
3. Entra em um loop que continua até encontrar o elemento ou chegar ao final do array.
4. No loop, compara o valor a ser buscado com o valor no índice intermediário.
5. Se o valor a ser buscado for menor que o valor no índice intermediário, a busca é restrita à metade esquerda do array. Caso contrário, a busca é restrita à metade direita.
6. O índice intermediário é atualizado e o processo é repetido até encontrar o elemento ou o intervalo de busca se reduzir a apenas um elemento.
7. Se o elemento for encontrado, a função retorna um objeto contendo informações sobre o bloco onde ele se encontra, como o número do bloco, o offset de compressão e de descompressão, e os tamanhos da compressão e descompressão. Caso contrário, a função retorna.
bt_portuguese:
This function searches for a specific element in a sorted array and returns information about the block where it is located. It takes an argument called `keyAt` which represents the value to be searched for.

The logic of the function is as follows:

1. Initialize variables to define the start and end of the search, as well as an intermediate index.
2. Check if the value to be searched for is within the valid range of the array. If not, the function returns.
3. Enter a loop that continues until the element is found or the end of the array is reached.
4. In the loop, compare the value to be searched for with the value at the intermediate index.
5. If the value to be searched for is smaller than the value at the intermediate index, the search is restricted to the left half of the array. Otherwise, the search is restricted to the right half.
6. The intermediate index is updated and the process is repeated until the element is found or the search interval is reduced to only one element.
7. If the element is found, the function returns an object containing information about the block where it is located, such as the block number, compression and decompression offsets, and compression and decompression sizes. Otherwise, the function returns.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تُسمى `function(keyAt)` وتُستخدم للبحث عن موقع معين في مجموعة من البيانات المُرتبة. 

تستقبل الدالة `keyAt` كمدخل، وهو القيمة التي نريد العثور عليها. 

تُستخدم الدالة `arr` التي يُفترض أنها مجموعة من البيانات المُرتبة. 

الدالة تعمل عن طريق تقسيم مجموعة البيانات إلى قسمين متساويين، ثم مقارنة `keyAt` بالقيمة في المنتصف. إذا كانت `keyAt` أصغر من القيمة في المنتصف، يتم البحث في النصف الأيسر، وإلا يتم البحث في النصف الأيمن. 

تُكرر هذه العملية حتى يتم العثور على موقع `keyAt` أو حتى يتم تقليل حجم المجموعة إلى عنصر واحد. 

إذا تم العثور على `keyAt`، يتم إرجاع معلومات عن موقعه في المجموعة، بما في ذلك رقم القطعة، ومُoffset  للتشفير، وحجم التشفير، ومُoffset  للإفكاك، وحجم الإفكاك.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `function(keyAt)` and is used to search for a specific key in a sorted array of data. 

The function takes `keyAt` as an input, which is the value we are looking for. 

The function uses `arr` which is assumed to be a sorted array of data. 

The function works by splitting the array into two equal parts, then comparing `keyAt` to the value in the middle. If `keyAt` is smaller than the middle value, the search is done in the left half of the array, otherwise it is done in the right half. 

This process is repeated until `keyAt` is found or the array is reduced to one element. 

If `keyAt` is found, the function returns information about its position in the array, including the index, encryption offset, encryption size, decryption offset, and decryption size.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन है जिसका नाम नहीं दिया गया है। यह फ़ंक्शन एक सॉर्टेड एरे `arr` में एक विशिष्ट मान `keyAt` के लिए खोज करता है और उस मान के स्थान के बारे में जानकारी देता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन एक ही argument लेता है: `keyAt` जो एक संख्या है।

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क binary search है। यह एरे के मध्य बिंदु से शुरू होता है और `keyAt` के मान के साथ तुलना करता है। यदि `keyAt` मध्य बिंदु के मान से छोटा है, तो यह एरे के बाएं भाग में खोज करता है; यदि बड़ा है, तो दाएं भाग में। यह प्रक्रिया तब तक दोहराई जाती है जब तक कि `keyAt` नहीं मिल जाता या एरे के बाएं और दाएं भाग में केवल एक ही तत्व रह जाता है। 

यदि `keyAt` मिल जाता है, तो फ़ंक्शन उस तत्व के स्थान, उसके आकार और अन्य संबंधित जानकारी का एक ऑब्जेक्ट वापस करता है। यदि नहीं मिलता है, तो यह कोई ऑब्जेक्ट वापस नहीं करता।
bt_hindi:
This code is a function that is unnamed. It searches for a specific value `keyAt` in a sorted array `arr` and returns information about the position of that value. 

The function takes one argument: `keyAt` which is a number.

The main logic of the function is binary search. It starts from the middle point of the array and compares the `keyAt` value with the middle point. If `keyAt` is smaller than the middle point, it searches in the left part of the array; if it is larger, it searches in the right part. This process is repeated until `keyAt` is found or there is only one element left in the left and right parts of the array.

If `keyAt` is found, the function returns an object containing the position, size and other related information of the element. If it is not found, it returns no object.

docstring: {@inheritdoc}
summary_english:
This function, named `createService`, is responsible for creating a `PluginManagerRouter` object. It takes a `ServiceLocatorInterface` object as input, which is used to retrieve a `ConsumerTaskManager` instance.  The function then constructs a new `PluginManagerRouter` using the retrieved `ConsumerTaskManager` and returns it. 


The function's arguments are:

* `$serviceLocator`: A `ServiceLocatorInterface` object.

The key logic involves retrieving a `ConsumerTaskManager` from the provided service locator and using it to create a `PluginManagerRouter`.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `createService`，它的目的是创建一个 `PluginManagerRouter` 实例。它接受一个 `ServiceLocatorInterface` 类型的参数，名为 `$serviceLocator`。

函数首先从 `$serviceLocator` 中获取一个 `ConsumerTaskManager` 实例，并将其赋值给 `$consumerPluginManager` 变量。然后，它使用 `$consumerPluginManager` 实例创建一个新的 `PluginManagerRouter` 实例，并返回该实例。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `createService` and its purpose is to create a `PluginManagerRouter` instance. It accepts a `ServiceLocatorInterface` type argument, named `$serviceLocator`. 

The function first retrieves a `ConsumerTaskManager` instance from the `$serviceLocator` and assigns it to the `$consumerPluginManager` variable. Then, it uses the `$consumerPluginManager` instance to create a new `PluginManagerRouter` instance and returns it.
summary_french:
La fonction `createService` prend un objet `ServiceLocatorInterface` en argument et retourne un objet `PluginManagerRouter`.  Son but est de créer un nouvel objet `PluginManagerRouter` en utilisant le gestionnaire de tâches de consommateur récupéré via le service locator. 

L'argument `$serviceLocator` est de type `ServiceLocatorInterface`. La fonction récupère le gestionnaire de tâches de consommateur (`ConsumerTaskManager`) à partir du service locator et l'utilise pour créer un nouvel objet `PluginManagerRouter`.
bt_french:
Function `createService` takes an object `ServiceLocatorInterface` as argument and returns an object `PluginManagerRouter`. Its purpose is to create a new object `PluginManagerRouter` using the consumer task manager retrieved via the service locator. 

The argument `$serviceLocator` is of type `ServiceLocatorInterface`. The function retrieves the consumer task manager (ConsumerTaskManager) from the service locator and uses it to create a new object `PluginManagerRouter`.
summary_spanish:
La función `createService` toma un objeto `ServiceLocatorInterface` como argumento y devuelve un objeto `PluginManagerRouter`. Su propósito es crear un nuevo objeto `PluginManagerRouter` utilizando el administrador de tareas de consumidor obtenido del `ServiceLocatorInterface`.  

El argumento `$serviceLocator` es un objeto de tipo `ServiceLocatorInterface`. 

La función primero obtiene el administrador de tareas de consumidor (`ConsumerTaskManager`) del `ServiceLocatorInterface`. Luego, crea un nuevo objeto `PluginManagerRouter` utilizando el administrador de tareas de consumidor obtenido y lo devuelve.
bt_spanish:
Function `createService` takes an object `ServiceLocatorInterface` as argument and returns an object `PluginManagerRouter`. Its purpose is to create a new object `PluginManagerRouter` using the consumer task manager obtained from the `ServiceLocatorInterface`. 

The argument `$serviceLocator` is an object of type `ServiceLocatorInterface`. 

The function first gets the consumer task manager (ConsumerTaskManager) from the `ServiceLocatorInterface`. Then, it creates a new object `PluginManagerRouter` using the consumer task manager obtained and returns it.
summary_portuguese:
A função `createService` recebe um objeto `ServiceLocatorInterface` como argumento e retorna um objeto `PluginManagerRouter`.  O objetivo da função é criar um roteador `PluginManagerRouter` utilizando um gerenciador de plugins de tarefas de consumidor obtido através do `ServiceLocatorInterface`.  

A função primeiro obtém uma instância de `ConsumerTaskManager` do `ServiceLocatorInterface`. Em seguida, cria um novo objeto `PluginManagerRouter` passando o `ConsumerTaskManager` como argumento e retorna esse objeto.
bt_portuguese:
Function `createService` takes a `ServiceLocatorInterface` object as argument and returns a `PluginManagerRouter` object. The purpose of this function is to create a `PluginManagerRouter` using a consumer task manager obtained from the `ServiceLocatorInterface`. 

First, the function gets an instance of `ConsumerTaskManager` from the `ServiceLocatorInterface`. Then, it creates a new `PluginManagerRouter` object passing the `ConsumerTaskManager` as argument and returns that object.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى `createService` وتستقبل مُستَقبل الخدمات `ServiceLocatorInterface` كمدخل.  الغرض من هذه الوظيفة هو إنشاء مُحول `PluginManagerRouter` . 

تستخرج الوظيفة مُدير المهام للمستهلك `ConsumerTaskManager` من المُستَقبل. ثم تقوم بإنشاء مُحول `PluginManagerRouter`  و تقوم بتمرير مُدير المهام للمستهلك إليه كحجة.  


في النهاية، تُعيد الوظيفة مُحول `PluginManagerRouter` المُنشئ.
bt_arabic: This function is called `createService` and it accepts a `ServiceLocatorInterface` as input. The purpose of this function is to create a `PluginManagerRouter` object. The function retrieves the `ConsumerTaskManager` from the input, then creates a `PluginManagerRouter` object and passes the `ConsumerTaskManager` to it as an argument. Finally, the function returns the created `PluginManagerRouter` object.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `createService` नामक एक फ़ंक्शन परिभाषित करता है जो `ServiceLocatorInterface` नामक एक ऑब्जेक्ट को लेता है और `PluginManagerRouter` नामक एक नया ऑब्जेक्ट वापस करता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन का उद्देश्य एक `PluginManagerRouter` ऑब्जेक्ट बनाना है जो `ConsumerTaskManager` नामक एक ऑब्जेक्ट का उपयोग करता है। यह `ConsumerTaskManager` ऑब्जेक्ट `ServiceLocatorInterface` से प्राप्त किया जाता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन में एक ही argument है:

* `$serviceLocator`: `ServiceLocatorInterface` प्रकार का ऑब्जेक्ट

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह `ServiceLocatorInterface` से `ConsumerTaskManager` ऑब्जेक्ट प्राप्त करता है और फिर इस ऑब्जेक्ट का उपयोग करके `PluginManagerRouter` ऑब्जेक्ट बनाता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `createService` which takes an object of type `ServiceLocatorInterface` as argument and returns an object of type `PluginManagerRouter`. The purpose of this function is to create a `PluginManagerRouter` object which uses an object of type `ConsumerTaskManager`. This `ConsumerTaskManager` object is obtained from the `ServiceLocatorInterface`. 

This function has one argument:

* `$serviceLocator`: `ServiceLocatorInterface` object

The main task of this function is to obtain the `ConsumerTaskManager` object from the `ServiceLocatorInterface` and then use this object to create the `PluginManagerRouter` object.

docstring: Write pagination on the pdf
summary_english: The function `paginate` is responsible for adding pagination information to a PDF document. It takes configuration settings for the pagination text and merges them with default settings. Then, it uses the PDF canvas object to draw the pagination text at the specified coordinates using the defined font, size, and color.
summary_chinese: 这个函数名为 `paginate`，它的目的是在 PDF 文档中添加分页信息。它接受两个参数：一个是 `$this->_pagination`，这是一个包含分页信息的对象，另一个是 `$this->config['paginate']`，这是一个包含分页配置的数组。函数首先将这两个参数合并成一个新的数组 `$c`。然后，它使用 `$canvas->page_text()` 方法在 PDF 文档的指定位置添加分页文本，其中包括文本内容、字体、大小和颜色等信息。
bt_chinese: This function is called `paginate` and its purpose is to add page information to a PDF document. It takes two parameters: one is `$this->_pagination`, which is an object containing page information, and the other is `$this->config['paginate']`, which is an array containing page configuration. The function first merges these two parameters into a new array `$c`. Then, it uses the `$canvas->page_text()` method to add page text to the PDF document at the specified position, including text content, font, size, and color information.
summary_french:
La fonction `paginate` est utilisée pour ajouter une pagination à un document PDF. Elle prend en compte les paramètres de pagination définis dans les propriétés `_pagination` et `config['paginate']`.  La fonction récupère le canevas du document PDF et utilise les informations de pagination pour afficher le texte de la pagination à l'emplacement spécifié sur le canevas. 


Les arguments de la fonction sont :

*  `$this->pdf` :  un objet représentant le document PDF.
*  `$this->_pagination` : un tableau contenant les paramètres de pagination spécifiques à l'instance.
*  `$this->config['paginate']` : un tableau contenant les paramètres de pagination globaux. 


La fonction fusionne les deux tableaux de paramètres de pagination et utilise les valeurs combinées pour afficher le texte de la pagination sur le canevas.
bt_french:
paginate function is used to add pagination to a PDF document. It takes into account the pagination settings defined in the properties `_pagination` and `config['paginate']`. The function retrieves the PDF document canvas and uses the pagination information to display the pagination text at the specified location on the canvas. 

The arguments of the function are:

*  `$this->pdf` : an object representing the PDF document.
*  `$this->_pagination` : an array containing the pagination settings specific to the instance.
*  `$this->config['paginate']` : an array containing the global pagination settings. 

The function merges the two arrays of pagination settings and uses the combined values to display the pagination text on the canvas.
summary_spanish:
La función `paginate` se encarga de agregar una paginación al documento PDF. Toma una serie de configuraciones de paginación, combinando las configuraciones predefinidas (`$this->_pagination`) con las configuraciones especificadas en la configuración general (`$this->config['paginate']`). Luego, utiliza el objeto `$canvas` (que representa el área de dibujo del documento PDF) para escribir el texto de la paginación en las coordenadas especificadas (`$c['x']`, `$c['y']`) con la fuente, tamaño y color definidos en las configuraciones. 


Los argumentos de la función son:

*  `$this->pdf`: Un objeto que representa el documento PDF.
*  `$this->_pagination`: Un array con configuraciones de paginación predefinidas.
*  `$this->config['paginate']`: Un array con configuraciones de paginación personalizadas.
bt_spanish:
paginate function is responsible for adding pagination to the PDF document. It takes a set of pagination configurations, combining the predefined configurations ($this->_pagination) with the configurations specified in the general configuration ($this->config['paginate']). Then, it uses the $canvas object (which represents the drawing area of the PDF document) to write the pagination text at the specified coordinates ($c['x'], $c['y']) with the font, size and color defined in the configurations. 

The arguments of the function are:

*  $this->pdf: An object representing the PDF document.
*  $this->_pagination: An array with predefined pagination configurations.
*  $this->config['paginate']: An array with custom pagination configurations.
summary_portuguese: A função `paginate` adiciona uma paginação ao documento PDF. Ela recebe configurações de paginação combinadas de duas fontes: as configurações internas `$this->_pagination` e as configurações gerais `$this->config['paginate']`.  Em seguida, ela usa o objeto `$canvas` (que representa a área de desenho da página) para escrever o texto da paginação na posição especificada pelas coordenadas `$c['x']` e `$c['y']`, utilizando a fonte, tamanho e cor definidas nas configurações.
bt_portuguese: paginate function adds pagination to the PDF document. It receives pagination settings combined from two sources: internal settings $this->_pagination and general settings $this->config['paginate']. Then it uses the $canvas object (which represents the drawing area of the page) to write the pagination text at the position specified by the coordinates $c['x'] and $c['y'], using the font, size and color defined in the settings.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى `paginate` وتُستخدم لوضع نص التنقل في ملف PDF. 

تستقبل الدالة عدة معلمات:

* `$this->pdf`:  يُفترض أنها عبارة عن عنصر PDF.
* `$this->_pagination`:  يحتوي على إعدادات التنقل.
* `$this->config['paginate']`:  يحتوي على إعدادات إضافية للتنقل.

الدالة تقوم بدمج إعدادات التنقل من كلا المصدرين، ثم تستخدم هذه الإعدادات لكتابة نص التنقل في ملف PDF في الموقع المحدد.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `paginate` and is used to add the navigation text in a PDF file. 

The function accepts several parameters:

* `$this->pdf`: It is assumed to be a PDF object.
* `$this->_pagination`: It contains the pagination settings.
* `$this->config['paginate']`: It contains additional pagination settings.

The function combines the pagination settings from both sources, then uses these settings to write the navigation text in the PDF file at the specified location.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक निजी फ़ंक्शन `paginate` है। इसका उद्देश्य PDF दस्तावेज़ में पेजिनेशन जानकारी प्रदर्शित करना है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन में दो मुख्य तर्क हैं: `$this->_pagination` और `$this->config['paginate']`।  `$this->_pagination` एक एर्रे है जो पेजिनेशन सेटिंग्स जैसे पेज नंबर, स्थिति आदि को संग्रहीत करता है। `$this->config['paginate']` एक और एर्रे है जो पेजिनेशन से संबंधित कॉन्फ़िगरेशन सेटिंग्स रखता है। 

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क यह है कि यह दोनों एर्रे को मिलाकर एक नया एर्रे बनाता है और फिर इस एर्रे का उपयोग `$canvas->page_text()` फ़ंक्शन के माध्यम से PDF दस्तावेज़ में पेज नंबर और अन्य पेजिनेशन जानकारी को प्रदर्शित करने के लिए करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code is a private function `paginate`. Its purpose is to display pagination information in a PDF document. 

This function has two main arguments: `$this->_pagination` and `$this->config['paginate']`.  `$this->_pagination` is an array that stores pagination settings such as page number, position, etc. `$this->config['paginate']` is another array that stores configuration settings related to pagination. 

The main task of this function is to merge these two arrays and then use this merged array to display page numbers and other pagination information in the PDF document using the `$canvas->page_text()` function.

docstring:
Initializes the DbMessageSource component.
This method will initialize the [[db]] property to make sure it refers to a valid DB connection.
Configured [[cache]] component would also be initialized.
@throws InvalidConfigException if [[db]] is invalid or [[cache]] is invalid.
summary_english:
This code defines a function called `init` that is likely part of a class. Its purpose is to initialize the object's properties. 

The function takes no arguments.

First, it calls a parent class's `init` function, suggesting inheritance. Then, it ensures that the `translator` property is an instance of `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` using a helper function called `Instance::ensure`.  If the `enableCaching` property is true, it ensures that the `cache` property is an instance of `Cache::className()`.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `init`，它的目的是初始化一些对象属性。它接受两个参数：`$this->translator` 和 `$this->cache`，分别代表翻译器和缓存对象。 

函数首先调用父类的 `init` 函数，然后确保 `$this->translator` 是一个 `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` 接口的实例，并将其赋值给 `$this->translator`。如果 `$this->enableCaching` 为真，则确保 `$this->cache` 是一个 `Cache` 类实例，并将其赋值给 `$this->cache`。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `init` and its purpose is to initialize some object properties. It accepts two parameters: `$this->translator` and `$this->cache`, which represent the translator and cache objects respectively. 

The function first calls the parent class's `init` function, then ensures that `$this->translator` is an instance of the `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` interface and assigns it to `$this->translator`. If `$this->enableCaching` is true, then it ensures that `$this->cache` is an instance of the `Cache` class and assigns it to `$this->cache`.
summary_french: La fonction `init` initialise un objet. Elle appelle d'abord la fonction `init` de la classe parente. Ensuite, elle vérifie si une instance de `TranslatorInterface` est disponible pour la traduction et la stocke dans la propriété `$this->translator`. Si la propriété `$this->enableCaching` est vraie, elle vérifie également si une instance de `Cache` est disponible et la stocke dans la propriété `$this->cache`.
bt_french: Function `init` initializes an object. It first calls the `init` function of the parent class. Then, it checks if an instance of `TranslatorInterface` is available for translation and stores it in the property `$this->translator`. If the property `$this->enableCaching` is true, it also checks if an instance of `Cache` is available and stores it in the property `$this->cache`.
summary_spanish: La función `init` inicializa un objeto. Primero, llama a la función `init` de su clase padre. Luego, asegura que la propiedad `translator` sea una instancia de `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` utilizando la función `Instance::ensure`. Si la propiedad `enableCaching` es verdadera, también asegura que la propiedad `cache` sea una instancia de la clase `Cache`.
bt_spanish: Function `init` initializes an object. First, it calls the `init` function of its parent class. Then, it ensures that the `translator` property is an instance of `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` using the `Instance::ensure` function. If the `enableCaching` property is true, it also ensures that the `cache` property is an instance of the `Cache` class.
summary_portuguese: A função `init` inicializa um objeto. Ela primeiro chama o método `init` da classe pai. Em seguida, garante que a propriedade `translator` seja uma instância de `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` usando o método `Instance::ensure`. Se a propriedade `enableCaching` for verdadeira, a função também garante que a propriedade `cache` seja uma instância de `Cache::className()`.
bt_portuguese: Function `init` initializes an object. It first calls the `init` method of the parent class. Then, it ensures that the `translator` property is an instance of `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` using the `Instance::ensure` method. If the `enableCaching` property is true, the function also ensures that the `cache` property is an instance of `Cache::className()`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى `init` وتُستخدم لبدء تشغيل بعض الميزات. 

تستدعي الوظيفة `init` من الطبقة الأم، ثم تقوم بتأكد من وجود مُترجم `translator` من نوع `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface`، وإذا كان `enableCaching` صحيحًا، تقوم بتأكد من وجود مُخزن بيانات `cache` من نوع `Cache`.
bt_arabic: This function is called `init` and is used to start certain features. It calls the `init` function from the parent class, then checks if a `translator` of type `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` is available, and if `enableCaching` is true, it also checks if a `cache` of type `Cache` is available.
summary_hindi: यह कोड एक फंक्शन `init` को परिभाषित करता है। यह फंक्शन किसी ऑब्जेक्ट को शुरू करने या इनिटियलाइज करने के लिए जिम्मेदार है। यह पहले `parent::init()` को कॉल करता है, जो संभवतः उसके पेरेंट क्लास में मौजूद एक समान फंक्शन को कॉल करता है। फिर, यह `$this->translator` नामक एक वैरिएबल को सेट करता है, जो `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface` इंटरफेस का एक इंस्टेंस होना चाहिए। अगर `$this->enableCaching` सच है, तो यह `$this->cache` नामक एक वैरिएबल को सेट करता है, जो `Cache::className()` क्लास का एक इंस्टेंस होना चाहिए।
bt_hindi: This code defines a function `init`. This function is responsible for initializing or starting an object. It first calls `parent::init()`, which may call a similar function in its parent class. Then, it sets a variable `$this->translator`, which should be an instance of `conquer\i18n\TranslatorInterface`. If `$this->enableCaching` is true, it also sets a variable `$this->cache`, which should be an instance of `Cache::className()`.

summary_english:
This code defines a function called `collect` that takes a single argument, `$query`, which is an instance of the `Query` class. The function's purpose is to store a query object in a static array called `static::$queries`. 

It first retrieves the maximum number of allowed queries from a configuration setting called `Toolbar`. If the setting is not found, it defaults to 100. Then, it checks if the number of queries already stored in the `static::$queries` array is less than the maximum allowed. If it is, the function adds the provided `$query` to the array.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `collect`，它的目的是收集查询对象，并限制最多收集 100 个查询。它接受一个 `Query` 类型查询对象作为参数。

函数首先从配置文件中获取名为 `Toolbar` 的配置项，并设置一个名为 `max` 的变量，默认值为 100。然后，它检查静态变量 `static::$queries` 中已收集的查询数量是否小于 `max`。如果数量小于，则将传入的查询对象添加到 `static::$queries` 数组中。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `collect` and its purpose is to collect queries and limit the number of queries collected to 100. It accepts a `Query` type query object as a parameter.

The function first retrieves the configuration item named `Toolbar` from the configuration file and sets a variable named `max` with a default value of 100. Then, it checks the number of queries already collected in the static variable `static::$queries` and if it is less than `max`, it adds the given query object to the `static::$queries` array.
summary_french: La fonction `collect` prend en argument une requête `Query` et a pour but de collecter un certain nombre de requêtes. Elle utilise la configuration `Toolbar` pour déterminer le nombre maximum de requêtes autorisées, qui est par défaut 100. Si le nombre de requêtes collectées est inférieur à ce maximum, la requête fournie est ajoutée à la liste des requêtes collectées.
bt_french: Function `collect` takes a `Query` argument and is designed to collect a certain number of queries. It uses the `Toolbar` configuration to determine the maximum number of queries allowed, which is 100 by default. If the number of collected queries is less than this maximum, the provided query is added to the list of collected queries.
summary_spanish:
La función `collect` toma como argumento una instancia de `Query` llamada `$query`. Su propósito es almacenar la consulta en una lista interna llamada `static::$queries`.  

La función primero obtiene la configuración de "Toolbar" del archivo de configuración. Luego, establece un valor por defecto de 100 para el número máximo de consultas que se pueden almacenar, a menos que se haya definido un valor diferente en la configuración. 

Si el número de consultas almacenadas es menor al máximo permitido, la función agrega la consulta recibida como argumento a la lista `static::$queries`.
bt_spanish:
Function `collect` takes an instance of `Query` called `$query` as argument. Its purpose is to store the query in an internal list called `static::$queries`. 

The function first gets the "Toolbar" configuration from the configuration file. Then, it sets a default value of 100 for the maximum number of queries that can be stored, unless a different value is defined in the configuration.
