If the number of queries stored is less than the maximum allowed, the function adds the received query as argument to the list `static::$queries`.
summary_portuguese:
A função `collect` recebe um objeto `Query` como argumento e adiciona esse objeto a um array interno chamado `static::$queries`.  

A função primeiro busca uma configuração chamada "Toolbar" e define um valor padrão de 100 para o número máximo de queries que podem ser armazenadas. 

Se o número de queries armazenadas for menor que o limite máximo, a função adiciona a nova query ao array `static::$queries`.
bt_portuguese:
Function `collect` receives an object `Query` as argument and adds that object to an internal array called `static::$queries`. 

The function first searches for a configuration called "Toolbar" and sets a default value of 100 for the maximum number of queries that can be stored. 

If the number of queries stored is less than the maximum limit, the function adds the new query to the array `static::$queries`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة العامة تسمى `collect` وتستقبل كائن `Query` كمدخل. الغرض من هذه الدالة هو جمع عدة استعلامات `Query` في متغير ثابت `static::$queries`. 

الدالة تأخذ قيمة `maxQueries` من ملف التكوين `config('Toolbar')`، وتُستخدم هذه القيمة لتحديد الحد الأقصى لعدد الاستعلامات التي يمكن جمعها. إذا كان عدد الاستعلامات الموجودة في `static::$queries` أقل من `max`، يتم إضافة الاستعلام المُدخل إلى `static::$queries`.
bt_arabic: This function is called `collect` and it accepts a `Query` object as input. The purpose of this function is to collect multiple `Query` objects into a static variable `static::$queries`. The function takes the value of `maxQueries` from the configuration file `config('Toolbar')` and uses it to determine the maximum number of queries that can be collected. If the number of queries in `static::$queries` is less than `max`, the input `Query` is added to `static::$queries`.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक "collect" नामक एक स्टैटिक फ़ंक्शन है। इसका काम एक क्वेरी को एक संग्रह में जोड़ना है। यह फ़ंक्शन एक क्वेरी ऑब्जेक्ट के रूप में एक argument लेता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन पहले एक कॉन्फ़िगरेशन से "maxQueries" नामक एक मान प्राप्त करता है, जो कि डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप से 100 होता है। फिर यह जाँच करता है कि संग्रह में मौजूद क्वेरी की संख्या "maxQueries" से कम है या नहीं। यदि कम है, तो यह प्राप्त क्वेरी को संग्रह में जोड़ देता है।
bt_hindi:
This code is a "collect" named static function. Its job is to add a query to a collection. The function takes an argument in the form of a query object. 

The function first retrieves a value from a configuration named "maxQueries", which is by default 100. It then checks if the number of queries present in the collection is less than "maxQueries". If it is, the function adds the received query to the collection.

summary_english:
This code defines a function called `zip` that takes two arguments: `$sourcePath`, which can be either a string representing a single file path or an array of file paths, and `$outZipPath`, a string representing the desired path for the output zip file. The function's purpose is to create a zip archive containing the files specified by `$sourcePath` and save it to the location specified by `$outZipPath`. 

If `$sourcePath` is an array, the function iterates through each file path in the array and calls the `addToZip` function to add each file to the zip archive. If `$sourcePath` is a string, it directly calls `addToZip` to add the single file to the archive. Finally, the function closes the zip archive.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `zip`，它的目的是将给定的文件或文件列表压缩成一个ZIP文件。它接受两个参数：`$sourcePath` 表示要压缩的文件路径，类型为字符串或数组，`$outZipPath` 表示压缩后的ZIP文件路径，类型为字符串。

函数首先创建一个新的ZipArchive对象，然后打开指定路径的ZIP文件，如果文件不存在则创建新文件。

如果`$sourcePath` 是一个数组，则遍历数组中的每个元素，调用 `addToZip` 函数将每个文件添加到ZIP文件中。如果`$sourcePath` 是一个字符串，则直接调用 `addToZip` 函数将该文件添加到ZIP文件中。最后，关闭ZIP文件。
bt_chinese:
This function is named `zip` and its purpose is to compress a given file or file list into a zip file. It takes two parameters: `$sourcePath` which indicates the path of the file or files to be compressed, and `$outZipPath` which indicates the path of the compressed zip file. 

The function first creates a new ZipArchive object, then opens the specified zip file. If the file does not exist, it will be created. 

If `$sourcePath` is an array, it will iterate through each element in the array and call the `addToZip` function to add each file to the zip file. If `$sourcePath` is a string, it will directly call the `addToZip` function to add the file to the zip file. Finally, the zip file will be closed.
summary_french:
La fonction `zip` permet de créer un fichier zip à partir d'un chemin de fichier ou d'un tableau de chemins de fichiers. Elle prend en argument `$sourcePath`, qui peut être un chemin de fichier ou un tableau de chemins de fichiers, et `$outZipPath`, une chaîne de caractères représentant le chemin du fichier zip à créer. 

La fonction crée un nouvel objet ZipArchive et l'ouvre en mode création. Si `$sourcePath` est un tableau, elle parcourt chaque élément du tableau et appelle la fonction `addToZip` pour ajouter chaque fichier au zip. Sinon, elle appelle `addToZip` une seule fois avec le chemin de fichier fourni. Enfin, la fonction ferme le fichier zip.
bt_french:
Function `zip` allows you to create a zip file from a file path or an array of file paths. It takes two arguments: `$sourcePath`, which can be a file path or an array of file paths, and `$outZipPath`, a string representing the path of the zip file to be created. 

The function creates a new ZipArchive object and opens it in creation mode. If `$sourcePath` is an array, it loops through each element of the array and calls the `addToZip` function to add each file to the zip. Otherwise, it calls `addToZip` once with the given file path. Finally, the function closes the zip file.
summary_spanish:
La función `zip` tiene como propósito comprimir un archivo o una colección de archivos en un archivo ZIP. 

Recibe dos argumentos: `$sourcePath`, que puede ser una cadena que representa la ruta a un archivo o un array de cadenas que representan las rutas a varios archivos, y `$outZipPath`, que es una cadena que representa la ruta donde se guardará el archivo ZIP resultante.

La función crea un nuevo objeto ZipArchive y lo abre en modo de creación. Luego, si `$sourcePath` es un array, recorre cada elemento del array y llama a la función `addToZip` para agregar cada archivo al archivo ZIP. Si `$sourcePath` es una cadena, llama a `addToZip` una vez para agregar el archivo especificado al archivo ZIP. Finalmente, cierra el archivo ZIP.
bt_spanish:
Function `zip` is used to compress a file or collection of files into a zip archive. It takes two arguments: `$sourcePath`, which can be a string representing the path to a file or an array of strings representing the paths to multiple files, and `$outZipPath`, which is a string representing the path where the resulting zip archive will be saved.

The function creates a new ZipArchive object and opens it in creation mode. If `$sourcePath` is an array, it iterates through each element of the array and calls the `addToZip` function to add each file to the zip archive. If `$sourcePath` is a string, it calls `addToZip` once to add the specified file to the zip archive. Finally, it closes the zip archive.
summary_portuguese:
A função `zip` tem como objetivo compactar um ou mais arquivos ou diretórios em um arquivo ZIP. Ela recebe dois argumentos: `$sourcePath`, que pode ser uma string representando o caminho de um único arquivo ou diretório, ou um array de strings representando os caminhos de vários arquivos ou diretórios, e `$outZipPath`, uma string representando o caminho para o arquivo ZIP de saída. 

A função cria um novo objeto ZipArchive e o abre no caminho especificado em `$outZipPath` para criação. Se `$sourcePath` for um array, a função itera sobre cada elemento do array e chama a função `addToZip` para adicionar cada elemento ao arquivo ZIP. Caso contrário, a função chama `addToZip` para adicionar o único elemento de `$sourcePath` ao arquivo ZIP. Finalmente, a função fecha o arquivo ZIP.
bt_portuguese:
Function `zip` aims to compress one or more files or directories into a ZIP archive. It takes two arguments: `$sourcePath`, which can be a string representing the path of a single file or directory, or an array of strings representing the paths of multiple files or directories, and `$outZipPath`, a string representing the path for the output ZIP archive. 

The function creates a new ZipArchive object and opens it at the specified path in `$outZipPath` for creation. If `$sourcePath` is an array, the function iterates over each element of the array and calls the `addToZip` function to add each element to the ZIP archive. Otherwise, the function calls `addToZip` to add the single element of `$sourcePath` to the ZIP archive. Finally, the function closes the ZIP archive.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى `zip` وتقوم بإنشاء ملف zip من ملف أو مجموعة من الملفات. 

تستقبل الوظيفة  `$sourcePath`  وهو إما ملف واحد أو قائمة بأسماء الملفات التي تريد ضمها إلى ملف zip، و `$outZipPath`  وهو اسم الملف الذي سيتم إنشاؤه. 

تُنشئ الوظيفة ملف zip جديد باستخدام `ZipArchive`، ثم تقوم بإضافة الملف أو الملفات إلى هذا الملف zip.  في حالة وجود قائمة بأسماء الملفات، يتم دورة على كل ملف في القائمة وإضافته إلى zip.  

بعد إتمام عملية الضغط، يتم إغلاق ملف zip.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `zip` and it creates a zip file from a single file or a list of files. The function takes two arguments: `$sourcePath` which is either a single file or a list of file names to be included in the zip file, and `$outZipPath` which is the name of the zip file to be created. 

The function creates a new zip file using `ZipArchive`, then adds the file or files to the zip file. If a list of file names is provided, each file in the list is added to the zip file. 

After the compression is complete, the zip file is closed.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `zip` नामक है जो दो एरग्यूमेंट्स लेता है: `$sourcePath` जो एक स्रोत फ़ाइल या फ़ाइलों का पथ हो सकता है और `$outZipPath` जो ज़िप फ़ाइल का नाम और पथ हो सकता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन का काम स्रोत फ़ाइल या फ़ाइलों को ज़िप फ़ाइल में पैक करना है। 

यदि `$sourcePath` एक एरे है, तो यह फ़ंक्शन प्रत्येक फ़ाइल को ज़िप फ़ाइल में जोड़ता है। यदि `$sourcePath` एक स्ट्रिंग है, तो यह फ़ंक्शन केवल उस एक फ़ाइल को ज़िप फ़ाइल में जोड़ता है। 

ज़िप फ़ाइल बनाने के बाद, यह फ़ंक्शन ज़िप फ़ाइल को बंद कर देता है।
bt_hindi:
This code is a function `zip` which takes two arguments: `$sourcePath` which can be a source file or files path and `$outZipPath` which can be a zip file name and path. 

This function's job is to pack the source file or files into a zip file. 

If `$sourcePath` is an array, this function will add each file to the zip file. If `$sourcePath` is a string, this function will add only that one file to the zip file. 

After creating the zip file, this function will close the zip file.

summary_english:
The function `getFormValue` retrieves a value from a form, handling potential date conversions and custom attribute mutations. It takes a single argument, `$key`, which is a string representing the name of the form attribute. 

First, it retrieves the value associated with the given key from an internal array. If the key corresponds to a date attribute, and the value is not null, it converts the value to a DateTime object. 

Then, it checks if a custom mutator function exists for the given key. If a mutator is found, it applies the mutator to the value. Otherwise, it directly returns the value from the model, allowing the model's own logic to handle the attribute.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `getFormValue`，它的目的是从模型中获取表单值。它接受一个名为 `$key` 的字符串参数，代表要获取的表单字段的键。

函数首先从一个数组中获取对应键的值，然后判断这个键是否在 `$this->getDates()` 返回的日期字段列表中，如果在并且值不为空，则将值转换为 DateTime 对象。最后，如果存在名为 `$key` 的表单修改器，则调用 `mutateFormAttribute` 函数对值进行修改，否则直接返回模型中对应键的值。
bt_chinese: This function is called `getFormValue` and its purpose is to get form values from the model. It accepts a string parameter named `$key` which represents the key of the form field to be retrieved. The function first gets the value corresponding to the key from an array, then checks if the key is in the list of date fields returned by `$this->getDates()`. If it is and the value is not empty, the value is converted to a DateTime object. Finally, if there is a form modifier named `$key`, the `mutateFormAttribute` function is called to modify the value, otherwise the value from the model is returned.
summary_french:
La fonction `getFormValue` récupère la valeur d'une clé spécifique dans un formulaire. Elle prend un argument `$key` de type chaîne représentant le nom de la clé. 

La fonction d'abord récupère la valeur associée à la clé à partir d'un tableau d'attributs. Si la clé est dans une liste de dates et que la valeur n'est pas nulle, elle est convertie en objet DateTime. Ensuite, la fonction vérifie s'il existe un modificateur de formulaire pour cette clé. Si oui, elle applique le modificateur à la valeur. Sinon, elle retourne la valeur directement à partir du modèle.
bt_french:
Function `getFormValue` retrieves the value of a specific key in a form. It takes an argument `$key` of type string representing the name of the key. 

The function first retrieves the value associated with the key from an array of attributes. If the key is in a list of dates and the value is not null, it is converted into a DateTime object. Then, the function checks if there is a form modifier for this key. If yes, it applies the modifier to the value. Otherwise, it returns the value directly from the model.
summary_spanish:
La función `getFormValue` toma una clave como argumento y devuelve el valor asociado a esa clave en un formulario. Primero, busca el valor en un arreglo de atributos. Luego, si la clave corresponde a una fecha y el valor no es nulo, lo convierte a un objeto DateTime. Finalmente, verifica si existe un modificador de formulario para la clave. Si lo hay, aplica el modificador al valor; de lo contrario, devuelve el valor directamente del modelo. 


El argumento de la función es `$key` de tipo cadena.
bt_spanish: Function `getFormValue` takes a key as argument and returns the value associated with that key in a form. First, it searches for the value in an array of attributes. Then, if the key corresponds to a date and the value is not null, it converts it to a DateTime object. Finally, it checks if there is a form modifier for the key. If so, it applies the modifier to the value; otherwise, it returns the value directly from the model.
summary_portuguese:
A função `getFormValue` recebe uma chave como argumento e busca o valor correspondente em um array de atributos. Se a chave for uma das datas definidas na função `getDates`, o valor é convertido para um objeto DateTime, caso não seja nulo. 

A função então verifica se existe um mutator para a chave. Se existir, o valor é modificado usando a função `mutateFormAttribute`. Caso contrário, o valor é retornado diretamente usando a função `data_get`. 


O argumento da função é `$key` do tipo string.
bt_portuguese:
Function `getFormValue` receives a key as argument and searches for the corresponding value in an array of attributes. If the key is one of the dates defined in the function `getDates`, the value is converted to a DateTime object, otherwise it is returned if it is not null.

The function then checks if there is a mutator for the key. If there is, the value is modified using the function `mutateFormAttribute`. Otherwise, the value is returned directly using the function `data_get`. 

The argument of the function is `$key` of type string.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى `getFormValue` وتستخدم لاسترجاع قيمة الحقل من نموذج الشكل. 

تستقبل الوظيفة  引數 واحد وهو `$key` من نوع string، والذي يمثل اسم الحقل الذي تريد استرجاع قيمته.

تبدأ الوظيفة باسترجاع قيمة الحقل من خلال استدعاء  `getAttributeFromArray` مع `$key` ك引數. 

ثم، تحقق الوظيفة إذا كان `$key` موجودًا في قائمة `getDates()`، وإذا كانت القيمة غير فارغة، يتم تحويل القيمة إلى تاريخ باستخدام `asDateTime`.

بعد ذلك، تحقق الوظيفة إذا كان هناك مُتغير مُخصص للنموذج لهذا الحقل باستخدام `hasFormMutator`. 

إذا وجد مُتغير مُخصص، يتم استدعاء `mutateFormAttribute` مع `$key` والقيمة المُسترجعة، وإلا يتم استرجاع القيمة مباشرة من النموذج باستخدام `data_get`.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `getFormValue` and is used to retrieve the value of a form field. The function accepts one argument, `$key`, which is a string representing the name of the field you want to retrieve the value of.

The function begins by retrieving the value of the field by calling `getAttributeFromArray` with `$key` as the argument.

Then, the function checks if `$key` is present in the list returned by `getDates()`. If the value is not empty, the value is converted to a date using `asDateTime`.

Next, the function checks if there is a custom variable for the form field using `hasFormMutator`. If a custom variable is found, `mutateFormAttribute` is called with `$key` and the retrieved value. Otherwise, the value is retrieved directly from the form using `data_get`.
summary_hindi:
यह फ़ंक्शन `getFormValue` नाम का है और इसका उद्देश्य किसी फ़ॉर्म के विशेष मान को वापस करना है। यह एक `$key` नामक एक मान्यता प्राप्त करता है जो उस विशिष्ट मान को पहचानता है जिसे हम चाहते हैं। 

यदि `$key`  `getDates()` फ़ंक्शन द्वारा लौटाए गए दिनांक की सूची में है और `$value`  नहीं है `null`, तो `$value` को `asDateTime` फ़ंक्शन का उपयोग करके एक `DateTime` ऑब्जेक्ट में परिवर्तित किया जाता है। 

अंत में, यह जाँच करता है कि क्या `$key` के लिए कोई फ़ॉर्म म्यूटेटर मौजूद है। यदि हाँ, तो `mutateFormAttribute` फ़ंक्शन का उपयोग करके मान को परिवर्तित किया जाता है। यदि नहीं, तो `data_get` फ़ंक्शन का उपयोग करके मॉडल द्वारा मान को हल करने दिया जाता है।
bt_hindi: This function is called `getFormValue` and its purpose is to return a specific value from a form. It takes a parameter named `$key` which identifies the specific value we want. If the `$key` is present in the list of dates returned by the `getDates()` function and the `$value` is not `null`, then the `$value` is converted to a `DateTime` object using the `asDateTime` function. Finally, it checks if there is a form mutator for the `$key`. If yes, then the value is mutated using the `mutateFormAttribute` function. If not, then the value is resolved by the model using the `data_get` function.

summary_english:
This function is called `setPublishDate` and it's designed to set the publication date for an object. It takes one argument, `$time`, which can be either a string representing a date and time or a DateTimeInterface object. 

First, it checks if `$time` is null or an empty string. If so, it sets the object's `publishDate` to null and returns the object itself. 

If `$time` is a string, it tries to create a DateTime object from it. If this fails, it throws an UnexpectedValueException indicating an invalid publication date.

Next, it ensures that `$time` is actually a DateTimeInterface object. If not, it throws an InvalidArgumentException.

Finally, if everything is valid, it sets the object's `publishDate` to the provided `$time` and returns the object.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `setPublishDate`，它的目的是设置对象的发布日期。它接受一个名为 `$time` 的参数，类型可以是字符串或 DateTimeInterface 实例。

如果 `$time` 为空或 null，则将对象的 `publishDate` 属性设置为 null，并返回自身。

如果 `$time` 是字符串类型，则尝试将其转换为 DateTime 对象。如果转换失败，则抛出 UnexpectedValueException 异常。

如果 `$time` 不是 DateTimeInterface 实例，则抛出 InvalidArgumentException 异常。

如果以上条件都满足，则将 `$time` 赋值给对象的 `publishDate` 属性，并返回自身。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `setPublishDate` and its purpose is to set the publish date of an object. It accepts a parameter called `$time` which can be a string or DateTimeInterface instance.

If `$time` is empty or null, the object's `publishDate` property will be set to null and the function will return itself.

If `$time` is a string, it will be attempted to be converted to a DateTime object. If the conversion fails, an UnexpectedValueException exception will be thrown.

If `$time` is not a DateTimeInterface instance, an InvalidArgumentException exception will be thrown.

If all the above conditions are met, the `$time` will be assigned to the object's `publishDate` property and the function will return itself.
summary_french:
La fonction `setPublishDate` permet de définir la date de publication d'un élément. Elle prend un argument `$time` qui peut être un timestamp, une chaîne de caractères représentant une date ou une instance de `DateTimeInterface`. 

Si `$time` est nul ou une chaîne vide, la date de publication est définie sur `null`. Si `$time` est une chaîne de caractères, elle est convertie en objet `DateTime`. Si `$time` n'est pas une chaîne de caractères ou une instance de `DateTimeInterface`, une exception `InvalidArgumentException` est levée. 

Enfin, la date de publication est définie sur l'objet `$time` et la fonction retourne l'objet courant.
bt_french:
Function `setPublishDate` allows to set the publication date of an element. It takes an argument `$time` which can be a timestamp, a string representing a date or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`. 

If `$time` is null or an empty string, the publication date is set to `null`. If `$time` is a string, it is converted to a `DateTime` object. If `$time` is not a string or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`, an exception `InvalidArgumentException` is thrown. 

Finally, the publication date is set to the object `$time` and the function returns the current object.
summary_spanish:
La función se llama `setPublishDate` y su propósito es establecer la fecha de publicación de un objeto. 

Recibe un argumento llamado `$time` que puede ser un valor nulo, una cadena vacía, una cadena que representa una fecha y hora o una instancia de `DateTimeInterface`.

Primero, verifica si `$time` es nulo o una cadena vacía. Si es así, establece la propiedad `$this->publishDate` como nulo y devuelve el objeto actual. 

Si `$time` es una cadena, intenta crear una instancia de `DateTime` a partir de ella. Si esto falla, lanza una excepción `UnexpectedValueException` indicando que la fecha de publicación es inválida.

Luego, verifica si `$time` es una instancia de `DateTimeInterface`. Si no lo es, lanza una excepción `InvalidArgumentException` indicando que la fecha de publicación debe ser una cadena de fecha y hora o una instancia de `DateTimeInterface`.

Finalmente, si todo va bien, establece la propiedad `$this->publishDate` en el valor de `$time` y devuelve el objeto actual.
bt_spanish:
Function `setPublishDate` sets the publication date of an object. It takes an argument called `$time` which can be null, an empty string, a string representing a date and time or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`. 

First, check if `$time` is null or an empty string. If so, set the property `$this->publishDate` to null and return the current object.

If `$time` is a string, try to create a `DateTime` instance from it. If this fails, throw an `UnexpectedValueException` indicating that the publication date is invalid.

Then, check if `$time` is an instance of `DateTimeInterface`. If not, throw an `InvalidArgumentException` indicating that the publication date must be a string representing a date and time or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`.

Finally, if everything goes well, set the property `$this->publishDate` to the value of `$time` and return the current object.
summary_portuguese:
A função `setPublishDate` define a data de publicação de um objeto. Ela recebe um argumento chamado `$time` que pode ser um valor nulo, uma string representando uma data e hora, ou uma instância de `DateTimeInterface`. 

Se `$time` for nulo ou vazio, a propriedade `publishDate` do objeto é definida como nulo e a função retorna o próprio objeto. 

Se `$time` for uma string, a função tenta criar um objeto `DateTime` a partir dela. Se isso falhar, uma exceção `UnexpectedValueException` é lançada. 

Se `$time` não for uma string ou uma instância de `DateTimeInterface`, uma exceção `InvalidArgumentException` é lançada. 

Caso contrário, a propriedade `publishDate` do objeto é definida para o valor de `$time` e a função retorna o próprio objeto.
bt_portuguese:
Function `setPublishDate` sets the publication date of an object. It receives an argument called `$time` which can be a null value, a string representing a date and time, or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`. 

If `$time` is null or empty, the `publishDate` property of the object is set to null and the function returns the object itself. 

If `$time` is a string, the function attempts to create a `DateTime` object from it. If this fails, an `UnexpectedValueException` is thrown. 

If `$time` is not a string or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`, an `InvalidArgumentException` is thrown. 

Otherwise, the `publishDate` property of the object is set to the value of `$time` and the function returns the object itself.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تسمى `setPublishDate` وتستخدم لتعيين تاريخ النشر. 

تستقبل الوظيفة  引數 واحد يُسمى `$time` والذي يمكن أن يكون قيمة `null` أو سلسلة نصية أو  `DateTimeInterface`. 

إذا كانت القيمة `$time` هي `null` أو سلسلة فارغة، يتم تعيين `$this->publishDate` إلى `null` وتُرجع الوظيفة `$this`. 

إذا كانت القيمة `$time` هي سلسلة نصية، يتم محاولة تحويلها إلى  `DateTime` . إذا حدث خطأ، يتم إلقاء استثناء `UnexpectedValueException`. 

إذا لم تكن القيمة `$time`  من نوع `DateTimeInterface`، يتم إلقاء استثناء `InvalidArgumentException`. 

في كل الحالات الأخرى، يتم تعيين `$this->publishDate` إلى القيمة `$time` وتُرجع الوظيفة `$this`.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `setPublishDate` and is used to set the publish date. The function accepts one argument called `$time` which can be a null value, a string, or a DateTimeInterface.

If the value of `$time` is null or an empty string, `$this->publishDate` is set to null and the function returns `$this`.

If the value of `$time` is a string, it is attempted to be converted to a DateTime. If an error occurs, an UnexpectedValueException is thrown.

If the value of `$time` is not of type DateTimeInterface, an InvalidArgumentException is thrown.

In all other cases, `$this->publishDate` is set to the value of `$time` and the function returns `$this`.
summary_hindi:
यह फ़ंक्शन `setPublishDate` नाम का है और इसका उद्देश्य किसी लेख या सामग्री के प्रकाशन तिथि को सेट करना है। यह एक `$time`  नामक मान लेता है जो या तो एक स्ट्रिंग हो सकता है (जिसमें तिथि और समय का प्रतिनिधित्व हो) या एक `DateTimeInterface`  का उदाहरण हो। 

यदि `$time` मान `null` या खाली स्ट्रिंग है, तो प्रकाशन तिथि `null`  सेट की जाती है और फ़ंक्शन `$this`  वापस करता है। 

यदि `$time` एक स्ट्रिंग है, तो यह एक `DateTime`  वस्तु में परिवर्तित करने की कोशिश की जाती है। यदि यह परिवर्तन सफल नहीं होता है, तो एक `UnexpectedValueException`  पैदा की जाती है। 

यदि `$time`  `DateTimeInterface`  का उदाहरण नहीं है, तो एक `InvalidArgumentException`  पैदा की जाती है। 

अंत में, यदि सब कुछ ठीक है, तो `$time`  वस्तु `$this->publishDate`  में सेट की जाती है और फ़ंक्शन `$this`  वापस करता है।
bt_hindi:
This function is called `setPublishDate` and its purpose is to set the publication date of an article or content. It takes a value named `$time` which can either be a string (representing the date and time) or an instance of `DateTimeInterface`. 

If the `$time` value is `null` or an empty string, the publication date is set to `null` and the function returns `$this`. 

If the `$time` value is a string, it is attempted to be converted into a `DateTime` object. If this conversion fails, an `UnexpectedValueException` is thrown. 

If the `$time` value is not an instance of `DateTimeInterface`, an `InvalidArgumentException` is thrown. 

Finally, if everything is alright, the `$time` value is set to the object `$this->publishDate` and the function returns `$this`.

docstring:
Insert a new User instance into the database.

@param User $user
summary_english:
The function `insert` is responsible for adding a new user to the database. It takes a `User` object as input. 

First, it dispatches an event `UserEvents::BEFORE_INSERT` to notify listeners about the upcoming insertion. Then, it constructs an SQL `INSERT` statement using the provided user object's data and the table name. 

The statement includes columns for email, password, salt, name, roles, creation time, username, enabled status, confirmation token, and password reset request time.  

The function then executes the SQL statement with the user's data as parameters. After successful insertion, it sets the user's ID to the last inserted ID from the database. 

It then saves any custom fields associated with the user and adds the user to an internal identity map. Finally, it dispatches an event `UserEvents::AFTER_INSERT` to notify listeners about the successful insertion.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `insert`，用于插入一个新的用户到数据库中。它接受一个 `User` 对象作为参数，该对象包含了用户的相关信息。

函数首先会触发一个名为 `UserEvents::BEFORE_INSERT` 的事件，通知其他组件用户即将被插入。然后，它会构建一个 SQL 插入语句，将用户的各个属性插入到数据库表中。

接下来，函数会将用户的属性值填充到 SQL 语句的参数中，并使用数据库连接对象执行该语句。执行成功后，函数会将数据库自动生成的 ID 赋值给用户对象，并保存用户的自定义字段。最后，函数会将用户对象添加到内存中的缓存中，并触发一个名为 `UserEvents::AFTER_INSERT` 的事件，通知其他组件用户已经成功插入。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `insert` and is used to insert a new user into the database. It accepts a `User` object as a parameter which contains the user's relevant information.

The function first triggers an event called `UserEvents::BEFORE_INSERT` to notify other components that the user is about to be inserted. Then, it builds an SQL insert statement and fills the user's attributes into the parameters of the statement. The function then executes the statement using the database connection object. If successful, the function assigns the database-generated ID to the user object and saves the user's custom fields. Finally, the function adds the user object to the memory cache and triggers an event called `UserEvents::AFTER_INSERT` to notify other components that the user has been successfully inserted.
summary_french:
La fonction `insert` a pour but d'insérer un nouvel utilisateur dans la base de données. Elle prend un argument unique : `$user` qui est un objet de type `User`. 

La fonction commence par déclencher un événement `BEFORE_INSERT` pour informer les autres composants de l'insertion d'un nouvel utilisateur. Ensuite, elle construit une requête SQL d'insertion dans la table des utilisateurs en utilisant les informations de l'objet `$user`. 

Les informations de l'utilisateur sont ensuite placées dans un tableau `$params` qui sera utilisé pour exécuter la requête SQL. La requête est ensuite exécutée et l'identifiant de l'utilisateur nouvellement créé est récupéré. 

L'identifiant est ensuite assigné à l'objet `$user`. La fonction sauvegarde ensuite les champs personnalisés de l'utilisateur et ajoute l'utilisateur à la carte d'identité. Enfin, un événement `AFTER_INSERT` est déclenché pour informer les autres composants de l'insertion réussie de l'utilisateur.
bt_french:
Function `insert` is used to insert a new user into the database. It takes one argument: `$user` which is an object of type `User`. 

The function starts by triggering the `BEFORE_INSERT` event to inform other components of the insertion of a new user. It then builds an SQL insertion query using the information from the `$user` object. 

The user information is then placed in a table `$params` which will be used to execute the SQL query. The query is then executed and the ID of the newly created user is retrieved. 

The ID is then assigned to the `$user` object. The function then saves the user's custom fields and adds the user to the identity card. Finally, the `AFTER_INSERT` event is triggered to inform other components of the successful insertion of the user.
summary_spanish:
La función `insert` tiene como propósito insertar un nuevo usuario en la base de datos. 

Recibe un único argumento: `$user`, que es un objeto de tipo `User`.

Primero, la función dispara un evento `BEFORE_INSERT` para notificar a otros componentes sobre la operación de inserción. Luego, construye una consulta SQL `INSERT` para insertar los datos del usuario en la tabla correspondiente. La consulta utiliza placeholders para evitar inyecciones de SQL. 

A continuación, crea un array `$params` que contiene los valores para los placeholders, obteniendolos de las propiedades del objeto `$user`. 

Finalmente, ejecuta la consulta SQL con los parámetros y actualiza el ID del usuario con el ID generado por la base de datos. Guarda los campos personalizados del usuario, agrega el usuario al mapa de identidad y dispara un evento `AFTER_INSERT` para notificar sobre el éxito de la inserción.
bt_spanish:
Function `insert` has the purpose of inserting a new user into the database. It receives a single argument: `$user`, which is an object of type `User`. 

First, the function triggers an event `BEFORE_INSERT` to notify other components about the insertion operation. Then, it builds an SQL INSERT query to insert the user's data into the corresponding table. The query uses placeholders to avoid SQL injection. 

Next, it creates an array `$params` containing the values for the placeholders, obtained from the properties of the object `$user`. 

Finally, it executes the SQL query with the parameters and updates the user's ID with the ID generated by the database. It also stores the user's custom fields, adds the user to the identity map, and triggers an event `AFTER_INSERT` to notify about the successful insertion.
summary_portuguese:
A função `insert` recebe um objeto `User` como argumento e insere os dados desse usuário no banco de dados. 

Antes de inserir, a função dispara um evento `BEFORE_INSERT` para notificar outros componentes sobre a ação. 

Em seguida, constrói uma query SQL `INSERT` com os campos do usuário e seus valores correspondentes, obtidos do objeto `User`. 

A query é executada no banco de dados e o ID do usuário recém-inserido é atribuído ao objeto `User`. 

A função também salva campos personalizados do usuário e atualiza o mapa de identidade com o novo usuário. 

Por fim, dispara um evento `AFTER_INSERT` para notificar outros componentes sobre o término da inserção.
bt_portuguese:
Function `insert` takes a `User` object as argument and inserts the data of that user into the database. Before inserting, the function triggers an `BEFORE_INSERT` event to notify other components about the action. 

Then, it builds an SQL `INSERT` query with the user's fields and corresponding values, obtained from the `User` object. The query is executed in the database and the ID of the newly inserted user is assigned to the `User` object. 

The function also saves the user's custom fields and updates the identity map with the new user. Finally, it triggers an `AFTER_INSERT` event to notify other components about the completion of the insertion.
summary_arabic:
هذه الوظيفة تدعى `insert` وتُستخدم لإنشاء مستخدم جديد في قاعدة البيانات. 

تستقبل الوظيفة `User` كحجة واحدة، وهي عبارة عن обّيّect يمثل المستخدم الذي سيتم إنشاؤه. 

تُنفذ الوظيفة الخطوات التالية:

1. تُرسل إشعار `BEFORE_INSERT` إلى المُستمعين المسجلين لحدث إنشاء المستخدم.
2. تُكوّن سطر SQL لإنشاء سجل جديد في جدول المستخدمين.
3. تُحدد قيم المُدخلات (parameters) التي ستُستخدم في سطر SQL، مستخدمة بيانات المستخدم المُقدمة.
4. تُنفذ سطر SQL لإنشاء سجل جديد في قاعدة البيانات.
5. تحدد `id` للمستخدم المُنشئ حديثًا باستخدام `lastInsertId` من قاعدة البيانات.
6. تُحفظ حقول المستخدم المُخصصة.
7. تُضيف المستخدم إلى خريطة `identityMap`.
8. تُرسل إشعار `AFTER_INSERT` إلى المُستمعين المسجلين لحدث إنشاء المستخدم.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `insert` and is used to create a new user in the database. It accepts one argument, which is an object representing the user to be created. 

The function performs the following steps:

1. Sends a `BEFORE_INSERT` notification to the registered listeners of the user creation event.
2. Generates an SQL statement to create a new record in the user table.
3. Sets the input parameters for the SQL statement using the provided user data.
4. Executes the SQL statement to create a new record in the database.
5. Gets the `id` of the newly created user using the `lastInsertId` from the database.
6. Saves the user's custom fields.
7. Adds the user to the `identityMap`.
8. Sends an `AFTER_INSERT` notification to the registered listeners of the user creation event.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `insert` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक `User` ऑब्जेक्ट को डेटाबेस में डालता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन एक `User` ऑब्जेक्ट को लेता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन की मुख्य कार्यप्रणाली इस प्रकार है:

1. यह एक इवेंट `UserEvents::BEFORE_INSERT` को ट्रिगर करता है जो उपयोगकर्ता डेटाबेस में डालने से पहले होने वाले कार्यों के लिए है।
2. यह एक SQL क्वेरी बनाता है जो उपयोगकर्ता डेटा को `userTableName` नामक तालिका में डालता है।
3. यह क्वेरी में उपयोग होने वाले मानों को एक `$params` सरणी में संग्रहीत करता है, जो उपयोगकर्ता ऑब्जेक्ट से प्राप्त होते हैं।
4. यह क्वेरी को `conn` नामक एक कनेक्शन ऑब्जेक्ट के माध्यम से डेटाबेस में भेजता है।
5. यह उपयोगकर्ता ऑब्जेक्ट में `id` सेट करता है, जो डेटाबेस द्वारा उत्पन्न अंतिम इनसेर्ट आईडी है।
6. यह उपयोगकर्ता के कस्टम फ़ील्ड को डेटाबेस में सहेजता है।
7. यह उपयोगकर्ता ऑब्जेक्ट को `identityMap` नामक एक मैप में संग्रहीत करता है।
8. यह एक इवेंट `UserEvents::AFTER_INSERT` को ट्रिगर करता है जो उपयोगकर्ता डेटाबेस में डालने के बाद होने वाले कार्यों के लिए है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `insert` which inserts a `User` object into the database. The function takes a `User` object as input. 

The main process of this function is as follows:

1. It triggers an event `UserEvents::BEFORE_INSERT` which is for the tasks to be done before inserting the user into the database.
2. It creates an SQL query which inserts the user data into the table named `userTableName`.
3. It stores the values to be used in the query in a `$params` array, which is obtained from the user object.
4. It sends the query to the database through a connection object `conn`.
5. It sets the `id` of the user object to the last inserted ID generated by the database.
6. It stores the user's custom fields into the database.
7. It stores the user object into a map named `identityMap`.
8. It triggers an event `UserEvents::AFTER_INSERT` which is for the tasks to be done after inserting the user into the database.

summary_english:
The function DataContrast checks for a specific message within a list of messages based on several criteria. It takes four arguments: $fee (a number representing a fee), $time (a timestamp), $Minute (an integer representing a time window in minutes, defaulting to 3), and $Remarks (a string representing optional remarks, defaulting to false). 

The function iterates through a list of messages stored in the $this->json['AddMsgList'] array. For each message, it checks if the filename contains "微信支付收款" and extracts the fee amount. Then, it verifies if the message's creation time falls within the specified time window before the given $time, if the extracted fee matches the input $fee, and if the message content includes the optional $Remarks (either matching exactly or not containing "备注：" at all). If all conditions are met, the function returns the message ID. Otherwise, it returns false.
summary_chinese:
这个函数叫做 `DataContrast`，它的目的是在给定的时间范围内查找与指定费用相匹配的微信支付收款记录，并返回记录的 ID。

它接受四个参数：

* `$fee`：支付金额，类型为数字。
* `$time`：指定的时间戳，类型为数字。
* `$Minute`：时间范围，以分钟为单位，默认为 3 分钟，类型为数字。
* `$Remarks`：备注信息，类型为字符串，可选参数，默认为 false。

函数的逻辑是：

1. 检查 `$this->json['AddMsgList']` 是否存在且是数组。
2. 遍历数组中的每个元素。
3. 如果文件名包含 "微信支付收款"，则提取支付金额。
4. 检查支付金额是否与传入的 `$fee` 相等，以及记录创建时间是否在指定的时间范围内。
5. 如果备注信息不为空，则检查记录内容是否包含指定的备注信息。如果备注信息为空，则检查记录内容是否不包含 "备注："。
6. 如果所有条件都满足，则返回记录的 ID。
7. 如果没有找到匹配的记录，则返回 false。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `DataContrast`, and its purpose is to find the WeChat Pay payment record that matches the specified fee within the given time range, and return the record's ID.

It accepts four parameters:

* `$fee`: Payment amount, type is numeric.
* `$time`: Specified timestamp, type is numeric.
* `$Minute`: Time range, in minutes, default is 3 minutes, type is numeric.
* `$Remarks`: Remark information, type is string, optional parameter, default is false.

The logic is as follows:

1. Check whether `$this->json['AddMsgList']` exists and is an array.
2. Iterate through each element in the array.
3. If the file name contains "WeChat Pay", extract the payment amount.
4. Check whether the payment amount is equal to the specified `$fee`, and whether the record creation time is within the specified time range.
5. If the remark information is not empty, check whether the record content contains the specified remark information. If the remark information is empty, check whether the record content does not contain "备注".
6. If all conditions are met, return the record's ID.
7. If no matching record is found, return false.
summary_french:
La fonction `DataContrast` a pour but de trouver un message spécifique dans une liste de messages. Elle prend quatre arguments : `$fee` qui représente le montant de la transaction, `$time` qui représente un timestamp, `$Minute` qui représente un délai en minutes (par défaut 3 minutes) et `$Remarks` qui représente une chaîne de caractères représentant des remarques (optionnel). 

La fonction parcourt la liste de messages `$this->json['AddMsgList']` et vérifie si le nom du fichier du message contient "微信支付收款". Si c'est le cas, elle extrait le montant de la transaction du nom du fichier. Ensuite, elle vérifie si le timestamp de création du message est situé dans une fenêtre de `$Minute` minutes avant `$time` et si le montant de la transaction correspond à `$fee`. Enfin, elle vérifie si les remarques du message correspondent à `$Remarks` (si elles sont fournies). Si toutes ces conditions sont remplies, la fonction retourne l'identifiant du message. Sinon, elle retourne `false`.
bt_french:
Function `DataContrast` is used to find a specific message in a list of messages. It takes four arguments: `$fee` which represents the amount of the transaction, `$time` which represents a timestamp, `$Minute` which represents a delay in minutes (default 3 minutes) and `$Remarks` which represents a string representing remarks (optional). 

The function loops through the list of messages `$this->json['AddMsgList']` and checks if the name of the file of the message contains "微信支付收款". If so, it extracts the amount of the transaction from the file name. Then, it checks if the timestamp of the message is within a window of `$Minute` minutes before `$time` and if the amount of the transaction corresponds to `$fee`. Finally, it checks if the remarks of the message match `$Remarks` (if provided). If all these conditions are met, the function returns the message ID. Otherwise, it returns `false`.
summary_spanish:
La función DataContrast busca un mensaje específico dentro de una lista de mensajes. Recibe como argumentos el valor de una tarifa ($fee), un timestamp ($time), un número de minutos ($Minute) y una cadena de texto opcional para buscar en los comentarios ($Remarks). 

La función itera a través de una lista de mensajes almacenada en la propiedad json['AddMsgList'] del objeto que la llama. Para cada mensaje, verifica si el nombre del archivo contiene la cadena "微信支付收款" y extrae el valor de la tarifa. Luego, comprueba si la fecha de creación del mensaje está dentro de un rango de tiempo definido por $time y $Minute, si la tarifa coincide con la proporcionada como argumento y si el comentario del mensaje coincide con la cadena $Remarks (si se proporciona). Si todas las condiciones se cumplen, la función devuelve el ID del mensaje. De lo contrario, devuelve false.
bt_spanish:
Function DataContrast searches for a specific message in a list of messages. It receives as arguments the value of a fee ($fee), a timestamp ($time), a number of minutes ($Minute) and an optional string to search in the comments ($Remarks). 

The function iterates through a list of messages stored in the json['AddMsgList'] property of the object that called it. For each message, it checks if the file name contains the string "微信支付收款" and extracts the fee value. Then, it checks if the creation time of the message is within the range of time defined by $time and $Minute, if the fee matches the one provided as argument and if the message comment matches the string $Remarks (if provided). If all conditions are met, the function returns the ID of the message. Otherwise, it returns false.
summary_portuguese:
A função `DataContrast` busca um ID de mensagem específico dentro de uma lista de mensagens. Ela recebe como argumentos o valor da taxa (`$fee`), o timestamp atual (`$time`), um intervalo de tempo em minutos (`$Minute`, com valor padrão 3) e uma string opcional de comentários (`$Remarks`). 

A função percorre a lista de mensagens (`$this->json['AddMsgList']`) e procura por mensagens com o nome de arquivo contendo "微信支付收款" e cujo valor da taxa corresponda ao valor passado como argumento. Além disso, verifica se o timestamp da mensagem está dentro do intervalo de tempo definido e se o comentário da mensagem corresponde ao valor passado como argumento `$Remarks`. Se todas as condições forem satisfeitas, a função retorna o ID da mensagem. Caso contrário, retorna `false`.
bt_portuguese:
Function `DataContrast` searches for a specific message ID in a list of messages. It receives as arguments the fee value (`$fee`), the current timestamp (`$time`), a time interval in minutes (`$Minute`, with default value 3) and an optional string of remarks (`$Remarks`). 

The function iterates through the list of messages (`$this->json['AddMsgList']`) and searches for messages with the file name containing "微信支付收款" and whose fee value corresponds to the argument value. Additionally, it checks if the message timestamp is within the specified time interval and if the message remarks match the argument value `$Remarks`. If all conditions are met, the function returns the message ID. Otherwise, it returns `false`.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى DataContrast وتستهدف العثور على رسالة محددة في قائمة رسائل. 

تستقبل الدالة أربعة معلمات:

*  `$fee`:  قيمة الرسوم، من نوع عدد.
*  `$time`:  وقت محدد، من نوع عدد.
*  `$Minute`:  عدد دقائق، مع قيمة افتراضية 3، من نوع عدد.
*  `$Remarks`:  ملاحظة، مع قيمة افتراضية false، من نوع نص.

تدور فكرة الدالة حول البحث في قائمة رسائل `$this->json['AddMsgList']` عن رسالة تتطابق مع الشروط التالية:

*  يحتوي اسم الملف على "微信支付收款".
*  قيمة الرسوم في الملف تتطابق مع قيمة `$fee`.
*  وقت إنشاء الرسالة يكون ضمن نطاق دقائق معينة من `$time`.
*  إذا تم إعطاء `$Remarks` قيمة، يجب أن تتطابق الملاحظة في الرسالة مع `$Remarks`.

إذا وجدت الرسالة التي تلبي هذه الشروط، فإن الدالة تعود بـ `MsgId` الرسالة. وإلا، تعود بـ `false`.
bt_arabic:
This function is called DataContrast and aims to find a specific message in a list of messages. 

The function accepts four parameters:

*  `$fee`:  Fee value, of type number.
*  `$time`:  Specific time, of type number.
*  `$Minute`:  Number of minutes, with default value 3, of type number.
*  `$Remarks`:  Remark, with default value false, of type string.

The idea of the function is to search in the list of messages `$this->json['AddMsgList']` for a message that matches the following conditions:

*  The file name contains "微信支付收款".
*  The fee value in the file matches the value of `$fee`.
*  The time of creation of the message is within the specified number of minutes from `$time`.
*  If `$Remarks` is given a value, the remark in the message must match `$Remarks`.

If the message that meets these conditions is found, the function returns `MsgId` of the message. Otherwise, it returns `false`.
summary_hindi:
यह फ़ंक्शन "DataContrast" नाम का है और इसका उद्देश्य कुछ विशिष्ट मानदंडों के आधार पर एक फ़ाइल की पहचान करना है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन को चार मान दिए जाते हैं:

* `$fee`: यह एक संख्या है जो फ़ाइल के नाम में मौजूद राशि से मेल खाना चाहिए।
* `$time`: यह एक समय स्टैम्प है जो फ़ाइल के समय से तुलना करने के लिए उपयोग किया जाता है।
* `$Minute`: यह एक संख्या है जो समय अंतराल को निर्धारित करती है। 
* `$Remarks`: यह एक स्ट्रिंग है जो फ़ाइल के सामग्री में मौजूद किसी विशेष टिप्पणी से मेल खाना चाहिए।

फ़ंक्शन का मुख्य तर्क इस प्रकार है: यह `$this->json['AddMsgList']` नामक एक एरे को इटरेट करता है। प्रत्येक आइटम में, यह जाँच करता है कि फ़ाइल का नाम "微信支付收款" शब्द शामिल है या नहीं। यदि हाँ, तो यह फ़ाइल के नाम से राशि निकालता है और यह राशि को `$fee` मान से तुलना करता है। इसके अलावा, यह फ़ाइल के समय को `$time` और `$Minute` मान के आधार पर जाँच करता है। अंत में, यह `$Remarks` मान के साथ फ़ाइल की सामग्री की तुलना करता है। यदि सभी मानदंड संतुष्ट होते हैं, तो फ़ंक्शन फ़ाइल का `MsgId` वापस करता है; अन्यथा, यह `false` वापस करता है।
bt_hindi:
This function is called "DataContrast" and its purpose is to identify a file based on certain criteria. It takes four parameters:

* `$fee`: This is a number that should match the amount present in the file name.
* `$time`: This is a timestamp to be compared with the file's timestamp.
* `$Minute`: This is a number that determines the time interval.
* `$Remarks`: This is a string that should match a specific comment present in the file's content.

The main logic of the function is to iterate through the array `$this->json['AddMsgList']`. For each item, it checks if the file name contains the words "微信支付收款". If yes, it extracts the amount from the file name and compares it with the `$fee` parameter. Additionally, it compares the file's timestamp with the `$time` and `$Minute` parameters. Finally, it compares the file's content with the `$Remarks` parameter. If all the criteria are met, the function returns the `MsgId` of the file; otherwise, it returns `false`.

code:
def get_queryset(self):
        """Only display unpublished content to authenticated users, filter by
        query parameter if present."""

        # Get base queryset from DispatchPublishableMixin
        queryset = self.get_publishable_queryset()

        queryset = queryset.order_by('-updated_at')

        # Optionally filter by a query parameter
        q = self.request.query_params.get('q')

        if q:
            queryset = queryset.filter(title__icontains=q)

        return queryset
docstring:
Only display unpublished content to authenticated users, filter by
        query parameter if present.
summary_english: The function `get_queryset` retrieves a list of unpublished content for authenticated users. It starts by getting a base queryset from a parent class. Then, it sorts the queryset by the most recently updated item.  If a query parameter named 'q' is present in the request, it filters the queryset to include only items whose title contains the value of 'q'. Finally, it returns the filtered and sorted queryset.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `get_queryset`，它的目的是为认证用户显示未发布的内容，并根据查询参数进行过滤。

它接受一个参数 `self`，表示当前类的实例。

函数首先从 `DispatchPublishableMixin` 中获取基础查询集，然后按 `updated_at` 字段降序排序。接着，它从请求的查询参数中获取一个名为 `q` 的参数，如果存在，则根据该参数过滤查询集，只保留标题中包含该参数的条目。最后，函数返回经过过滤排序后的查询集。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `get_queryset` and its purpose is to display un-published content to authenticated users and filter it according to the query parameters. It accepts one argument `self` which represents the current class instance.

The function first gets the base queryset from `DispatchPublishableMixin` and then sorts it by the `updated_at` field in descending order. Then, it gets a parameter named `q` from the request's query parameters if it exists, and filters the queryset according to it, keeping only the entries whose titles contain the parameter. Finally, the function returns the filtered and sorted queryset.
summary_french:
La fonction `get_queryset` est conçue pour retourner un ensemble de données filtré en fonction de certains critères. Elle est destinée à afficher uniquement les contenus non publiés aux utilisateurs authentifiés. 

Elle prend en argument `self`, qui fait référence à l'instance de la classe dans laquelle la fonction est définie.

En premier lieu, elle récupère un ensemble de données de base à partir de la classe mère `DispatchPublishableMixin` grâce à la méthode `get_publishable_queryset`. Ensuite, elle trie ce jeu de données par date de dernière modification en ordre décroissant grâce à `order_by('-updated_at')`.

Enfin, elle vérifie s'il existe un paramètre de requête nommé `q`. Si tel est le cas, elle filtre le jeu de données pour inclure uniquement les éléments dont le titre contient le texte spécifié dans le paramètre `q` en utilisant `filter(title__icontains=q)`.

La fonction retourne le jeu de données final, filtré et trié.
bt_french:
Function `get_queryset` is designed to return a set of data filtered according to certain criteria. It is intended to display only unpublished contents to authenticated users. 

It takes argument `self`, which refers to the instance of the class in which the function is defined.

First, it retrieves a base set of data from the parent class `DispatchPublishableMixin` using the method `get_publishable_queryset`. Then, it sorts this data by the date of last modification in descending order using `order_by('-updated_at')`.

Finally, it checks if there is a query parameter named `q`. If so, it filters the data to include only the elements whose title contains the text specified in the `q` parameter using `filter(title__icontains=q)`.

The function returns the final, filtered and sorted data.
summary_spanish:
La función `get_queryset` tiene como propósito obtener un conjunto de datos (queryset) de contenido no publicado para usuarios autenticados, filtrándolo por un parámetro de consulta si está presente. 

La función recibe como argumento implícito `self`, que hace referencia al objeto actual. 

Primero, obtiene un conjunto de datos base de la clase padre `DispatchPublishableMixin` a través de la función `get_publishable_queryset`. Luego, ordena este conjunto de datos por fecha de actualización en orden descendente usando `order_by('-updated_at')`. 

Finalmente, verifica si existe un parámetro de consulta llamado 'q' en la solicitud. Si lo hay, filtra el conjunto de datos para incluir solo los elementos cuyo título contenga el valor del parámetro 'q' de forma insensible a mayúsculas y minúsculas usando `filter(title__icontains=q)`. 

Finalmente, devuelve el conjunto de datos filtrado y ordenado.
bt_spanish:
Function `get_queryset` has the purpose of obtaining a set of non-published data (queryset) for authenticated users, filtering it by a query parameter if present. 

The function receives the implicit argument `self`, which refers to the current object. 

First, it gets a base data set from the parent class `DispatchPublishableMixin` using the function `get_publishable_queryset`. Then, it orders this data set by the updated_at field in descending order using `order_by('-updated_at')`. 

Finally, it checks if there is a query parameter called 'q' in the request. If so, it filters the data set to include only the elements whose title contains the value of the 'q' parameter, regardless of case, using `filter(title__icontains=q)`. 

Finally, it returns the filtered and ordered data set.
summary_portuguese:
A função `get_queryset` define o conjunto de dados a ser exibido em uma view. Ela primeiro obtém o conjunto de dados base de uma classe pai chamada `DispatchPublishableMixin`. Em seguida, ordena os dados pelo campo `updated_at` em ordem decrescente. Se um parâmetro de consulta chamado `q` estiver presente, filtra os dados para incluir apenas aqueles cujo título contenha o valor do parâmetro `q` (ignorando maiúsculas e minúsculas). Por fim, a função retorna o conjunto de dados filtrado e ordenado. 


A função aceita nenhum argumento explícito.
bt_portuguese: Function `get_queryset` defines the set of data to be displayed in a view. It first gets the base set of data from a parent class called `DispatchPublishableMixin`. Then, it orders the data by the `updated_at` field in descending order. If a query parameter called `q` is present, it filters the data to include only those whose title contains the value of the `q` parameter (ignoring case). Finally, the function returns the filtered and ordered data.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى `get_queryset`، وتهدف إلى عرض المحتوى غير المنشور فقط للمستخدمين المعتمدين، مع فلترة المحتوى بناءً على معيار البحث إذا كان موجودًا. 

تستقبل الدالة `request` كحجة من نوع `HttpRequest`، والتي تمثل طلب المستخدم الحالي.

تبدأ الدالة بالوصول إلى مجموعة البيانات الأساسية من `DispatchPublishableMixin`، ثم تقوم بترتيبها حسب تاريخ التحديث في الترتيب التنازلي. 

بعد ذلك، تحقق الدالة من وجود معيار بحث `q` في طلب المستخدم. إذا وجد، يتم فلترة مجموعة البيانات لتشمل فقط العناصر التي تحتوي على معيار البحث في عنوانها. 

في النهاية، تعود الدالة مجموعة البيانات الفلترة.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `get_queryset` and aims to display only unpublished content to authenticated users, while filtering the content based on the search criteria if present. 

The function receives `request` as an argument of type `HttpRequest`, which represents the current user's request.

The function starts by accessing the underlying data set from `DispatchPublishableMixin`, then sorts it in descending order of update date.

Next, the function checks if the user's request contains a search criteria `q`. If so, the data set is filtered to include only the items containing the search criteria in their title.

Finally, the function returns the filtered data set.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `get_queryset` को परिभाषित करता है जो प्रकाशन योग्य क्वेरीसेट को वापस करता है। यह फ़ंक्शन प्रमाणित उपयोगकर्ताओं के लिए केवल अप्रकाशित सामग्री प्रदर्शित करता है और यदि कोई क्वेरी पैरामीटर मौजूद है तो उसे फ़िल्टर करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन `self` नामक एक आर्गुमेंट लेता है जो संभवतः एक क्लास इंस्टेंस है। 

यह पहले `get_publishable_queryset` नामक एक अन्य फ़ंक्शन को कॉल करके एक मूल क्वेरीसेट प्राप्त करता है। फिर, यह क्वेरीसेट को `updated_at` फ़ील्ड के आधार पर उल्टे क्रम में व्यवस्थित करता है। 

अंत में, यह `request.query_params` से `q` नामक एक क्वेरी पैरामीटर की जाँच करता है। यदि `q` मौजूद है, तो यह क्वेरीसेट को `title` फ़ील्ड में `q` के साथ मिलान करने वाले रिकॉर्ड्स तक फ़िल्टर करता है। 

अंत में, यह फ़िल्टर किए गए और व्यवस्थित क्वेरीसेट को वापस करता है।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `get_queryset` which returns a publishable queryset. This function displays only unpublished content to authenticated users and filters the query if any query parameter is present. It takes an argument `self` which is likely an instance of a class. 

It first calls another function `get_publishable_queryset` to get a base queryset. Then, it sorts the queryset in reverse chronological order based on the `updated_at` field. Finally, it checks for a query parameter `q` from `request.query_params`. If `q` is present, it filters the queryset to records matching `q` in the `title` field. 

Finally, it returns the filtered and sorted queryset.

code:
def get_all_nodes(self):
        """
        Returns all nodes in the hash with the time they were last refreshed
        as a dictionary.

        :rtype: dict(string, int)
        :returns: A dictionary of strings and corresponding timestamps

        """
        nodes = self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)
        return {node_id: int(dt) for (node_id, dt) in nodes.items()}
docstring:
Returns all nodes in the hash with the time they were last refreshed
        as a dictionary.

        :rtype: dict(string, int)
        :returns: A dictionary of strings and corresponding timestamps
summary_english: The function `get_all_nodes` retrieves all nodes from a hash data structure along with their last refresh timestamps. It connects to a Redis database using `self.conn.client` and fetches all key-value pairs from the hash identified by `self.nodelist_key`.  The function then converts the retrieved data into a dictionary where each node ID is a key and its corresponding refresh timestamp (converted to an integer) is the value. Finally, it returns this dictionary.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `get_all_nodes`，它从哈希表中获取所有节点及其最后刷新时间，并返回一个字典。 

这个函数接受一个 `self` 参数，代表当前类的实例。

它的核心逻辑是首先使用 `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)` 从哈希表中获取所有节点和对应时间戳的键值对。然后，它使用字典解析器将这些键值对转换为一个新的字典，其中键是节点 ID，值是时间戳（转换为整数）。最后，函数返回这个新的字典。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `get_all_nodes` and it retrieves all the nodes and their last refreshed time from the hash table and returns a dictionary. 

This function takes a `self` argument, which represents the current class instance.

The core logic of this function is to first use `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)` to get all the nodes and corresponding timestamp key-value pairs from the hash table. Then, it uses a dictionary parser to convert these key-value pairs into a new dictionary, where the key is the node ID and the value is the timestamp (converted to an integer). Finally, the function returns this new dictionary.
summary_french: La fonction `get_all_nodes` retourne tous les noeuds du hash avec le moment de leur dernière mise à jour sous forme de dictionnaire. Elle prend en argument `self`, qui représente l'instance de la classe. La fonction récupère tous les éléments du hash en utilisant la méthode `hgetall` de la connexion `self.conn.client` avec la clé `self.nodelist_key`. Ensuite, elle construit un nouveau dictionnaire où les clés sont les identifiants des noeuds et les valeurs sont les timestamps convertis en entier. Enfin, elle retourne ce dictionnaire.
bt_french: Function `get_all_nodes` returns all the nodes of the hash with their last update time in dictionary form. It takes argument `self`, which represents the instance of the class. The function retrieves all the elements of the hash using the method `hgetall` of the connection `self.conn.client` with the key `self.nodelist_key`. Then, it constructs a new dictionary where the keys are the node identifiers and the values are the timestamps converted to integer. Finally, it returns this dictionary.
summary_spanish:
La función `get_all_nodes` devuelve todos los nodos en el hash junto con el tiempo de su última actualización, como un diccionario.  Toma como argumento `self`, que se refiere al objeto actual.  

La función primero obtiene todos los elementos del hash usando `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)`. Luego, crea un nuevo diccionario donde las claves son los IDs de los nodos y los valores son los timestamps de actualización convertidos a enteros. Finalmente, devuelve este nuevo diccionario.
bt_spanish:
Function `get_all_nodes` returns all nodes in the hash along with the time of their last update, as a dictionary. It takes as argument `self`, which refers to the current object. 

The function first gets all elements of the hash using `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)`. Then, it creates a new dictionary where the keys are the node IDs and the values are the update timestamps converted to integers. Finally, it returns this new dictionary.
summary_portuguese:
A função `get_all_nodes` retorna todos os nós do hash, juntamente com o tempo de sua última atualização, em formato de dicionário. Ela recebe nenhum argumento. 

A lógica principal é obter todos os pares chave-valor do hash usando `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)`. Em seguida, cria um novo dicionário onde as chaves são os IDs dos nós e os valores são os timestamps de atualização, convertidos para inteiros. Finalmente, a função retorna este novo dicionário.
bt_portuguese:
Function `get_all_nodes` returns all nodes of the hash, along with the time of their last update, in dictionary format. It does not receive any arguments. 

The main logic is to obtain all key-value pairs of the hash using `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)`. Then, a new dictionary is created where the keys are the node IDs and the values are the update timestamps, converted to integers. Finally, the function returns this new dictionary.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى `get_all_nodes` وتقوم بعملية استرجاع جميع العقد الموجودة في الحزمة مع وقت تحديثها الأخير، وتقوم بعرضها كدليل.  

تستقبل الدالة  `self`  كحجة واحدة، والتي تمثل مرجعًا إلى الكائن نفسه. 

تستخدم الدالة  `hgetall`  من  `self.conn.client`  لاسترجاع جميع العناصر من قائمة العقد  `self.nodelist_key`. ثم تقوم بتحويل النتيجة إلى دليل حيث يكون المفتاح هو معرف العقد  `node_id`  و القيمة هي الوقت  `dt`  كعدد صحيح.
bt_arabic:
This function is called `get_all_nodes` and it retrieves all the nodes present in the package with their latest update time, and displays them as a dictionary. 

The function `self` accepts one argument, which represents a reference to the same object. 

The function uses `hgetall` from `self.conn.client` to retrieve all the elements from the node list key `self.nodelist_key`. Then it converts the result into a dictionary where the key is the node id `node_id` and the value is the time `dt` as an integer.
summary_hindi:
यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `get_all_nodes` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक हैश में मौजूद सभी नोड्स और उनके अंतिम रिफ्रेश समय को एक डिक्शनरी में वापस करता है। 

यह फ़ंक्शन `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)` का उपयोग करके हैश से सभी नोड्स और उनके रिफ्रेश समय को प्राप्त करता है। फिर, यह एक नया डिक्शनरी बनाता है जहाँ नोड आईडी कीमती होती है और रिफ्रेश समय मान होता है। 

इस फ़ंक्शन को कॉल करने पर, यह एक डिक्शनरी वापस करेगा जिसमें प्रत्येक नोड आईडी एक पूर्णांक समय स्टैम्प के साथ जुड़ी होगी।
bt_hindi:
This code defines a function `get_all_nodes` which returns a dictionary containing all the nodes and their last refreshed time from a hash. The function uses `self.conn.client.hgetall(self.nodelist_key)` to get all the nodes and their refresh times from the hash. Then, it creates a new dictionary where the key is the node ID and the value is the refresh time. 

When this function is called, it will return a dictionary where each node ID is associated with a timestamp.

docstring: Configure plugin. Plugin is enabled by default.
summary_english: The function `configure` is used to set up a plugin. It assumes the plugin is enabled by default. The function takes two arguments: `options`, which is likely an object containing various configuration settings, and `conf`, which probably represents a dictionary or similar structure holding plugin-specific configuration values. The function stores the `conf` object as `self.conf`. Then, it checks if the `capture` option within the `options` object is set to False. If it is, the plugin's `enabled` status is set to False, effectively disabling it.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `configure`，用于配置插件。插件默认启用。 

它接受两个参数：`options` 和 `conf`。 `options` 的类型是未知的，而 `conf` 的类型是未知的。

函数的核心逻辑是将 `conf` 赋值给 `self.conf`。如果 `options.capture` 为 False，则将 `self.enabled` 设置为 False，表示插件禁用。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `configure` and is used to configure the plugin. The plugin is enabled by default. 

It accepts two parameters: `options` and `conf`. The type of `options` is unknown, while the type of `conf` is unknown.

The core logic of the function is to assign `conf` to `self.conf`. If `options.capture` is False, set `self.enabled` to False, indicating the plugin is disabled.
summary_french: La fonction `configure` permet de configurer un plugin. Elle prend deux arguments : `options` qui est un objet contenant des options et `conf` qui est un dictionnaire de configuration.  La fonction active le plugin par défaut. Si l'option `capture` dans `options` est fausse, alors le plugin est désactivé.  La configuration du plugin est ensuite stockée dans l'attribut `self.conf` de l'objet.
bt_french: Function `configure` allows to configure a plugin. It takes two arguments: `options` which is an object containing options and `conf` which is a dictionary of configuration. The function activates the plugin by default. If the option `capture` in `options` is false, then the plugin is disabled. The configuration of the plugin is then stored in the attribute `self.conf` of the object.
summary_spanish: La función `configure` configura un plugin. Por defecto, el plugin está habilitado.  Toma dos argumentos: `options`, que es un objeto, y `conf`, que es un objeto de configuración. La función guarda el objeto de configuración en la variable `self.conf`. Luego, si el argumento `options.capture` es falso, la variable `self.enabled` se establece en falso, deshabilitando el plugin.
bt_spanish: Function `configure` configures a plugin. By default, the plugin is enabled. It takes two arguments: `options`, which is an object, and `conf`, which is a configuration object. The function stores the configuration object in the variable `self.conf`. Then, if the argument `options.capture` is false, the variable `self.enabled` is set to false, disabling the plugin.
summary_portuguese: A função `configure` configura um plugin. Ela assume dois argumentos: `options`, que é um objeto contendo opções, e `conf`, que é um dicionário de configurações. A função define a variável `self.conf` com o valor de `conf`. Se a opção `capture` em `options` for falsa, a variável `self.enabled` é definida como falsa, desabilitando o plugin. Caso contrário, o plugin é habilitado por padrão.
bt_portuguese: Function `configure` configures a plugin. It takes two arguments: `options`, which is an object containing options, and `conf`, which is a dictionary of configurations. The function sets the variable `self.conf` to the value of `conf`. If the option `capture` in `options` is false, the variable `self.enabled` is set to false, disabling the plugin. Otherwise, the plugin is enabled by default.
summary_arabic:
هذه الدالة تسمى "configure" وتُستخدم لتكوين إضافة برمجية.  تُفترض أن الإضافة نشطة بشكل افتراضي.  تستقبل الدالة "options" وهو عنصر من نوع "options" و "conf" وهو عنصر من نوع "conf".  

إذا لم يتم تحديد خيار "capture" في "options" ، يتم تعطيل الإضافة.
bt_arabic: This function is called "configure" and is used to configure a plugin. The plugin is assumed to be active by default. The function accepts two arguments: "options" which is an object of type "options" and "conf" which is an object of type "conf". If the "capture" option is not specified in "options", the plugin will be disabled.
summary_hindi: यह कोड एक फ़ंक्शन `configure` को परिभाषित करता है जो एक प्लगइन को कॉन्फ़िगर करता है। यह फ़ंक्शन प्लगइन को डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप से सक्षम करता है और `options` और `conf` नामक दो एर्ग्यूमेंट्स लेता है। `options` एक ऐसा ऑब्जेक्ट है जिसमें `capture` नामक एक फ़ील्ड हो सकती है। यदि `options.capture` सत्य नहीं है, तो प्लगइन को अक्षम कर दिया जाता है।
bt_hindi: This code defines a function `configure` which configures a plugin. This function enables the plugin by default and takes two arguments named `options` and `conf`. `options` is an object which may contain a field named `capture`. If `options.capture` is false, the plugin is disabled.

code:
def get_enrollments_for_regid(self, regid, params={},
                                  include_courses=True):
        """
        Return a list of enrollments for the passed user regid.

        https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/enrollments.html#method.enrollments_api.index
        """
        sis_user_id = self._sis_id(regid, sis_field="user")
        url = USERS_API.format(sis_user_id) + "/enrollments"

        courses = Courses() if include_courses else None

        enrollments = []
        for datum in self._get_paged_resource(url, params=params):
            enrollment = CanvasEnrollment(data=datum)
            if include_courses:
                course_id = datum["course_id"]
                course = courses.get_course(course_id)

                if course.sis_course_id is not None:
                    enrollment.course = course
                    # the following 3 lines are not removed
                    # to be backward compatible.
                    enrollment.course_url = course.course_url
                    enrollment.course_name = course.name
                    enrollment.sis_course_id = course.sis_course_id
            else:
                enrollment.course_url = re.sub(
                    r'/users/\d+$', '', enrollment.html_url)

            enrollments.append(enrollment)
        return enrollments
docstring:
Return a list of enrollments for the passed user regid.

        https://canvas.instructure.com/doc/api/enrollments.html#method.enrollments_api.index
summary_english:
The function `get_enrollments_for_regid` retrieves a list of enrollments for a given user identified by their registration ID (`regid`). 

It takes three arguments:

* `regid`: a string representing the user's registration ID.
* `params`: a dictionary of optional parameters to be passed to the API request.
* `include_courses`: a boolean indicating whether to include course information in the returned enrollments.

The function first determines the user's SIS ID using the provided `regid`. Then, it constructs a URL to access the user's enrollments from the Canvas API. 

If `include_courses` is True, it creates a `Courses` object to fetch course details. It iterates through the paginated enrollment data retrieved from the API, creating a `CanvasEnrollment` object for each enrollment. For each enrollment, it retrieves the corresponding course information from the `Courses` object and populates the `enrollment` object with course details. 

If `include_courses` is False, it extracts the course URL from the enrollment's HTML URL and sets it as the `course_url` attribute of the `enrollment` object. Finally, the function returns a list of `CanvasEnrollment` objects representing all the user's enrollments.
summary_chinese:
这个函数名为 `get_enrollments_for_regid`，它用于根据给定的用户注册 ID 返回该用户的课程报名列表。

它接受三个参数：

* `regid`：用户注册 ID，类型为字符串。
* `params`：一个字典，用于传递额外的查询参数，默认值为空字典。
* `include_courses`：一个布尔值，用于指示是否包含课程信息，默认值为 True。

函数的逻辑如下：

1. 根据 `regid` 和 `sis_field` 参数获取 SIS 用户 ID。
2. 构造 API 请求 URL，指向该用户的所有报名记录。
3. 如果 `include_courses` 为 True，则创建一个 `Courses` 对象，用于获取课程信息。
4. 使用 `_get_paged_resource` 方法获取所有报名记录，并将其逐个处理。
5. 对于每个报名记录，创建一个 `CanvasEnrollment` 对象，并根据 `include_courses` 的值，将其与对应的课程信息关联。
6. 如果 `include_courses` 为 False，则从报名记录的 HTML URL 中提取课程 URL。
7. 将所有处理后的报名记录添加到 `enrollments` 列表中。
8. 最后返回 `enrollments` 列表。
bt_chinese:
This function is called `get_enrollments_for_regid` and it is used to return a list of course enrollments for a given user registration ID. It takes three parameters:

* `regid` - The user registration ID, which is a string.
* `params` - A dictionary of additional query parameters, defaulting to an empty dictionary.
* `include_courses` - A boolean value indicating whether to include course information, defaulting to True.

The logic of the function is as follows:

1. Get the SIS user ID from the `regid` and `sis_field` parameters.
2. Construct an API request URL pointing to all the enrollments for the given user.
3. If `include_courses` is True, create a `Courses` object to get course information.
4. Use the `_get_paged_resource` method to get all the enrollments, and process them one by one.
5. For each enrollment, create a `CanvasEnrollment` object and, if `include_courses` is True, associate it with the corresponding course information.
6. If `include_courses` is False, extract the course URL from the enrollment's HTML URL.
7. Add all the processed enrollments to the `enrollments` list.
8. Finally, return the `enrollments` list.
summary_french:
La fonction `get_enrollments_for_regid` retourne une liste des inscriptions pour un utilisateur donné par son identifiant `regid`. Elle prend en argument `regid` (un identifiant d'utilisateur), un dictionnaire optionnel `params` pour les paramètres de la requête et un booléen `include_courses` qui détermine si les informations sur les cours doivent être incluses dans les inscriptions. 

La fonction récupère d'abord l'ID SIS de l'utilisateur à partir de `regid`. Ensuite, elle construit l'URL pour accéder aux inscriptions de l'utilisateur via l'API Canvas. Si `include_courses` est True, elle crée un objet `Courses` pour récupérer les informations sur les cours. 

La fonction effectue ensuite une requête paginée pour obtenir les inscriptions de l'utilisateur. Pour chaque inscription, elle crée un objet `CanvasEnrollment` et, si `include_courses` est True, elle récupère les informations sur le cours associé et les ajoute à l'objet `CanvasEnrollment`. Sinon, elle extrait l'URL du cours de l'URL de l'inscription. Enfin, la fonction retourne la liste des inscriptions.
bt_french:
Function `get_enrollments_for_regid` returns a list of enrollments for a given user identified by their registration ID `regid`. It takes `regid` (a user ID) as argument, an optional dictionary `params` for query parameters and a boolean `include_courses` which determines if course information should be included in the enrollments. 

The function first retrieves the SIS ID of the user from `regid`. Then, it creates the URL to access the user's enrollments via the Canvas API. If `include_courses` is True, it creates a `Courses` object to retrieve the course information. 

The function then performs a paged request to get the user's enrollments. For each enrollment, it creates a `CanvasEnrollment` object and, if `include_courses` is True, retrieves the associated course information and adds it to the `CanvasEnrollment` object. Otherwise, it extracts the course URL from the enrollment URL. Finally, the function returns the list of enrollments.
